Dolibarr  12.0
functions.lib.php
Go to the documentation of this file.

40 include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/json.lib.php';
41 
42 
48 function getDolGlobalString($key)
49 {
50  global $conf;
51  // return $conf->global->$key ?? '';
52  return (string) (empty($conf->global->$key) ? '' : $conf->global->$key);
53 }
54 
60 function getDolGlobalInt($key)
61 {
62  global $conf;
63  // return $conf->global->$key ?? 0;
64  return (int) (empty($conf->global->$key) ? 0 : $conf->global->$key);
65 }
66 
78 function getDoliDBInstance($type, $host, $user, $pass, $name, $port)
79 {
80  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT."/core/db/".$type.'.class.php';
81 
82  $class = 'DoliDB'.ucfirst($type);
83  $dolidb = new $class($type, $host, $user, $pass, $name, $port);
84  return $dolidb;
85 }
86 
104 function getEntity($element, $shared = 1, $currentobject = null)
105 {
106  global $conf, $mc;
107 
108  if (is_object($mc))
109  {
110  return $mc->getEntity($element, $shared, $currentobject);
111  }
112  else
113  {
114  $out = '';
115  $addzero = array('user', 'usergroup', 'c_email_templates', 'email_template', 'default_values');
116  if (in_array($element, $addzero)) $out .= '0,';
117  $out .= $conf->entity;
118  return $out;
119  }
120 }
121 
128 function setEntity($currentobject)
129 {
130  global $conf, $mc;
131 
132  if (is_object($mc) && method_exists($mc, 'setEntity'))
133  {
134  return $mc->setEntity($currentobject);
135  }
136  else
137  {
138  return ((is_object($currentobject) && $currentobject->id > 0 && $currentobject->entity > 0) ? $currentobject->entity : $conf->entity);
139  }
140 }
141 
158 function getBrowserInfo($user_agent)
159 {
160  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/includes/mobiledetect/mobiledetectlib/Mobile_Detect.php';
161 
162  $name = 'unknown';
163  $version = '';
164  $os = 'unknown';
165  $phone = '';
166 
167  $detectmobile = new Mobile_Detect(null, $user_agent);
168  $tablet = $detectmobile->isTablet();
169 
170  if ($detectmobile->isMobile()) {
171  $phone = 'unknown';
172 
173  // If phone/smartphone, we set phone os name.
174  if ($detectmobile->is('AndroidOS')) {
175  $os = $phone = 'android';
176  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('BlackBerryOS')) {
177  $os = $phone = 'blackberry';
178  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('iOS')) {
179  $os = 'ios';
180  $phone = 'iphone';
181  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('PalmOS')) {
182  $os = $phone = 'palm';
183  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('SymbianOS')) {
184  $os = 'symbian';
185  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('webOS')) {
186  $os = 'webos';
187  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('MaemoOS')) {
188  $os = 'maemo';
189  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('WindowsMobileOS') || $detectmobile->is('WindowsPhoneOS')) {
190  $os = 'windows';
191  }
192  }
193 
194  // OS
195  if (preg_match('/linux/i', $user_agent)) { $os = 'linux'; }
196  elseif (preg_match('/macintosh/i', $user_agent)) { $os = 'macintosh'; }
197  elseif (preg_match('/windows/i', $user_agent)) { $os = 'windows'; }
198 
199  // Name
200  if (preg_match('/firefox(\/|\s)([\d\.]*)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name = 'firefox'; $version = $reg[2]; }
201  elseif (preg_match('/edge(\/|\s)([\d\.]*)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name = 'edge'; $version = $reg[2]; }
202  elseif (preg_match('/chrome(\/|\s)([\d\.]+)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name = 'chrome'; $version = $reg[2]; } // we can have 'chrome (Mozilla...) chrome x.y' in one string
203  elseif (preg_match('/chrome/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name = 'chrome'; }
204  elseif (preg_match('/iceweasel/i', $user_agent)) { $name = 'iceweasel'; }
205  elseif (preg_match('/epiphany/i', $user_agent)) { $name = 'epiphany'; }
206  elseif (preg_match('/safari(\/|\s)([\d\.]*)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name = 'safari'; $version = $reg[2]; } // Safari is often present in string for mobile but its not.
207  elseif (preg_match('/opera(\/|\s)([\d\.]*)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name = 'opera'; $version = $reg[2]; }
208  elseif (preg_match('/(MSIE\s([0-9]+\.[0-9]))|.*(Trident\/[0-9]+.[0-9];.*rv:([0-9]+\.[0-9]+))/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name = 'ie'; $version = end($reg); } // MS products at end
209  elseif (preg_match('/(Windows NT\s([0-9]+\.[0-9])).*(Trident\/[0-9]+.[0-9];.*rv:([0-9]+\.[0-9]+))/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name = 'ie'; $version = end($reg); } // MS products at end
210  elseif (preg_match('/l(i|y)n(x|ks)(\(|\/|\s)*([\d\.]+)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name = 'lynxlinks'; $version = $reg[4]; }
211 
212  if ($tablet) {
213  $layout = 'tablet';
214  } elseif ($phone) {
215  $layout = 'phone';
216  } else {
217  $layout = 'classic';
218  }
219 
220  return array(
221  'browsername' => $name,
222  'browserversion' => $version,
223  'browseros' => $os,
224  'layout' => $layout,
225  'phone' => $phone,
226  'tablet' => $tablet
227  );
228 }
229 
235 function dol_shutdown()
236 {
237  global $conf, $user, $langs, $db;
238  $disconnectdone = false; $depth = 0;
239  if (is_object($db) && !empty($db->connected)) { $depth = $db->transaction_opened; $disconnectdone = $db->close(); }
240  dol_syslog("--- End access to ".$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].(($disconnectdone && $depth) ? ' (Warn: db disconnection forced, transaction depth was '.$depth.')' : ''), (($disconnectdone && $depth) ?LOG_WARNING:LOG_INFO));
241 }
242 
249 function GETPOSTISSET($paramname)
250 {
251  $isset = 0;
252 
253  $relativepathstring = $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"];
254  // Clean $relativepathstring
255  if (constant('DOL_URL_ROOT')) $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(constant('DOL_URL_ROOT'), '/').'/', '', $relativepathstring);
256  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^\//', '', $relativepathstring);
257  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^custom\//', '', $relativepathstring);
258  //var_dump($relativepathstring);
259  //var_dump($user->default_values);
260 
261  // Code for search criteria persistence.
262  // Retrieve values if restore_lastsearch_values
263  if (!empty($_GET['restore_lastsearch_values'])) // Use $_GET here and not GETPOST
264  {
265  if (!empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_values_'.$relativepathstring])) // If there is saved values
266  {
267  $tmp = json_decode($_SESSION['lastsearch_values_'.$relativepathstring], true);
268  if (is_array($tmp))
269  {
270  foreach ($tmp as $key => $val)
271  {
272  if ($key == $paramname) // We are on the requested parameter
273  {
274  $isset = 1;
275  break;
276  }
277  }
278  }
279  }
280  // If there is saved contextpage, page or limit
281  if ($paramname == 'contextpage' && !empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_contextpage_'.$relativepathstring]))
282  {
283  $isset = 1;
284  }
285  elseif ($paramname == 'page' && !empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_page_'.$relativepathstring]))
286  {
287  $isset = 1;
288  }
289  elseif ($paramname == 'limit' && !empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_limit_'.$relativepathstring]))
290  {
291  $isset = 1;
292  }
293  }
294  else {
295  $isset = (isset($_POST[$paramname]) || isset($_GET[$paramname]));
296  }
297 
298  return $isset;
299 }
300 
326 function GETPOST($paramname, $check = 'alphanohtml', $method = 0, $filter = null, $options = null, $noreplace = 0)
327 {
328  global $mysoc, $user, $conf;
329 
330  if (empty($paramname)) return 'BadFirstParameterForGETPOST';
331  if (empty($check))
332  {
333  dol_syslog("Deprecated use of GETPOST, called with 1st param = ".$paramname." and 2nd param is '', when calling page ".$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"], LOG_WARNING);
334  // Enable this line to know who call the GETPOST with '' $check parameter.
335  //var_dump(debug_backtrace()[0]);
336  }
337 
338  if (empty($method)) $out = isset($_GET[$paramname]) ? $_GET[$paramname] : (isset($_POST[$paramname]) ? $_POST[$paramname] : '');
339  elseif ($method == 1) $out = isset($_GET[$paramname]) ? $_GET[$paramname] : '';
340  elseif ($method == 2) $out = isset($_POST[$paramname]) ? $_POST[$paramname] : '';
341  elseif ($method == 3) $out = isset($_POST[$paramname]) ? $_POST[$paramname] : (isset($_GET[$paramname]) ? $_GET[$paramname] : '');
342  else return 'BadThirdParameterForGETPOST';
343 
344  if (empty($method) || $method == 3 || $method == 4)
345  {
346  $relativepathstring = $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"];
347  // Clean $relativepathstring
348  if (constant('DOL_URL_ROOT')) $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(constant('DOL_URL_ROOT'), '/').'/', '', $relativepathstring);
349  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^\//', '', $relativepathstring);
350  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^custom\//', '', $relativepathstring);
351  //var_dump($relativepathstring);
352  //var_dump($user->default_values);
353 
354  // Code for search criteria persistence.
355  // Retrieve values if restore_lastsearch_values
356  if (!empty($_GET['restore_lastsearch_values'])) // Use $_GET here and not GETPOST
357  {
358  if (!empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_values_'.$relativepathstring])) // If there is saved values
359  {
360  $tmp = json_decode($_SESSION['lastsearch_values_'.$relativepathstring], true);
361  if (is_array($tmp))
362  {
363  foreach ($tmp as $key => $val)
364  {
365  if ($key == $paramname) // We are on the requested parameter
366  {
367  $out = $val;
368  break;
369  }
370  }
371  }
372  }
373  // If there is saved contextpage, page or limit
374  if ($paramname == 'contextpage' && !empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_contextpage_'.$relativepathstring]))
375  {
376  $out = $_SESSION['lastsearch_contextpage_'.$relativepathstring];
377  }
378  elseif ($paramname == 'page' && !empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_page_'.$relativepathstring]))
379  {
380  $out = $_SESSION['lastsearch_page_'.$relativepathstring];
381  }
382  elseif ($paramname == 'limit' && !empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_limit_'.$relativepathstring]))
383  {
384  $out = $_SESSION['lastsearch_limit_'.$relativepathstring];
385  }
386  }
387  // Else, retreive default values if we are not doing a sort
388  elseif (!isset($_GET['sortfield'])) // If we did a click on a field to sort, we do no apply default values. Same if option MAIN_ENABLE_DEFAULT_VALUES is not set
389  {
390  if (!empty($_GET['action']) && $_GET['action'] == 'create' && !isset($_GET[$paramname]) && !isset($_POST[$paramname]))
391  {
392  // Search default value from $object->field
393  global $object;
394  if (is_object($object) && isset($object->fields[$paramname]['default']))
395  {
396  $out = $object->fields[$paramname]['default'];
397  }
398  }
399  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_ENABLE_DEFAULT_VALUES))
400  {
401  if (!empty($_GET['action']) && (preg_match('/^create/', $_GET['action']) || preg_match('/^presend/', $_GET['action'])) && !isset($_GET[$paramname]) && !isset($_POST[$paramname]))
402  {
403  // Now search in setup to overwrite default values
404  if (!empty($user->default_values)) // $user->default_values defined from menu 'Setup - Default values'
405  {
406  if (isset($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['createform']))
407  {
408  foreach ($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['createform'] as $defkey => $defval)
409  {
410  $qualified = 0;
411  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
412  {
413  $tmpqueryarraytohave = explode('&', $defkey);
414  $tmpqueryarraywehave = explode('&', dol_string_nohtmltag($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
415  $foundintru = 0;
416  foreach ($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
417  {
418  if (!in_array($tmpquerytohave, $tmpqueryarraywehave)) $foundintru = 1;
419  }
420  if (!$foundintru) $qualified = 1;
421  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
422  }
423  else $qualified = 1;
424 
425  if ($qualified)
426  {
427  //var_dump($user->default_values[$relativepathstring][$defkey]['createform']);
428  if (isset($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['createform'][$defkey][$paramname]))
429  {
430  $out = $user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['createform'][$defkey][$paramname];
431  break;
432  }
433  }
434  }
435  }
436  }
437  }
438  // Management of default search_filters and sort order
439  //elseif (preg_match('/list.php$/', $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"]) && ! empty($paramname) && ! isset($_GET[$paramname]) && ! isset($_POST[$paramname]))
440  elseif (!empty($paramname) && !isset($_GET[$paramname]) && !isset($_POST[$paramname]))
441  {
442  if (!empty($user->default_values)) // $user->default_values defined from menu 'Setup - Default values'
443  {
444  //var_dump($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]);
445  if ($paramname == 'sortfield' || $paramname == 'sortorder') // Sorted on which fields ? ASC or DESC ?
446  {
447  if (isset($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['sortorder'])) // Even if paramname is sortfield, data are stored into ['sortorder...']
448  {
449  foreach ($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['sortorder'] as $defkey => $defval)
450  {
451  $qualified = 0;
452  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
453  {
454  $tmpqueryarraytohave = explode('&', $defkey);
455  $tmpqueryarraywehave = explode('&', dol_string_nohtmltag($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
456  $foundintru = 0;
457  foreach ($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
458  {
459  if (!in_array($tmpquerytohave, $tmpqueryarraywehave)) $foundintru = 1;
460  }
461  if (!$foundintru) $qualified = 1;
462  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
463  }
464  else $qualified = 1;
465 
466  if ($qualified)
467  {
468  $forbidden_chars_to_replace = array(" ", "'", "/", "\\", ":", "*", "?", "\"", "<", ">", "|", "[", "]", ";", "="); // we accept _, -, . and ,
469  foreach ($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['sortorder'][$defkey] as $key => $val)
470  {
471  if ($out) $out .= ', ';
472  if ($paramname == 'sortfield')
473  {
474  $out .= dol_string_nospecial($key, '', $forbidden_chars_to_replace);
475  }
476  if ($paramname == 'sortorder')
477  {
478  $out .= dol_string_nospecial($val, '', $forbidden_chars_to_replace);
479  }
480  }
481  //break; // No break for sortfield and sortorder so we can cumulate fields (is it realy usefull ?)
482  }
483  }
484  }
485  }
486  elseif (isset($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters']))
487  {
488  foreach ($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters'] as $defkey => $defval) // $defkey is a querystring like 'a=b&c=d', $defval is key of user
489  {
490  $qualified = 0;
491  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
492  {
493  $tmpqueryarraytohave = explode('&', $defkey);
494  $tmpqueryarraywehave = explode('&', dol_string_nohtmltag($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
495  $foundintru = 0;
496  foreach ($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
497  {
498  if (!in_array($tmpquerytohave, $tmpqueryarraywehave)) $foundintru = 1;
499  }
500  if (!$foundintru) $qualified = 1;
501  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
502  }
503  else $qualified = 1;
504 
505  if ($qualified)
506  {
507  if (isset($_POST['sall']) || isset($_POST['search_all']) || isset($_GET['sall']) || isset($_GET['search_all']))
508  {
509  // We made a search from quick search menu, do we still use default filter ?
510  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_DEFAULT_FILTER_FOR_QUICK_SEARCH))
511  {
512  $forbidden_chars_to_replace = array(" ", "'", "/", "\\", ":", "*", "?", "\"", "<", ">", "|", "[", "]", ";", "="); // we accept _, -, . and ,
513  $out = dol_string_nospecial($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters'][$defkey][$paramname], '', $forbidden_chars_to_replace);
514  }
515  }
516  else
517  {
518  $forbidden_chars_to_replace = array(" ", "'", "/", "\\", ":", "*", "?", "\"", "<", ">", "|", "[", "]", ";", "="); // we accept _, -, . and ,
519  $out = dol_string_nospecial($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters'][$defkey][$paramname], '', $forbidden_chars_to_replace);
520  }
521  break;
522  }
523  }
524  }
525  }
526  }
527  }
528  }
529  }
530 
531  // Substitution variables for GETPOST (used to get final url with variable parameters or final default value with variable parameters)
532  // Example of variables: __DAY__, __MONTH__, __YEAR__, __MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY_ID__, __USER_ID__, ...
533  // We do this only if var is a GET. If it is a POST, may be we want to post the text with vars as the setup text.
534  if (!is_array($out) && empty($_POST[$paramname]) && empty($noreplace))
535  {
536  $reg = array();
537  $maxloop = 20; $loopnb = 0; // Protection against infinite loop
538  while (preg_match('/__([A-Z0-9]+_?[A-Z0-9]+)__/i', $out, $reg) && ($loopnb < $maxloop)) // Detect '__ABCDEF__' as key 'ABCDEF' and '__ABC_DEF__' as key 'ABC_DEF'. Detection is also correct when 2 vars are side by side.
539  {
540  $loopnb++; $newout = '';
541 
542  if ($reg[1] == 'DAY') { $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = $tmp['mday']; }
543  elseif ($reg[1] == 'MONTH') { $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = $tmp['mon']; }
544  elseif ($reg[1] == 'YEAR') { $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = $tmp['year']; }
545  elseif ($reg[1] == 'PREVIOUS_DAY') { $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $tmp2 = dol_get_prev_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']); $newout = $tmp2['day']; }
546  elseif ($reg[1] == 'PREVIOUS_MONTH') { $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $tmp2 = dol_get_prev_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']); $newout = $tmp2['month']; }
547  elseif ($reg[1] == 'PREVIOUS_YEAR') { $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = ($tmp['year'] - 1); }
548  elseif ($reg[1] == 'NEXT_DAY') { $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $tmp2 = dol_get_next_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']); $newout = $tmp2['day']; }
549  elseif ($reg[1] == 'NEXT_MONTH') { $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $tmp2 = dol_get_next_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']); $newout = $tmp2['month']; }
550  elseif ($reg[1] == 'NEXT_YEAR') { $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = ($tmp['year'] + 1); }
551  elseif ($reg[1] == 'MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY_ID' || $reg[1] == 'MYCOUNTRY_ID' || $reg[1] == 'MYCOUNTRYID')
552  {
553  $newout = $mysoc->country_id;
554  }
555  elseif ($reg[1] == 'USER_ID' || $reg[1] == 'USERID')
556  {
557  $newout = $user->id;
558  }
559  elseif ($reg[1] == 'USER_SUPERVISOR_ID' || $reg[1] == 'SUPERVISOR_ID' || $reg[1] == 'SUPERVISORID')
560  {
561  $newout = $user->fk_user;
562  }
563  elseif ($reg[1] == 'ENTITY_ID' || $reg[1] == 'ENTITYID')
564  {
565  $newout = $conf->entity;
566  }
567  else $newout = ''; // Key not found, we replace with empty string
568  //var_dump('__'.$reg[1].'__ -> '.$newout);
569  $out = preg_replace('/__'.preg_quote($reg[1], '/').'__/', $newout, $out);
570  }
571  }
572 
573  // Check is done after replacement
574  switch ($check)
575  {
576  case 'none':
577  break;
578  case 'int': // Check param is a numeric value (integer but also float or hexadecimal)
579  if (!is_numeric($out)) { $out = ''; }
580  break;
581  case 'intcomma':
582  if (preg_match('/[^0-9,-]+/i', $out)) $out = '';
583  break;
584  case 'alpha':
585  if (!is_array($out))
586  {
587  // '"' is dangerous because param in url can close the href= or src= and add javascript functions.
588  // '../' is dangerous because it allows dir transversals
589  $out = str_replace(array('"', '../'), '', trim($out));
590  }
591  break;
592  case 'san_alpha':
593  $out = filter_var($out, FILTER_SANITIZE_STRING);
594  break;
595  case 'aZ':
596  if (!is_array($out))
597  {
598  $out = trim($out);
599  if (preg_match('/[^a-z]+/i', $out)) $out = '';
600  }
601  break;
602  case 'aZ09':
603  if (!is_array($out))
604  {
605  $out = trim($out);
606  if (preg_match('/[^a-z0-9_\-\.]+/i', $out)) $out = '';
607  }
608  break;
609  case 'aZ09comma': // great to sanitize sortfield or sortorder params that can be t.abc,t.def_gh
610  if (!is_array($out))
611  {
612  $out = trim($out);
613  if (preg_match('/[^a-z0-9_\-\.,]+/i', $out)) $out = '';
614  }
615  break;
616  case 'array':
617  if (!is_array($out) || empty($out)) $out = array();
618  break;
619  case 'nohtml':
620  $out = dol_string_nohtmltag($out, 0);
621  break;
622  case 'alphanohtml': // Recommended for most scalar parameters and search parameters
623  if (!is_array($out))
624  {
625  // '"' is dangerous because param in url can close the href= or src= and add javascript functions.
626  // '../' is dangerous because it allows dir transversals
627  $out = str_replace(array('"', '../'), '', trim($out));
628  $out = dol_string_nohtmltag($out, 0);
629  }
630  break;
631  case 'restricthtml': // Recommended for most html textarea
632  $out = dol_string_onlythesehtmltags($out, 0);
633  break;
634  case 'custom':
635  if (empty($filter)) return 'BadFourthParameterForGETPOST';
636  $out = filter_var($out, $filter, $options);
637  break;
638  }
639 
640  // Code for search criteria persistence.
641  // Save data into session if key start with 'search_' or is 'smonth', 'syear', 'month', 'year'
642  if (empty($method) || $method == 3 || $method == 4)
643  {
644  if (preg_match('/^search_/', $paramname) || in_array($paramname, array('sortorder', 'sortfield')))
645  {
646  //var_dump($paramname.' - '.$out.' '.$user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters'][$paramname]);
647 
648  // We save search key only if $out not empty that means:
649  // - posted value not empty, or
650  // - if posted value is empty and a default value exists that is not empty (it means we did a filter to an empty value when default was not).
651 
652  if ($out != '') // $out = '0' or 'abc', it is a search criteria to keep
653  {
654  $user->lastsearch_values_tmp[$relativepathstring][$paramname] = $out;
655  }
656  }
657  }
658 
659  return $out;
660 }
661 
662 
663 if (!function_exists('dol_getprefix'))
664 {
673  function dol_getprefix($mode = '')
674  {
675  global $conf;
676 
677  // If prefix is for email
678  if ($mode == 'email')
679  {
680  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIL_PREFIX_FOR_EMAIL_ID)) // If MAIL_PREFIX_FOR_EMAIL_ID is set (a value initialized with a random value is recommended)
681  {
682  if ($conf->global->MAIL_PREFIX_FOR_EMAIL_ID != 'SERVER_NAME') return $conf->global->MAIL_PREFIX_FOR_EMAIL_ID;
683  elseif (isset($_SERVER["SERVER_NAME"])) return $_SERVER["SERVER_NAME"];
684  }
685 
686  // The recommended value (may be not defined for old versions)
687  if (!empty($conf->file->instance_unique_id)) return $conf->file->instance_unique_id;
688 
689  // For backward compatibility
690  return dol_hash(DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.DOL_URL_ROOT, '3');
691  }
692 
693  // The recommended value (may be not defined for old versions)
694  if (!empty($conf->file->instance_unique_id)) return $conf->file->instance_unique_id;
695 
696  // For backward compatibility
697  if (isset($_SERVER["SERVER_NAME"]) && isset($_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"]))
698  {
699  return dol_hash($_SERVER["SERVER_NAME"].$_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"].DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.DOL_URL_ROOT, '3');
700  }
701 
702  return dol_hash(DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.DOL_URL_ROOT, '3');
703  }
704 }
705 
716 function dol_include_once($relpath, $classname = '')
717 {
718  global $conf, $langs, $user, $mysoc; // Do not remove this. They must be defined for files we include. Other globals var must be retreived with $GLOBALS['var']
719 
720  $fullpath = dol_buildpath($relpath);
721 
722  if (!file_exists($fullpath)) {
723  dol_syslog('functions::dol_include_once Tried to load unexisting file: '.$relpath, LOG_WARNING);
724  return false;
725  }
726 
727  if (!empty($classname) && !class_exists($classname)) {
728  return include $fullpath;
729  } else {
730  return include_once $fullpath;
731  }
732 }
733 
734 
745 function dol_buildpath($path, $type = 0, $returnemptyifnotfound = 0)
746 {
747  global $conf;
748 
749  $path = preg_replace('/^\//', '', $path);
750 
751  if (empty($type)) // For a filesystem path
752  {
753  $res = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/'.$path; // Standard default path
754  if (is_array($conf->file->dol_document_root))
755  {
756  foreach ($conf->file->dol_document_root as $key => $dirroot) // ex: array("main"=>"/home/main/htdocs", "alt0"=>"/home/dirmod/htdocs", ...)
757  {
758  if ($key == 'main')
759  {
760  continue;
761  }
762  if (file_exists($dirroot.'/'.$path))
763  {
764  $res = $dirroot.'/'.$path;
765  return $res;
766  }
767  }
768  }
769  if ($returnemptyifnotfound) // Not found into alternate dir
770  {
771  if ($returnemptyifnotfound == 1 || !file_exists($res)) return '';
772  }
773  }
774  else // For an url path
775  {
776  // We try to get local path of file on filesystem from url
777  // Note that trying to know if a file on disk exist by forging path on disk from url
778  // works only for some web server and some setup. This is bugged when
779  // using proxy, rewriting, virtual path, etc...
780  $res = '';
781  if ($type == 1) $res = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/'.$path; // Standard value
782  if ($type == 2) $res = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT.'/'.$path; // Standard value
783  if ($type == 3) $res = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/'.$path;
784 
785  foreach ($conf->file->dol_document_root as $key => $dirroot) // ex: array(["main"]=>"/home/main/htdocs", ["alt0"]=>"/home/dirmod/htdocs", ...)
786  {
787  if ($key == 'main')
788  {
789  if ($type == 3)
790  {
791  global $dolibarr_main_url_root;
792 
793  // Define $urlwithroot
794  $urlwithouturlroot = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote(DOL_URL_ROOT, '/').'$/i', '', trim($dolibarr_main_url_root));
795  $urlwithroot = $urlwithouturlroot.DOL_URL_ROOT; // This is to use external domain name found into config file
796  //$urlwithroot=DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT; // This is to use same domain name than current
797 
798  $res = (preg_match('/^http/i', $conf->file->dol_url_root[$key]) ? '' : $urlwithroot).'/'.$path; // Test on start with http is for old conf syntax
799  }
800  continue;
801  }
802  preg_match('/^([^\?]+(\.css\.php|\.css|\.js\.php|\.js|\.png|\.jpg|\.php)?)/i', $path, $regs); // Take part before '?'
803  if (!empty($regs[1]))
804  {
805  //print $key.'-'.$dirroot.'/'.$path.'-'.$conf->file->dol_url_root[$type].'<br>'."\n";
806  if (file_exists($dirroot.'/'.$regs[1]))
807  {
808  if ($type == 1)
809  {
810  $res = (preg_match('/^http/i', $conf->file->dol_url_root[$key]) ? '' : DOL_URL_ROOT).$conf->file->dol_url_root[$key].'/'.$path;
811  }
812  if ($type == 2)
813  {
814  $res = (preg_match('/^http/i', $conf->file->dol_url_root[$key]) ? '' : DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT).$conf->file->dol_url_root[$key].'/'.$path;
815  }
816  if ($type == 3)
817  {
818  global $dolibarr_main_url_root;
819 
820  // Define $urlwithroot
821  $urlwithouturlroot = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote(DOL_URL_ROOT, '/').'$/i', '', trim($dolibarr_main_url_root));
822  $urlwithroot = $urlwithouturlroot.DOL_URL_ROOT; // This is to use external domain name found into config file
823  //$urlwithroot=DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT; // This is to use same domain name than current
824 
825  $res = (preg_match('/^http/i', $conf->file->dol_url_root[$key]) ? '' : $urlwithroot).$conf->file->dol_url_root[$key].'/'.$path; // Test on start with http is for old conf syntax
826  }
827  break;
828  }
829  }
830  }
831  }
832 
833  return $res;
834 }
835 
846 function dol_clone($object, $native = 0)
847 {
848  if (empty($native))
849  {
850  $myclone = unserialize(serialize($object));
851  }
852  else
853  {
854  $myclone = clone $object; // PHP clone is a shallow copy only, not a real clone, so properties of references will keep references (refer to the same target/variable)
855  }
856 
857  return $myclone;
858 }
859 
869 function dol_size($size, $type = '')
870 {
871  global $conf;
872  if (empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) return $size;
873  if ($type == 'width' && $size > 250) return 250;
874  else return 10;
875 }
876 
877 
888 function dol_sanitizeFileName($str, $newstr = '_', $unaccent = 1)
889 {
890  // List of special chars for filenames in windows are defined on page https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/fileio/naming-a-file
891  // Char '>' '<' '|' '$' and ';' are special chars for shells.
892  // Char '/' and '\' are file delimiters.
893  // -- car can be used into filename to inject special paramaters like --use-compress-program to make command with file as parameter making remote execution of command
894  $filesystem_forbidden_chars = array('<', '>', '/', '\\', '?', '*', '|', '"', ':', '°', '$', ';', '--');
895  return dol_string_nospecial($unaccent ? dol_string_unaccent($str) : $str, $newstr, $filesystem_forbidden_chars);
896 }
897 
908 function dol_sanitizePathName($str, $newstr = '_', $unaccent = 1)
909 {
910  $filesystem_forbidden_chars = array('<', '>', '?', '*', '|', '"', '°');
911  return dol_string_nospecial($unaccent ? dol_string_unaccent($str) : $str, $newstr, $filesystem_forbidden_chars);
912 }
913 
922 function dol_string_unaccent($str)
923 {
924  if (utf8_check($str))
925  {
926  // See http://www.utf8-chartable.de/
927  $string = rawurlencode($str);
928  $replacements = array(
929  '%C3%80' => 'A', '%C3%81' => 'A', '%C3%82' => 'A', '%C3%83' => 'A', '%C3%84' => 'A', '%C3%85' => 'A',
930  '%C3%88' => 'E', '%C3%89' => 'E', '%C3%8A' => 'E', '%C3%8B' => 'E',
931  '%C3%8C' => 'I', '%C3%8D' => 'I', '%C3%8E' => 'I', '%C3%8F' => 'I',
932  '%C3%92' => 'O', '%C3%93' => 'O', '%C3%94' => 'O', '%C3%95' => 'O', '%C3%96' => 'O',
933  '%C3%99' => 'U', '%C3%9A' => 'U', '%C3%9B' => 'U', '%C3%9C' => 'U',
934  '%C3%A0' => 'a', '%C3%A1' => 'a', '%C3%A2' => 'a', '%C3%A3' => 'a', '%C3%A4' => 'a', '%C3%A5' => 'a',
935  '%C3%A7' => 'c',
936  '%C3%A8' => 'e', '%C3%A9' => 'e', '%C3%AA' => 'e', '%C3%AB' => 'e',
937  '%C3%AC' => 'i', '%C3%AD' => 'i', '%C3%AE' => 'i', '%C3%AF' => 'i',
938  '%C3%B1' => 'n',
939  '%C3%B2' => 'o', '%C3%B3' => 'o', '%C3%B4' => 'o', '%C3%B5' => 'o', '%C3%B6' => 'o',
940  '%C3%B9' => 'u', '%C3%BA' => 'u', '%C3%BB' => 'u', '%C3%BC' => 'u',
941  '%C3%BF' => 'y'
942  );
943  $string = strtr($string, $replacements);
944  return rawurldecode($string);
945  }
946  else
947  {
948  // See http://www.ascii-code.com/
949  $string = strtr(
950  $str,
951  "\xC0\xC1\xC2\xC3\xC4\xC5\xC7
952  \xC8\xC9\xCA\xCB\xCC\xCD\xCE\xCF\xD0\xD1
953  \xD2\xD3\xD4\xD5\xD8\xD9\xDA\xDB\xDD
954  \xE0\xE1\xE2\xE3\xE4\xE5\xE7\xE8\xE9\xEA\xEB
955  \xEC\xED\xEE\xEF\xF0\xF1\xF2\xF3\xF4\xF5\xF8
956  \xF9\xFA\xFB\xFC\xFD\xFF",
957  "AAAAAAC
958  EEEEIIIIDN
959  OOOOOUUUY
960  aaaaaaceeee
961  iiiidnooooo
962  uuuuyy"
963  );
964  $string = strtr($string, array("\xC4"=>"Ae", "\xC6"=>"AE", "\xD6"=>"Oe", "\xDC"=>"Ue", "\xDE"=>"TH", "\xDF"=>"ss", "\xE4"=>"ae", "\xE6"=>"ae", "\xF6"=>"oe", "\xFC"=>"ue", "\xFE"=>"th"));
965  return $string;
966  }
967 }
968 
980 function dol_string_nospecial($str, $newstr = '_', $badcharstoreplace = '')
981 {
982  $forbidden_chars_to_replace = array(" ", "'", "/", "\\", ":", "*", "?", "\"", "<", ">", "|", "[", "]", ",", ";", "=", '°'); // more complete than dol_sanitizeFileName
983  $forbidden_chars_to_remove = array();
984  if (is_array($badcharstoreplace)) $forbidden_chars_to_replace = $badcharstoreplace;
985  //$forbidden_chars_to_remove=array("(",")");
986 
987  return str_replace($forbidden_chars_to_replace, $newstr, str_replace($forbidden_chars_to_remove, "", $str));
988 }
989 
990 
999 function dol_escape_js($stringtoescape, $mode = 0, $noescapebackslashn = 0)
1000 {
1001  // escape quotes and backslashes, newlines, etc.
1002  $substitjs = array("&#039;"=>"\\'", "\r"=>'\\r');
1003  //$substitjs['</']='<\/'; // We removed this. Should be useless.
1004  if (empty($noescapebackslashn)) { $substitjs["\n"] = '\\n'; $substitjs['\\'] = '\\\\'; }
1005  if (empty($mode)) { $substitjs["'"] = "\\'"; $substitjs['"'] = "\\'"; }
1006  elseif ($mode == 1) $substitjs["'"] = "\\'";
1007  elseif ($mode == 2) { $substitjs['"'] = '\\"'; }
1008  elseif ($mode == 3) { $substitjs["'"] = "\\'"; $substitjs['"'] = "\\\""; }
1009  return strtr($stringtoescape, $substitjs);
1010 }
1011 
1018 function dol_escape_json($stringtoescape)
1019 {
1020  return str_replace('"', '\"', $stringtoescape);
1021 }
1022 
1034 function dol_escape_htmltag($stringtoescape, $keepb = 0, $keepn = 0, $keepmoretags = '', $escapeonlyhtmltags = 0)
1035 {
1036  if ($keepmoretags == 'common') $keepmoretags = 'html,body,a,em,i,u,ul,li,br,div,img,font,p,span,strong,table,tr,td,th,tbody';
1037  // TODO Implement $keepmoretags
1038 
1039  // escape quotes and backslashes, newlines, etc.
1040  if ($escapeonlyhtmltags) {
1041  $tmp = htmlspecialchars_decode($stringtoescape, ENT_COMPAT);
1042  } else {
1043  $tmp = html_entity_decode($stringtoescape, ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8');
1044  }
1045  if (!$keepb) $tmp = strtr($tmp, array("<b>"=>'', '</b>'=>''));
1046  if (!$keepn) $tmp = strtr($tmp, array("\r"=>'\\r', "\n"=>'\\n'));
1047  if ($escapeonlyhtmltags) {
1048  return htmlspecialchars($tmp, ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8');
1049  } else {
1050  return htmlentities($tmp, ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8');
1051  }
1052 }
1053 
1054 
1061 function dol_strtolower($utf8_string)
1062 {
1063  return mb_strtolower($utf8_string, "UTF-8");
1064 }
1065 
1072 function dol_strtoupper($utf8_string)
1073 {
1074  return mb_strtoupper($utf8_string, "UTF-8");
1075 }
1076 
1077 
1099 function dol_syslog($message, $level = LOG_INFO, $ident = 0, $suffixinfilename = '', $restricttologhandler = '', $logcontext = null)
1100 {
1101  global $conf, $user, $debugbar;
1102 
1103  // If syslog module enabled
1104  if (empty($conf->syslog->enabled)) return;
1105 
1106  // Check if we are into execution of code of a website
1107  if (defined('USEEXTERNALSERVER') && ! defined('USEDOLIBARRSERVER') && ! defined('USEDOLIBARREDITOR')) {
1108  global $website, $websitekey;
1109  if (is_object($website) && ! empty($website->ref)) $suffixinfilename.='_website_'.$website->ref;
1110  elseif (! empty($websitekey)) $suffixinfilename.='_website_'.$websitekey;
1111  }
1112 
1113  if ($ident < 0)
1114  {
1115  foreach ($conf->loghandlers as $loghandlerinstance)
1116  {
1117  $loghandlerinstance->setIdent($ident);
1118  }
1119  }
1120 
1121  if (!empty($message))
1122  {
1123  // Test log level
1124  $logLevels = array(LOG_EMERG=>'EMERG', LOG_ALERT=>'ALERT', LOG_CRIT=>'CRITICAL', LOG_ERR=>'ERR', LOG_WARNING=>'WARN', LOG_NOTICE=>'NOTICE', LOG_INFO=>'INFO', LOG_DEBUG=>'DEBUG');
1125  if (!array_key_exists($level, $logLevels))
1126  {
1127  throw new Exception('Incorrect log level');
1128  }
1129  if ($level > $conf->global->SYSLOG_LEVEL) return;
1130 
1131  $message = preg_replace('/password=\'[^\']*\'/', 'password=\'hidden\'', $message); // protection to avoid to have value of password in log
1132 
1133  // If adding log inside HTML page is required
1134  if ((!empty($_REQUEST['logtohtml']) && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_ENABLE_LOG_TO_HTML))
1135  || (!empty($user->rights->debugbar->read) && is_object($debugbar)))
1136  {
1137  $conf->logbuffer[] = dol_print_date(time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")." ".$logLevels[$level]." ".$message;
1138  }
1139 
1140  //TODO: Remove this. MAIN_ENABLE_LOG_INLINE_HTML should be deprecated and use a log handler dedicated to HTML output
1141  // If html log tag enabled and url parameter log defined, we show output log on HTML comments
1142  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_ENABLE_LOG_INLINE_HTML) && !empty($_GET["log"]))
1143  {
1144  print "\n\n<!-- Log start\n";
1145  print $message."\n";
1146  print "Log end -->\n";
1147  }
1148 
1149  $data = array(
1150  'message' => $message,
1151  'script' => (isset($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) ? basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'], '.php') : false),
1152  'level' => $level,
1153  'user' => ((is_object($user) && $user->id) ? $user->login : false),
1154  'ip' => false
1155  );
1156 
1157  $remoteip = getUserRemoteIP(); // Get ip when page run on a web server
1158  if (!empty($remoteip)) {
1159  $data['ip'] = $remoteip;
1160  // This is when server run behind a reverse proxy
1161  if (!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR']) && $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'] != $remoteip) $data['ip'] = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'].' -> '.$data['ip'];
1162  elseif (!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP']) && $_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP'] != $remoteip) $data['ip'] = $_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP'].' -> '.$data['ip'];
1163  }
1164  // This is when PHP session is ran inside a web server but not inside a client request (example: init code of apache)
1165  elseif (!empty($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'])) $data['ip'] = $_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'];
1166  // This is when PHP session is ran outside a web server, like from Windows command line (Not always defined, but useful if OS defined it).
1167  elseif (!empty($_SERVER['COMPUTERNAME'])) $data['ip'] = $_SERVER['COMPUTERNAME'].(empty($_SERVER['USERNAME']) ? '' : '@'.$_SERVER['USERNAME']);
1168  // This is when PHP session is ran outside a web server, like from Linux command line (Not always defined, but usefull if OS defined it).
1169  elseif (!empty($_SERVER['LOGNAME'])) $data['ip'] = '???@'.$_SERVER['LOGNAME'];
1170  // Loop on each log handler and send output
1171  foreach ($conf->loghandlers as $loghandlerinstance)
1172  {
1173  if ($restricttologhandler && $loghandlerinstance->code != $restricttologhandler) continue;
1174  $loghandlerinstance->export($data, $suffixinfilename);
1175  }
1176  unset($data);
1177  }
1178 
1179  if ($ident > 0)
1180  {
1181  foreach ($conf->loghandlers as $loghandlerinstance)
1182  {
1183  $loghandlerinstance->setIdent($ident);
1184  }
1185  }
1186 }
1187 
1188 
1203 function dol_fiche_head($links = array(), $active = '0', $title = '', $notab = 0, $picto = '', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $morehtmlright = '', $morecss = '', $limittoshow = 0)
1204 {
1205  print dol_get_fiche_head($links, $active, $title, $notab, $picto, $pictoisfullpath, $morehtmlright, $morecss, $limittoshow);
1206 }
1207 
1222 function dol_get_fiche_head($links = array(), $active = '', $title = '', $notab = 0, $picto = '', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $morehtmlright = '', $morecss = '', $limittoshow = 0)
1223 {
1224  global $conf, $langs, $hookmanager;
1225 
1226  // Show title
1227  $showtitle = 1;
1228  if (!empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $showtitle = 0;
1229 
1230  $out = "\n".'<!-- dol_get_fiche_head -->';
1231 
1232  if ((!empty($title) && $showtitle) || $morehtmlright || !empty($links)) {
1233  $out .= '<div class="tabs'.($picto ? '' : ' nopaddingleft').'" data-role="controlgroup" data-type="horizontal">'."\n";
1234  }
1235 
1236  // Show right part
1237  if ($morehtmlright) $out .= '<div class="inline-block floatright tabsElem">'.$morehtmlright.'</div>'; // Output right area first so when space is missing, text is in front of tabs and not under.
1238 
1239  // Show title
1240  if (!empty($title) && $showtitle && empty($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZEFORTEXTBROWSER))
1241  {
1242  $limittitle = 30;
1243  $out .= '<a class="tabTitle">';
1244  if ($picto) $out .= img_picto($title, ($pictoisfullpath ? '' : 'object_').$picto, '', $pictoisfullpath, 0, 0, '', 'imgTabTitle').' ';
1245  $out .= '<span class="tabTitleText">'.dol_trunc($title, $limittitle).'</span>';
1246  $out .= '</a>';
1247  }
1248 
1249  // Show tabs
1250 
1251  // Define max of key (max may be higher than sizeof because of hole due to module disabling some tabs).
1252  $maxkey = -1;
1253  if (is_array($links) && !empty($links))
1254  {
1255  $keys = array_keys($links);
1256  if (count($keys)) $maxkey = max($keys);
1257  }
1258 
1259  // Show tabs
1260  // if =0 we don't use the feature
1261  if (empty($limittoshow)) {
1262  $limittoshow = (empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAXTABS_IN_CARD) ? 99 : $conf->global->MAIN_MAXTABS_IN_CARD);
1263  }
1264  if (!empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $limittoshow = 2;
1265 
1266  $displaytab = 0;
1267  $nbintab = 0;
1268  $popuptab = 0;
1269  $outmore = '';
1270  for ($i = 0; $i <= $maxkey; $i++)
1271  {
1272  if ((is_numeric($active) && $i == $active) || (!empty($links[$i][2]) && !is_numeric($active) && $active == $links[$i][2])) {
1273  // If active tab is already present
1274  if ($i >= $limittoshow) $limittoshow--;
1275  }
1276  }
1277 
1278  for ($i = 0; $i <= $maxkey; $i++)
1279  {
1280  if ((is_numeric($active) && $i == $active) || (!empty($links[$i][2]) && !is_numeric($active) && $active == $links[$i][2])) {
1281  $isactive = true;
1282  }
1283  else {
1284  $isactive = false;
1285  }
1286 
1287  if ($i < $limittoshow || $isactive)
1288  {
1289  $out .= '<div class="inline-block tabsElem'.($isactive ? ' tabsElemActive' : '').((!$isactive && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_HIDE_INACTIVETAB_ON_PRINT)) ? ' hideonprint' : '').'"><!-- id tab = '.(empty($links[$i][2]) ? '' : $links[$i][2]).' -->';
1290  if (isset($links[$i][2]) && $links[$i][2] == 'image')
1291  {
1292  if (!empty($links[$i][0]))
1293  {
1294  $out .= '<a class="tabimage'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">'.$links[$i][1].'</a>'."\n";
1295  }
1296  else
1297  {
1298  $out .= '<span class="tabspan">'.$links[$i][1].'</span>'."\n";
1299  }
1300  }
1301  elseif (!empty($links[$i][1]))
1302  {
1303  //print "x $i $active ".$links[$i][2]." z";
1304  if ($isactive)
1305  {
1306  $out .= '<a'.(!empty($links[$i][2]) ? ' id="'.$links[$i][2].'"' : '').' class="tabactive tab inline-block'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">';
1307  $out .= $links[$i][1];
1308  $out .= '</a>'."\n";
1309  }
1310  else
1311  {
1312  $out .= '<a'.(!empty($links[$i][2]) ? ' id="'.$links[$i][2].'"' : '').' class="tabunactive tab inline-block'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">';
1313  $out .= $links[$i][1];
1314  $out .= '</a>'."\n";
1315  }
1316  }
1317  $out .= '</div>';
1318  }
1319  else
1320  {
1321  // The popup with the other tabs
1322  if (!$popuptab)
1323  {
1324  $popuptab = 1;
1325  $outmore .= '<div class="popuptabset wordwrap">'; // The css used to hide/show popup
1326  }
1327  $outmore .= '<div class="popuptab wordwrap" style="display:inherit;">';
1328  if (isset($links[$i][2]) && $links[$i][2] == 'image')
1329  {
1330  if (!empty($links[$i][0]))
1331  $outmore .= '<a class="tabimage'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">'.$links[$i][1].'</a>'."\n";
1332  else
1333  $outmore .= '<span class="tabspan">'.$links[$i][1].'</span>'."\n";
1334  }
1335  elseif (!empty($links[$i][1]))
1336  {
1337  $outmore .= '<a'.(!empty($links[$i][2]) ? ' id="'.$links[$i][2].'"' : '').' class="wordwrap inline-block'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">';
1338  $outmore .= preg_replace('/([a-z])\/([a-z])/i', '\\1 / \\2', $links[$i][1]); // Replace x/y with x / y to allow wrap on long composed texts.
1339  $outmore .= '</a>'."\n";
1340  }
1341  $outmore .= '</div>';
1342 
1343  $nbintab++;
1344  }
1345  $displaytab = $i;
1346  }
1347  if ($popuptab) $outmore .= '</div>';
1348 
1349  if ($popuptab) // If there is some tabs not shown
1350  {
1351  $left = ($langs->trans("DIRECTION") == 'rtl' ? 'right' : 'left');
1352  $right = ($langs->trans("DIRECTION") == 'rtl' ? 'left' : 'right');
1353 
1354  $tabsname = str_replace("@", "", $picto);
1355  $out .= '<div id="moretabs'.$tabsname.'" class="inline-block tabsElem">';
1356  $out .= '<a href="#" class="tab moretab inline-block tabunactive reposition">'.$langs->trans("More").'... ('.$nbintab.')</a>';
1357  $out .= '<div id="moretabsList'.$tabsname.'" style="position: absolute; '.$left.': -999em; text-align: '.$left.'; margin:0px; padding:2px; z-index:10;">';
1358  $out .= $outmore;
1359  $out .= '</div>';
1360  $out .= '<div></div>';
1361  $out .= "</div>\n";
1362 
1363  $out .= "<script>";
1364  $out .= "$('#moretabs".$tabsname."').mouseenter( function() { console.log('mouseenter ".$left."'); $('#moretabsList".$tabsname."').css('".$left."','auto');});";
1365  $out .= "$('#moretabs".$tabsname."').mouseleave( function() { console.log('mouseleave ".$left."'); $('#moretabsList".$tabsname."').css('".$left."','-999em');});";
1366  $out .= "</script>";
1367  }
1368 
1369  if ((!empty($title) && $showtitle) || $morehtmlright || !empty($links)) {
1370  $out .= "</div>\n";
1371  }
1372 
1373  if (!$notab || $notab == -1 || $notab == -2) $out .= "\n".'<div class="tabBar'.($notab == -1 ? '' : ($notab == -2 ? ' tabBarNoTop' : ' tabBarWithBottom')).'">'."\n";
1374 
1375  $parameters = array('tabname' => $active, 'out' => $out);
1376  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printTabsHead', $parameters); // This hook usage is called just before output the head of tabs. Take also a look at "completeTabsHead"
1377  if ($reshook > 0)
1378  {
1379  $out = $hookmanager->resPrint;
1380  }
1381 
1382  return $out;
1383 }
1384 
1391 function dol_fiche_end($notab = 0)
1392 {
1393  print dol_get_fiche_end($notab);
1394 }
1395 
1402 function dol_get_fiche_end($notab = 0)
1403 {
1404  if (!$notab || $notab == -1) return "\n</div>\n";
1405  else return '';
1406 }
1407 
1427 function dol_banner_tab($object, $paramid, $morehtml = '', $shownav = 1, $fieldid = 'rowid', $fieldref = 'ref', $morehtmlref = '', $moreparam = '', $nodbprefix = 0, $morehtmlleft = '', $morehtmlstatus = '', $onlybanner = 0, $morehtmlright = '')
1428 {
1429  global $conf, $form, $user, $langs;
1430 
1431  $error = 0;
1432 
1433  $maxvisiblephotos = 1;
1434  $showimage = 1;
1435  $entity = (empty($object->entity) ? $conf->entity : $object->entity);
1436  $showbarcode = empty($conf->barcode->enabled) ? 0 : ($object->barcode ? 1 : 0);
1437  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_ADVANCED_PERMS) && empty($user->rights->barcode->lire_advance)) $showbarcode = 0;
1438  $modulepart = 'unknown';
1439 
1440  if ($object->element == 'societe') $modulepart = 'societe';
1441  if ($object->element == 'contact') $modulepart = 'contact';
1442  if ($object->element == 'member') $modulepart = 'memberphoto';
1443  if ($object->element == 'user') $modulepart = 'userphoto';
1444  if ($object->element == 'product') $modulepart = 'product';
1445  if ($object->element == 'ticket') $modulepart = 'ticket';
1446 
1447  if (class_exists("Imagick"))
1448  {
1449  if ($object->element == 'propal') $modulepart = 'propal';
1450  if ($object->element == 'commande') $modulepart = 'commande';
1451  if ($object->element == 'facture') $modulepart = 'facture';
1452  if ($object->element == 'fichinter') $modulepart = 'ficheinter';
1453  if ($object->element == 'contrat') $modulepart = 'contract';
1454  if ($object->element == 'supplier_proposal') $modulepart = 'supplier_proposal';
1455  if ($object->element == 'order_supplier') $modulepart = 'supplier_order';
1456  if ($object->element == 'invoice_supplier') $modulepart = 'supplier_invoice';
1457  if ($object->element == 'expensereport') $modulepart = 'expensereport';
1458  }
1459 
1460  if ($object->element == 'product')
1461  {
1462  $width = 80; $cssclass = 'photoref';
1463  $showimage = $object->is_photo_available($conf->product->multidir_output[$entity]);
1464  $maxvisiblephotos = (isset($conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_VISIBLE_PHOTO) ? $conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_VISIBLE_PHOTO : 5);
1465  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') $maxvisiblephotos = 1;
1466  if ($showimage) $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">'.$object->show_photos('product', $conf->product->multidir_output[$entity], 'small', $maxvisiblephotos, 0, 0, 0, $width, 0).'</div>';
1467  else
1468  {
1469  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_NODISPLAYIFNOPHOTO)) {
1470  $nophoto = '';
1471  $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"></div>';
1472  }
1473  else { // Show no photo link
1474  $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/nophoto.png';
1475  $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"><img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').'" alt="No photo"'.($width ? ' style="width: '.$width.'px"' : '').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.$nophoto.'"></div>';
1476  }
1477  }
1478  }
1479  elseif ($object->element == 'ticket')
1480  {
1481  $width = 80; $cssclass = 'photoref';
1482  $showimage = $object->is_photo_available($conf->ticket->multidir_output[$entity].'/'.$object->ref);
1483  $maxvisiblephotos = (isset($conf->global->TICKET_MAX_VISIBLE_PHOTO) ? $conf->global->TICKET_MAX_VISIBLE_PHOTO : 2);
1484  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') $maxvisiblephotos = 1;
1485  if ($showimage)
1486  {
1487  $showphoto = $object->show_photos('ticket', $conf->ticket->multidir_output[$entity], 'small', $maxvisiblephotos, 0, 0, 0, $width, 0);
1488  if ($object->nbphoto > 0)
1489  {
1490  $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">'.$showphoto.'</div>';
1491  }
1492  else
1493  {
1494  $showimage = 0;
1495  }
1496  }
1497  if (!$showimage)
1498  {
1499  if (!empty($conf->global->TICKET_NODISPLAYIFNOPHOTO)) {
1500  $nophoto = '';
1501  $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"></div>';
1502  }
1503  else { // Show no photo link
1504  $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/nophoto.png';
1505  $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"><img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').'" alt="No photo" border="0"'.($width ? ' style="width: '.$width.'px"' : '').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.$nophoto.'"></div>';
1506  }
1507  }
1508  }
1509  else
1510  {
1511  if ($showimage)
1512  {
1513  if ($modulepart != 'unknown')
1514  {
1515  $phototoshow = '';
1516  // Check if a preview file is available
1517  if (in_array($modulepart, array('propal', 'commande', 'facture', 'ficheinter', 'contract', 'supplier_order', 'supplier_proposal', 'supplier_invoice', 'expensereport')) && class_exists("Imagick"))
1518  {
1519  $objectref = dol_sanitizeFileName($object->ref);
1520  $dir_output = (empty($conf->$modulepart->multidir_output[$entity]) ? $conf->$modulepart->dir_output : $conf->$modulepart->multidir_output[$entity])."/";
1521  if (in_array($modulepart, array('invoice_supplier', 'supplier_invoice')))
1522  {
1523  $subdir = get_exdir($object->id, 2, 0, 1, $object, $modulepart);
1524  $subdir .= ((!empty($subdir) && !preg_match('/\/$/', $subdir)) ? '/' : '').$objectref; // the objectref dir is not included into get_exdir when used with level=2, so we add it at end
1525  }
1526  else
1527  {
1528  $subdir = get_exdir($object->id, 0, 0, 1, $object, $modulepart);
1529  }
1530  if (empty($subdir)) $subdir = 'errorgettingsubdirofobject'; // Protection to avoid to return empty path
1531 
1532  $filepath = $dir_output.$subdir."/";
1533 
1534  $filepdf = $filepath.$objectref.".pdf";
1535  $relativepath = $subdir.'/'.$objectref.'.pdf';
1536 
1537  // Define path to preview pdf file (preview precompiled "file.ext" are "file.ext_preview.png")
1538  $fileimage = $filepdf.'_preview.png';
1539  $relativepathimage = $relativepath.'_preview.png';
1540 
1541  $pdfexists = file_exists($filepdf);
1542 
1543  // If PDF file exists
1544  if ($pdfexists)
1545  {
1546  // Conversion du PDF en image png si fichier png non existant
1547  if (!file_exists($fileimage) || (filemtime($fileimage) < filemtime($filepdf)))
1548  {
1549  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_PDF_THUMBS)) // If you experience trouble with pdf thumb generation and imagick, you can disable here.
1550  {
1551  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
1552  $ret = dol_convert_file($filepdf, 'png', $fileimage, '0'); // Convert first page of PDF into a file _preview.png
1553  if ($ret < 0) $error++;
1554  }
1555  }
1556  }
1557 
1558  if ($pdfexists && !$error)
1559  {
1560  $heightforphotref = 70;
1561  if (!empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $heightforphotref = 60;
1562  // If the preview file is found
1563  if (file_exists($fileimage))
1564  {
1565  $phototoshow = '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"><div class="photoref">';
1566  $phototoshow .= '<img height="'.$heightforphotref.'" class="photo photowithmargin photowithborder" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart=apercu'.$modulepart.'&amp;file='.urlencode($relativepathimage).'">';
1567  $phototoshow .= '</div></div>';
1568  }
1569  }
1570  }
1571  elseif (!$phototoshow)
1572  {
1573  $phototoshow .= $form->showphoto($modulepart, $object, 0, 0, 0, 'photoref', 'small', 1, 0, $maxvisiblephotos);
1574  }
1575 
1576  if ($phototoshow)
1577  {
1578  $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">';
1579  $morehtmlleft .= $phototoshow;
1580  $morehtmlleft .= '</div>';
1581  }
1582  }
1583 
1584  if (!$phototoshow) // Show No photo link (picto of object)
1585  {
1586  $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">';
1587  if ($object->element == 'action')
1588  {
1589  $width = 80;
1590  $cssclass = 'photorefcenter';
1591  $nophoto = img_picto('No photo', 'title_agenda');
1592  }
1593  else
1594  {
1595  $width = 14; $cssclass = 'photorefcenter';
1596  $picto = $object->picto;
1597  if ($object->element == 'project' && !$object->public) $picto = 'project'; // instead of projectpub
1598  $nophoto = img_picto('No photo', 'object_'.$picto);
1599  }
1600  $morehtmlleft .= '<!-- No photo to show -->';
1601  $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"><div class="photoref">';
1602  $morehtmlleft .= $nophoto;
1603  $morehtmlleft .= '</div></div>';
1604 
1605  $morehtmlleft .= '</div>';
1606  }
1607  }
1608  }
1609 
1610  if ($showbarcode) $morehtmlleft .= '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">'.$form->showbarcode($object).'</div>';
1611 
1612  if ($object->element == 'societe')
1613  {
1614  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && $user->rights->societe->creer && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DIRECT_STATUS_UPDATE))
1615  {
1616  $morehtmlstatus .= ajax_object_onoff($object, 'status', 'status', 'InActivity', 'ActivityCeased');
1617  }
1618  else {
1619  $morehtmlstatus .= $object->getLibStatut(6);
1620  }
1621  }
1622  elseif ($object->element == 'product')
1623  {
1624  //$morehtmlstatus.=$langs->trans("Status").' ('.$langs->trans("Sell").') ';
1625  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && $user->rights->produit->creer && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DIRECT_STATUS_UPDATE)) {
1626  $morehtmlstatus .= ajax_object_onoff($object, 'status', 'tosell', 'ProductStatusOnSell', 'ProductStatusNotOnSell');
1627  } else {
1628  $morehtmlstatus .= '<span class="statusrefsell">'.$object->getLibStatut(6, 0).'</span>';
1629  }
1630  $morehtmlstatus .= ' &nbsp; ';
1631  //$morehtmlstatus.=$langs->trans("Status").' ('.$langs->trans("Buy").') ';
1632  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && $user->rights->produit->creer && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DIRECT_STATUS_UPDATE)) {
1633  $morehtmlstatus .= ajax_object_onoff($object, 'status_buy', 'tobuy', 'ProductStatusOnBuy', 'ProductStatusNotOnBuy');
1634  } else {
1635  $morehtmlstatus .= '<span class="statusrefbuy">'.$object->getLibStatut(6, 1).'</span>';
1636  }
1637  }
1638  elseif (in_array($object->element, array('facture', 'invoice', 'invoice_supplier', 'chargesociales', 'loan')))
1639  {
1640  $tmptxt = $object->getLibStatut(6, $object->totalpaye);
1641  if (empty($tmptxt) || $tmptxt == $object->getLibStatut(3)) $tmptxt = $object->getLibStatut(5, $object->totalpaye);
1642  $morehtmlstatus .= $tmptxt;
1643  }
1644  elseif ($object->element == 'contrat' || $object->element == 'contract')
1645  {
1646  if ($object->statut == 0) $morehtmlstatus .= $object->getLibStatut(5);
1647  else $morehtmlstatus .= $object->getLibStatut(4);
1648  }
1649  elseif ($object->element == 'facturerec')
1650  {
1651  if ($object->frequency == 0) $morehtmlstatus .= $object->getLibStatut(2);
1652  else $morehtmlstatus .= $object->getLibStatut(5);
1653  }
1654  elseif ($object->element == 'project_task')
1655  {
1656  $object->fk_statut = 1;
1657  if ($object->progress > 0) $object->fk_statut = 2;
1658  if ($object->progress >= 100) $object->fk_statut = 3;
1659  $tmptxt = $object->getLibStatut(5);
1660  $morehtmlstatus .= $tmptxt; // No status on task
1661  }
1662  else { // Generic case
1663  $tmptxt = $object->getLibStatut(6);
1664  if (empty($tmptxt) || $tmptxt == $object->getLibStatut(3)) $tmptxt = $object->getLibStatut(5);
1665  $morehtmlstatus .= $tmptxt;
1666  }
1667 
1668  // Add if object was dispatched "into accountancy"
1669  if (!empty($conf->accounting->enabled) && in_array($object->element, array('bank', 'facture', 'invoice', 'invoice_supplier', 'expensereport', 'payment_various')))
1670  {
1671  if (method_exists($object, 'getVentilExportCompta'))
1672  {
1673  $accounted = $object->getVentilExportCompta();
1674  $langs->load("accountancy");
1675  $morehtmlstatus .= '</div><div class="statusref statusrefbis"><span class="opacitymedium">'.($accounted > 0 ? $langs->trans("Accounted") : $langs->trans("NotYetAccounted")).'</span>';
1676  }
1677  }
1678 
1679  // Add alias for thirdparty
1680  if (!empty($object->name_alias)) $morehtmlref .= '<div class="refidno">'.$object->name_alias.'</div>';
1681 
1682  // Add label
1683  if (in_array($object->element, array('product', 'bank_account', 'project_task')))
1684  {
1685  if (!empty($object->label)) $morehtmlref .= '<div class="refidno">'.$object->label.'</div>';
1686  }
1687 
1688  if (method_exists($object, 'getBannerAddress') && !in_array($object->element, array('product', 'bookmark', 'ecm_directories', 'ecm_files')))
1689  {
1690  $moreaddress = $object->getBannerAddress('refaddress', $object);
1691  if ($moreaddress) {
1692  $morehtmlref .= '<div class="refidno">';
1693  $morehtmlref .= $moreaddress;
1694  $morehtmlref .= '</div>';
1695  }
1696  }
1697  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_SHOW_TECHNICAL_ID) && ($conf->global->MAIN_SHOW_TECHNICAL_ID == '1' || preg_match('/'.preg_quote($object->element, '/').'/i', $conf->global->MAIN_SHOW_TECHNICAL_ID)) && !empty($object->id))
1698  {
1699  $morehtmlref .= '<div style="clear: both;"></div><div class="refidno">';
1700  $morehtmlref .= $langs->trans("TechnicalID").': '.$object->id;
1701  $morehtmlref .= '</div>';
1702  }
1703 
1704  print '<div class="'.($onlybanner ? 'arearefnobottom ' : 'arearef ').'heightref valignmiddle centpercent">';
1705  print $form->showrefnav($object, $paramid, $morehtml, $shownav, $fieldid, $fieldref, $morehtmlref, $moreparam, $nodbprefix, $morehtmlleft, $morehtmlstatus, $morehtmlright);
1706  print '</div>';
1707  print '<div class="underrefbanner clearboth"></div>';
1708 }
1709 
1719 function fieldLabel($langkey, $fieldkey, $fieldrequired = 0)
1720 {
1721  global $langs;
1722  $ret = '';
1723  if ($fieldrequired) $ret .= '<span class="fieldrequired">';
1724  $ret .= '<label for="'.$fieldkey.'">';
1725  $ret .= $langs->trans($langkey);
1726  $ret .= '</label>';
1727  if ($fieldrequired) $ret .= '</span>';
1728  return $ret;
1729 }
1730 
1738 function dol_bc($var, $moreclass = '')
1739 {
1740  global $bc;
1741  $ret = ' '.$bc[$var];
1742  if ($moreclass) $ret = preg_replace('/class=\"/', 'class="'.$moreclass.' ', $ret);
1743  return $ret;
1744 }
1745 
1759 function dol_format_address($object, $withcountry = 0, $sep = "\n", $outputlangs = '', $mode = 0, $extralangcode = '')
1760 {
1761  global $conf, $langs;
1762 
1763  $ret = '';
1764  $countriesusingstate = array('AU', 'CA', 'US', 'IN', 'GB', 'ES', 'UK', 'TR'); // See also MAIN_FORCE_STATE_INTO_ADDRESS
1765 
1766  // See format of addresses on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Address
1767  // Address
1768  if (empty($mode)) {
1769  $ret .= ($extralangcode ? $object->array_languages['address'][$extralangcode] : $object->address);
1770  }
1771  // Zip/Town/State
1772  if (in_array($object->country_code, array('AU', 'CA', 'US')) || !empty($conf->global->MAIN_FORCE_STATE_INTO_ADDRESS)) // US: title firstname name \n address lines \n town, state, zip \n country
1773  {
1774  $town = ($extralangcode ? $object->array_languages['town'][$extralangcode] : $object->town);
1775  $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '').$town;
1776  if ($object->state)
1777  {
1778  $ret .= ($ret ? ", " : '').$object->state;
1779  }
1780  if ($object->zip) $ret .= ($ret ? ", " : '').$object->zip;
1781  }
1782  elseif (in_array($object->country_code, array('GB', 'UK'))) // UK: title firstname name \n address lines \n town state \n zip \n country
1783  {
1784  $town = ($extralangcode ? $object->array_languages['town'][$extralangcode] : $object->town);
1785  $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '').$town;
1786  if ($object->state)
1787  {
1788  $ret .= ($ret ? ", " : '').$object->state;
1789  }
1790  if ($object->zip) $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '').$object->zip;
1791  }
1792  elseif (in_array($object->country_code, array('ES', 'TR'))) // ES: title firstname name \n address lines \n zip town \n state \n country
1793  {
1794  $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '').$object->zip;
1795  $town = ($extralangcode ? $object->array_languages['town'][$extralangcode] : $object->town);
1796  $ret .= ($town ? (($object->zip ? ' ' : '').$town) : '');
1797  if ($object->state)
1798  {
1799  $ret .= "\n".$object->state;
1800  }
1801  }
1802  elseif (in_array($object->country_code, array('IT'))) // IT: tile firstname name\n address lines \n zip (Code Departement) \n country
1803  {
1804  $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '').$object->zip;
1805  $town = ($extralangcode ? $object->array_languages['town'][$extralangcode] : $object->town);
1806  $ret .= ($town ? (($object->zip ? ' ' : '').$town) : '');
1807  $ret .= ($object->state_code ? (' '.($object->state_code)) : '');
1808  }
1809  else // Other: title firstname name \n address lines \n zip town \n country
1810  {
1811  $town = ($extralangcode ? $object->array_languages['town'][$extralangcode] : $object->town);
1812  $ret .= $object->zip ? (($ret ? $sep : '').$object->zip) : '';
1813  $ret .= ($town ? (($object->zip ? ' ' : ($ret ? $sep : '')).$town) : '');
1814  if ($object->state && in_array($object->country_code, $countriesusingstate))
1815  {
1816  $ret .= ($ret ? ", " : '').$object->state;
1817  }
1818  }
1819  if (!is_object($outputlangs)) $outputlangs = $langs;
1820  if ($withcountry)
1821  {
1822  $langs->load("dict");
1823  $ret .= ($object->country_code ? ($ret ? $sep : '').$outputlangs->convToOutputCharset($outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("Country".$object->country_code)) : '');
1824  }
1825 
1826  return $ret;
1827 }
1828 
1829 
1830 
1839 function dol_strftime($fmt, $ts = false, $is_gmt = false)
1840 {
1841  if ((abs($ts) <= 0x7FFFFFFF)) { // check if number in 32-bit signed range
1842  return ($is_gmt) ? @gmstrftime($fmt, $ts) : @strftime($fmt, $ts);
1843  }
1844  else return 'Error date into a not supported range';
1845 }
1846 
1868 function dol_print_date($time, $format = '', $tzoutput = 'tzserver', $outputlangs = '', $encodetooutput = false)
1869 {
1870  global $conf, $langs;
1871 
1872  // Clean parameters
1873  $to_gmt = false;
1874  $offsettz = $offsetdst = 0;
1875  if ($tzoutput)
1876  {
1877  $to_gmt = true; // For backward compatibility
1878  if (is_string($tzoutput))
1879  {
1880  if ($tzoutput == 'tzserver')
1881  {
1882  $to_gmt = false;
1883  $offsettzstring = @date_default_timezone_get(); // Example 'Europe/Berlin' or 'Indian/Reunion'
1884  $offsettz = 0;
1885  $offsetdst = 0;
1886  }
1887  elseif ($tzoutput == 'tzuser' || $tzoutput == 'tzuserrel')
1888  {
1889  $to_gmt = true;
1890  $offsettzstring = (empty($_SESSION['dol_tz_string']) ? 'UTC' : $_SESSION['dol_tz_string']); // Example 'Europe/Berlin' or 'Indian/Reunion'
1891  $offsettz = (empty($_SESSION['dol_tz']) ? 0 : $_SESSION['dol_tz']) * 60 * 60; // Will not be used anymore
1892  $offsetdst = (empty($_SESSION['dol_dst']) ? 0 : $_SESSION['dol_dst']) * 60 * 60; // Will not be used anymore
1893  }
1894  }
1895  }
1896  if (!is_object($outputlangs)) $outputlangs = $langs;
1897  if (!$format) $format = 'daytextshort';
1898  $reduceformat = (!empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) && in_array($format, array('day', 'dayhour'))) ? 1 : 0;
1899  $formatwithoutreduce = preg_replace('/reduceformat/', '', $format);
1900  if ($formatwithoutreduce != $format) { $format = $formatwithoutreduce; $reduceformat = 1; } // so format 'dayreduceformat' is processed like day
1901 
1902  // Change predefined format into computer format. If found translation in lang file we use it, otherwise we use default.
1903  // TODO Add format daysmallyear and dayhoursmallyear
1904  if ($format == 'day') $format = ($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateShort") != "FormatDateShort" ? $outputlangs->trans("FormatDateShort") : $conf->format_date_short);
1905  elseif ($format == 'hour') $format = ($outputlangs->trans("FormatHourShort") != "FormatHourShort" ? $outputlangs->trans("FormatHourShort") : $conf->format_hour_short);
1906  elseif ($format == 'hourduration') $format = ($outputlangs->trans("FormatHourShortDuration") != "FormatHourShortDuration" ? $outputlangs->trans("FormatHourShortDuration") : $conf->format_hour_short_duration);
1907  elseif ($format == 'daytext') $format = ($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateText") != "FormatDateText" ? $outputlangs->trans("FormatDateText") : $conf->format_date_text);
1908  elseif ($format == 'daytextshort') $format = ($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateTextShort") != "FormatDateTextShort" ? $outputlangs->trans("FormatDateTextShort") : $conf->format_date_text_short);
1909  elseif ($format == 'dayhour') $format = ($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourShort") != "FormatDateHourShort" ? $outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourShort") : $conf->format_date_hour_short);
1910  elseif ($format == 'dayhoursec') $format = ($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourSecShort") != "FormatDateHourSecShort" ? $outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourSecShort") : $conf->format_date_hour_sec_short);
1911  elseif ($format == 'dayhourtext') $format = ($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourText") != "FormatDateHourText" ? $outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourText") : $conf->format_date_hour_text);
1912  elseif ($format == 'dayhourtextshort') $format = ($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourTextShort") != "FormatDateHourTextShort" ? $outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourTextShort") : $conf->format_date_hour_text_short);
1913  // Format not sensitive to language
1914  elseif ($format == 'dayhourlog') $format = '%Y%m%d%H%M%S';
1915  elseif ($format == 'dayhourldap') $format = '%Y%m%d%H%M%SZ';
1916  elseif ($format == 'dayhourxcard') $format = '%Y%m%dT%H%M%SZ';
1917  elseif ($format == 'dayxcard') $format = '%Y%m%d';
1918  elseif ($format == 'dayrfc') $format = '%Y-%m-%d'; // DATE_RFC3339
1919  elseif ($format == 'dayhourrfc') $format = '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ'; // DATETIME RFC3339
1920  elseif ($format == 'standard') $format = '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S';
1921 
1922  if ($reduceformat)
1923  {
1924  $format = str_replace('%Y', '%y', $format);
1925  $format = str_replace('yyyy', 'yy', $format);
1926  }
1927 
1928  // If date undefined or "", we return ""
1929  if (dol_strlen($time) == 0) return ''; // $time=0 allowed (it means 01/01/1970 00:00:00)
1930 
1931  // Clean format
1932  if (preg_match('/%b/i', $format)) // There is some text to translate
1933  {
1934  // We inhibate translation to text made by strftime functions. We will use trans instead later.
1935  $format = str_replace('%b', '__b__', $format);
1936  $format = str_replace('%B', '__B__', $format);
1937  }
1938  if (preg_match('/%a/i', $format)) // There is some text to translate
1939  {
1940  // We inhibate translation to text made by strftime functions. We will use trans instead later.
1941  $format = str_replace('%a', '__a__', $format);
1942  $format = str_replace('%A', '__A__', $format);
1943  }
1944 
1945 
1946  // Analyze date
1947  $reg = array();
1948  if (preg_match('/^([0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])$/i', $time, $reg)) // Deprecated. Ex: 1970-01-01, 1970-01-01 01:00:00, 19700101010000
1949  {
1950  dol_print_error("Functions.lib::dol_print_date function called with a bad value from page ".$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"]);
1951  return '';
1952  }
1953  elseif (preg_match('/^([0-9]+)\-([0-9]+)\-([0-9]+) ?([0-9]+)?:?([0-9]+)?:?([0-9]+)?/i', $time, $reg)) // Still available to solve problems in extrafields of type date
1954  {
1955  // This part of code should not be used.
1956  dol_syslog("Functions.lib::dol_print_date function called with a bad value from page ".$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"], LOG_WARNING);
1957  //if (function_exists('debug_print_backtrace')) debug_print_backtrace();
1958  // Date has format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'
1959  $syear = (!empty($reg[1]) ? $reg[1] : '');
1960  $smonth = (!empty($reg[2]) ? $reg[2] : '');
1961  $sday = (!empty($reg[3]) ? $reg[3] : '');
1962  $shour = (!empty($reg[4]) ? $reg[4] : '');
1963  $smin = (!empty($reg[5]) ? $reg[5] : '');
1964  $ssec = (!empty($reg[6]) ? $reg[6] : '');
1965 
1966  $time = dol_mktime($shour, $smin, $ssec, $smonth, $sday, $syear, true);
1967  $ret = adodb_strftime($format, $time + $offsettz + $offsetdst, $to_gmt);
1968  }
1969  else
1970  {
1971  // Date is a timestamps
1972  if ($time < 100000000000) // Protection against bad date values
1973  {
1974  $timetouse = $time + $offsettz + $offsetdst; // TODO Replace this with function Date PHP. We also should not use anymore offsettz and offsetdst but only offsettzstring.
1975 
1976  $ret = adodb_strftime($format, $timetouse, $to_gmt);
1977  }
1978  else $ret = 'Bad value '.$time.' for date';
1979  }
1980 
1981  if (preg_match('/__b__/i', $format))
1982  {
1983  $timetouse = $time + $offsettz + $offsetdst; // TODO Replace this with function Date PHP. We also should not use anymore offsettz and offsetdst but only offsettzstring.
1984 
1985  // Here ret is string in PHP setup language (strftime was used). Now we convert to $outputlangs.
1986  $month = adodb_strftime('%m', $timetouse);
1987  $month = sprintf("%02d", $month); // $month may be return with format '06' on some installation and '6' on other, so we force it to '06'.
1988  if ($encodetooutput)
1989  {
1990  $monthtext = $outputlangs->transnoentities('Month'.$month);
1991  $monthtextshort = $outputlangs->transnoentities('MonthShort'.$month);
1992  }
1993  else
1994  {
1995  $monthtext = $outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('Month'.$month);
1996  $monthtextshort = $outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('MonthShort'.$month);
1997  }
1998  //print 'monthtext='.$monthtext.' monthtextshort='.$monthtextshort;
1999  $ret = str_replace('__b__', $monthtextshort, $ret);
2000  $ret = str_replace('__B__', $monthtext, $ret);
2001  //print 'x'.$outputlangs->charset_output.'-'.$ret.'x';
2002  //return $ret;
2003  }
2004  if (preg_match('/__a__/i', $format))
2005  {
2006  $timetouse = $time + $offsettz + $offsetdst; // TODO Replace this with function Date PHP. We also should not use anymore offsettz and offsetdst but only offsettzstring.
2007 
2008  $w = adodb_strftime('%w', $timetouse); // TODO Replace this with function Date PHP. We also should not use anymore offsettz and offsetdst but only offsettzstring.
2009  $dayweek = $outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('Day'.$w);
2010  $ret = str_replace('__A__', $dayweek, $ret);
2011  $ret = str_replace('__a__', dol_substr($dayweek, 0, 3), $ret);
2012  }
2013 
2014  return $ret;
2015 }
2016 
2017 
2051 function dol_getdate($timestamp, $fast = false)
2052 {
2053  global $conf;
2054 
2055  $usealternatemethod = false;
2056  if ($timestamp <= 0) $usealternatemethod = true; // <= 1970
2057  if ($timestamp >= 2145913200) $usealternatemethod = true; // >= 2038
2058 
2059  if ($usealternatemethod)
2060  {
2061  $arrayinfo = adodb_getdate($timestamp, $fast);
2062  }
2063  else
2064  {
2065  $arrayinfo = getdate($timestamp);
2066  }
2067 
2068  return $arrayinfo;
2069 }
2070 
2090 function dol_mktime($hour, $minute, $second, $month, $day, $year, $gm = false, $check = 1)
2091 {
2092  global $conf;
2093  //print "- ".$hour.",".$minute.",".$second.",".$month.",".$day.",".$year.",".$_SERVER["WINDIR"]." -";
2094 
2095  // Clean parameters
2096  if ($hour == -1 || empty($hour)) $hour = 0;
2097  if ($minute == -1 || empty($minute)) $minute = 0;
2098  if ($second == -1 || empty($second)) $second = 0;
2099 
2100  // Check parameters
2101  if ($check)
2102  {
2103  if (!$month || !$day) return '';
2104  if ($day > 31) return '';
2105  if ($month > 12) return '';
2106  if ($hour < 0 || $hour > 24) return '';
2107  if ($minute < 0 || $minute > 60) return '';
2108  if ($second < 0 || $second > 60) return '';
2109  }
2110 
2111  if (empty($gm) || $gm === 'server')
2112  {
2113  $default_timezone = @date_default_timezone_get(); // Example 'Europe/Berlin'
2114  $localtz = new DateTimeZone($default_timezone);
2115  }
2116  elseif ($gm === 'user')
2117  {
2118  // We use dol_tz_string first because it is more reliable.
2119  $default_timezone = (empty($_SESSION["dol_tz_string"]) ? @date_default_timezone_get() : $_SESSION["dol_tz_string"]); // Example 'Europe/Berlin'
2120  try {
2121  $localtz = new DateTimeZone($default_timezone);
2122  }
2123  catch (Exception $e)
2124  {
2125  dol_syslog("Warning dol_tz_string contains an invalid value ".$_SESSION["dol_tz_string"], LOG_WARNING);
2126  $default_timezone = @date_default_timezone_get();
2127  }
2128  }
2129  elseif (strrpos($gm, "tz,") !== false)
2130  {
2131  $timezone = str_replace("tz,", "", $gm); // Example 'tz,Europe/Berlin'
2132  try
2133  {
2134  $localtz = new DateTimeZone($timezone);
2135  }
2136  catch (Exception $e)
2137  {
2138  dol_syslog("Warning passed timezone contains an invalid value ".$timezone, LOG_WARNING);
2139  }
2140  }
2141 
2142  if (empty($localtz)) {
2143  $localtz = new DateTimeZone('UTC');
2144  }
2145  //var_dump($localtz);
2146  //var_dump($year.'-'.$month.'-'.$day.'-'.$hour.'-'.$minute);
2147  $dt = new DateTime(null, $localtz);
2148  $dt->setDate((int) $year, (int) $month, (int) $day);
2149  $dt->setTime((int) $hour, (int) $minute, (int) $second);
2150  $date = $dt->getTimestamp(); // should include daylight saving time
2151  //var_dump($date);
2152  return $date;
2153 }
2154 
2155 
2165 function dol_now($mode = 'gmt')
2166 {
2167  $ret = 0;
2168 
2169  if ($mode == 'gmt') $ret = time(); // Time for now at greenwich.
2170  elseif ($mode == 'tzserver') // Time for now with PHP server timezone added
2171  {
2172  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
2173  $tzsecond = getServerTimeZoneInt('now'); // Contains tz+dayling saving time
2174  $ret = (int) (dol_now('gmt') + ($tzsecond * 3600));
2175  }
2176  /*elseif ($mode == 'tzref') // Time for now with parent company timezone is added
2177  {
2178  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
2179  $tzsecond=getParentCompanyTimeZoneInt(); // Contains tz+dayling saving time
2180  $ret=dol_now('gmt')+($tzsecond*3600);
2181  }*/
2182  elseif ($mode == 'tzuser') // Time for now with user timezone added
2183  {
2184  //print 'time: '.time();
2185  $offsettz = (empty($_SESSION['dol_tz']) ? 0 : $_SESSION['dol_tz']) * 60 * 60;
2186  $offsetdst = (empty($_SESSION['dol_dst']) ? 0 : $_SESSION['dol_dst']) * 60 * 60;
2187  $ret = (int) (dol_now('gmt') + ($offsettz + $offsetdst));
2188  }
2189 
2190  return $ret;
2191 }
2192 
2193 
2202 function dol_print_size($size, $shortvalue = 0, $shortunit = 0)
2203 {
2204  global $conf, $langs;
2205  $level = 1024;
2206 
2207  if (!empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $shortunit = 1;
2208 
2209  // Set value text
2210  if (empty($shortvalue) || $size < ($level * 10))
2211  {
2212  $ret = $size;
2213  $textunitshort = $langs->trans("b");
2214  $textunitlong = $langs->trans("Bytes");
2215  }
2216  else
2217  {
2218  $ret = round($size / $level, 0);
2219  $textunitshort = $langs->trans("Kb");
2220  $textunitlong = $langs->trans("KiloBytes");
2221  }
2222  // Use long or short text unit
2223  if (empty($shortunit)) { $ret .= ' '.$textunitlong; }
2224  else { $ret .= ' '.$textunitshort; }
2225 
2226  return $ret;
2227 }
2228 
2238 function dol_print_url($url, $target = '_blank', $max = 32, $withpicto = 0)
2239 {
2240  global $langs;
2241 
2242  if (empty($url)) return '';
2243 
2244  $link = '<a href="';
2245  if (!preg_match('/^http/i', $url)) $link .= 'http://';
2246  $link .= $url;
2247  $link .= '"';
2248  if ($target) $link .= ' target="'.$target.'"';
2249  $link .= '>';
2250  if (!preg_match('/^http/i', $url)) $link .= 'http://';
2251  $link .= dol_trunc($url, $max);
2252  $link .= '</a>';
2253  return '<div class="nospan float" style="margin-right: 10px">'.($withpicto ?img_picto($langs->trans("Url"), 'globe').' ' : '').$link.'</div>';
2254 }
2255 
2268 function dol_print_email($email, $cid = 0, $socid = 0, $addlink = 0, $max = 64, $showinvalid = 1, $withpicto = 0)
2269 {
2270  global $conf, $user, $langs, $hookmanager;
2271 
2272  $newemail = $email;
2273 
2274  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZEFORTEXTBROWSER) && $withpicto) $withpicto = 0;
2275 
2276  if (empty($email)) return '&nbsp;';
2277 
2278  if (!empty($addlink))
2279  {
2280  $newemail = '<a style="text-overflow: ellipsis;" href="';
2281  if (!preg_match('/^mailto:/i', $email)) $newemail .= 'mailto:';
2282  $newemail .= $email;
2283  $newemail .= '">';
2284  $newemail .= dol_trunc($email, $max);
2285  $newemail .= '</a>';
2286  if ($showinvalid && !isValidEmail($email))
2287  {
2288  $langs->load("errors");
2289  $newemail .= img_warning($langs->trans("ErrorBadEMail", $email));
2290  }
2291 
2292  if (($cid || $socid) && !empty($conf->agenda->enabled) && $user->rights->agenda->myactions->create)
2293  {
2294  $type = 'AC_EMAIL'; $link = '';
2295  if (!empty($conf->global->AGENDA_ADDACTIONFOREMAIL)) $link = '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/comm/action/card.php?action=create&amp;backtopage=1&amp;actioncode='.$type.'&amp;contactid='.$cid.'&amp;socid='.$socid.'">'.img_object($langs->trans("AddAction"), "calendar").'</a>';
2296  if ($link) $newemail = '<div>'.$newemail.' '.$link.'</div>';
2297  }
2298  }
2299  else
2300  {
2301  if ($showinvalid && !isValidEmail($email))
2302  {
2303  $langs->load("errors");
2304  $newemail .= img_warning($langs->trans("ErrorBadEMail", $email));
2305  }
2306  }
2307 
2308  //$rep = '<div class="nospan" style="margin-right: 10px">';
2309  $rep = ($withpicto ? img_picto($langs->trans("EMail").' : '.$email, 'object_email.png').' ' : '').$newemail;
2310  //$rep .= '</div>';
2311  if ($hookmanager) {
2312  $parameters = array('cid' => $cid, 'socid' => $socid, 'addlink' => $addlink, 'picto' => $withpicto);
2313  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printEmail', $parameters, $email);
2314  if ($reshook > 0) {
2315  $rep = '';
2316  }
2317  $rep .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
2318  }
2319 
2320  return $rep;
2321 }
2322 
2328 function getArrayOfSocialNetworks()
2329 {
2330  global $conf, $db;
2331  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, label, url, icon, active FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_socialnetworks";
2332  $sql .= " WHERE entity=".$conf->entity;
2333  $socialnetworks = array();
2334  $resql = $db->query($sql);
2335  if ($resql) {
2336  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql)) {
2337  $socialnetworks[$obj->code] = array(
2338  'rowid' => $obj->rowid,
2339  'label' => $obj->label,
2340  'url' => $obj->url,
2341  'icon' => $obj->icon,
2342  'active' => $obj->active,
2343  );
2344  }
2345  }
2346  return $socialnetworks;
2347 }
2348 
2358 function dol_print_socialnetworks($value, $cid, $socid, $type)
2359 {
2360  global $conf, $user, $langs;
2361 
2362  $htmllink = $value;
2363 
2364  if (empty($value)) return '&nbsp;';
2365 
2366  if (!empty($type))
2367  {
2368  $htmllink = '<div class="divsocialnetwork inline-block valignmiddle">';
2369  $htmllink .= img_picto($langs->trans(strtoupper($type)), $type.'.png', '', false, 0, 0, '', 'paddingright', 0);
2370  $htmllink .= $value;
2371  if ($type == 'skype')
2372  {
2373  $htmllink .= '&nbsp;';
2374  $htmllink .= '<a href="skype:';
2375  $htmllink .= $value;
2376  $htmllink .= '?call" alt="'.$langs->trans("Call").'&nbsp;'.$value.'" title="'.$langs->trans("Call").'&nbsp;'.$value.'">';
2377  $htmllink .= '<img src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/skype_callbutton.png" border="0">';
2378  $htmllink .= '</a><a href="skype:';
2379  $htmllink .= $value;
2380  $htmllink .= '?chat" alt="'.$langs->trans("Chat").'&nbsp;'.$value.'" title="'.$langs->trans("Chat").'&nbsp;'.$value.'">';
2381  $htmllink .= '<img class="paddingleft" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/skype_chatbutton.png" border="0">';
2382  $htmllink .= '</a>';
2383  }
2384  if (($cid || $socid) && !empty($conf->agenda->enabled) && $user->rights->agenda->myactions->create && $type == 'skype')
2385  {
2386  $addlink = 'AC_SKYPE';
2387  $link = '';
2388  if (!empty($conf->global->AGENDA_ADDACTIONFORSKYPE)) $link = '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/comm/action/card.php?action=create&amp;backtopage=1&amp;actioncode='.$addlink.'&amp;contactid='.$cid.'&amp;socid='.$socid.'">'.img_object($langs->trans("AddAction"), "calendar").'</a>';
2389  $htmllink .= ($link ? ' '.$link : '');
2390  }
