2391  $htmllink .= '</div>';
2392  }
2393  else
2394  {
2395  $langs->load("errors");
2396  $htmllink .= img_warning($langs->trans("ErrorBadSocialNetworkValue", $value));
2397  }
2398  return $htmllink;
2399 }
2400 
2415 function dol_print_phone($phone, $countrycode = '', $cid = 0, $socid = 0, $addlink = '', $separ = "&nbsp;", $withpicto = '', $titlealt = '', $adddivfloat = 0)
2416 {
2417  global $conf, $user, $langs, $mysoc, $hookmanager;
2418 
2419  // Clean phone parameter
2420  $phone = preg_replace("/[\s.-]/", "", trim($phone));
2421  if (empty($phone)) { return ''; }
2422  if ($conf->global->MAIN_PHONE_SEPAR) $separ = $conf->global->MAIN_PHONE_SEPAR;
2423  if (empty($countrycode)) $countrycode = $mysoc->country_code;
2424 
2425  // Short format for small screens
2426  if ($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) $separ = '';
2427 
2428  $newphone = $phone;
2429  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == "FR")
2430  {
2431  // France
2432  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 10) {
2433  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 2, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2);
2434  }
2435  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 7)
2436  {
2437  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 2);
2438  }
2439  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 9)
2440  {
2441  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 2, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2);
2442  }
2443  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 11)
2444  {
2445  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2);
2446  }
2447  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2448  {
2449  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2450  }
2451  }
2452 
2453  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "CA")
2454  {
2455  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 10) {
2456  $newphone = ($separ != '' ? '(' : '').substr($newphone, 0, 3).($separ != '' ? ')' : '').$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).($separ != '' ? '-' : '').substr($newphone, 6, 4);
2457  }
2458  }
2459  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "PT")
2460  {//Portugal
2461  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2462  {//ex: +351_ABC_DEF_GHI
2463  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 3);
2464  }
2465  }
2466  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "SR")
2467  {//Suriname
2468  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 10)
2469  {//ex: +597_ABC_DEF
2470  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 3);
2471  }
2472  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 11)
2473  {//ex: +597_ABC_DEFG
2474  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 4);
2475  }
2476  }
2477  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "DE")
2478  {//Allemagne
2479  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 14)
2480  {//ex: +49_ABCD_EFGH_IJK
2481  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 3);
2482  }
2483  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2484  {//ex: +49_ABC_DEFG_HIJ
2485  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 3);
2486  }
2487  }
2488  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "ES")
2489  {//Espagne
2490  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2491  {//ex: +34_ABC_DEF_GHI
2492  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 3);
2493  }
2494  }
2495  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "BF")
2496  {// Burkina Faso
2497  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2498  {//ex : +22 A BC_DE_FG_HI
2499  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 1).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2500  }
2501  }
2502  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "RO")
2503  {// Roumanie
2504  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2505  {//ex : +40 AB_CDE_FG_HI
2506  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2507  }
2508  }

2638  }
2639  }
2640  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "JM")
2641  {//Jamaïque
2642  if (dol_strlen($newphone) == 12)
2643  {//ex: +1867_ABC_DEFG
2644  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 5).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 4);
2645  }
2646  }
2647  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "MG")
2648  {//Madagascar
2649  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2650  {//ex: +261_AB_CD_EF_GHI
2651  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 3);
2652  }
2653  }
2654  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "GB")
2655  {//Royaume uni
2656  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2657  {//ex: +44_ABCD_EFG_HIJ
2658  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 3);
2659  }
2660  }
2661  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "CH")
2662  {//Suisse
2663  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2664  {//ex: +41_AB_CDE_FG_HI
2665  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2666  }
2667  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 15)
2668  {// +41_AB_CDE_FGH_IJKL
2669  $newphone = $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 4);
2670  }
2671  }
2672  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "TN")
2673  {//Tunisie
2674  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2675  {//ex: +216_AB_CDE_FGH
2676  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 3);
2677  }
2678  }
2679  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "GF")
2680  {//Guyane francaise
2681  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2682  {//ex: +594_ABC_DE_FG_HI (ABC=594 de nouveau)
2683  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 2);
2684  }
2685  }
2686  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "GP")
2687  {//Guadeloupe
2688  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2689  {//ex: +590_ABC_DE_FG_HI (ABC=590 de nouveau)
2690  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 2);
2691  }
2692  }
2693  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "MQ")
2694  {//Martinique
2695  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2696  {//ex: +596_ABC_DE_FG_HI (ABC=596 de nouveau)
2697  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 2);
2698  }
2699  }
2700  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "IT")
2701  {//Italie
2702  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2703  {//ex: +39_ABC_DEF_GHI
2704  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 3);
2705  }
2706  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2707  {//ex: +39_ABC_DEF_GH_IJ
2708  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 2);
2709  }
2710  }
2711  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "AU")
2712  {
2713  //Australie
2714  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2715  {
2716  //ex: +61_A_BCDE_FGHI
2717  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 1).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 4);
2718  }
2719  }
2720  if (!empty($addlink)) // Link on phone number (+ link to add action if conf->global->AGENDA_ADDACTIONFORPHONE set)
2721  {
2722  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone' || (!empty($conf->clicktodial->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->CLICKTODIAL_USE_TEL_LINK_ON_PHONE_NUMBERS))) // If phone or option for, we use link of phone
2723  {
2724  $newphoneform = $newphone;
2725  $newphone = '<a href="tel:'.$phone.'"';
2726  $newphone .= '>'.$newphoneform.'</a>';
2727  }
2728  elseif (!empty($conf->clicktodial->enabled) && $addlink == 'AC_TEL') // If click to dial, we use click to dial url
2729  {
2730  if (empty($user->clicktodial_loaded)) $user->fetch_clicktodial();
2731 
2732  // Define urlmask
2733  $urlmask = 'ErrorClickToDialModuleNotConfigured';
2734  if (!empty($conf->global->CLICKTODIAL_URL)) $urlmask = $conf->global->CLICKTODIAL_URL;
2735  if (!empty($user->clicktodial_url)) $urlmask = $user->clicktodial_url;
2736 
2737  $clicktodial_poste = (!empty($user->clicktodial_poste) ?urlencode($user->clicktodial_poste) : '');
2738  $clicktodial_login = (!empty($user->clicktodial_login) ?urlencode($user->clicktodial_login) : '');
2739  $clicktodial_password = (!empty($user->clicktodial_password) ?urlencode($user->clicktodial_password) : '');
2740  // This line is for backward compatibility
2741  $url = sprintf($urlmask, urlencode($phone), $clicktodial_poste, $clicktodial_login, $clicktodial_password);
2742  // Thoose lines are for substitution
2743  $substitarray = array('__PHONEFROM__'=>$clicktodial_poste,
2744  '__PHONETO__'=>urlencode($phone),
2745  '__LOGIN__'=>$clicktodial_login,
2746  '__PASS__'=>$clicktodial_password);
2747  $url = make_substitutions($url, $substitarray);
2748  $newphonesav = $newphone;
2749  $newphone = '<a href="'.$url.'"';
2750  if (!empty($conf->global->CLICKTODIAL_FORCENEWTARGET)) $newphone .= ' target="_blank"';
2751  $newphone .= '>'.$newphonesav.'</a>';
2752  }
2753 
2754  //if (($cid || $socid) && ! empty($conf->agenda->enabled) && $user->rights->agenda->myactions->create)
2755  if (!empty($conf->agenda->enabled) && $user->rights->agenda->myactions->create)
2756  {
2757  $type = 'AC_TEL'; $link = '';
2758  if ($addlink == 'AC_FAX') $type = 'AC_FAX';
2759  if (!empty($conf->global->AGENDA_ADDACTIONFORPHONE)) $link = '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/comm/action/card.php?action=create&amp;backtopage=1&amp;actioncode='.$type.($cid ? '&amp;contactid='.$cid : '').($socid ? '&amp;socid='.$socid : '').'">'.img_object($langs->trans("AddAction"), "calendar").'</a>';
2760  if ($link) $newphone = '<div>'.$newphone.' '.$link.'</div>';
2761  }
2762  }
2763 
2764  if (empty($titlealt))
2765  {
2766  $titlealt = ($withpicto == 'fax' ? $langs->trans("Fax") : $langs->trans("Phone"));
2767  }
2768  $rep = '';
2769 
2770  if ($hookmanager) {
2771  $parameters = array('countrycode' => $countrycode, 'cid' => $cid, 'socid' => $socid, 'titlealt' => $titlealt, 'picto' => $withpicto);
2772  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printPhone', $parameters, $phone);
2773  $rep .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
2774  }
2775  if (empty($reshook))
2776  {
2777  $picto = '';
2778  if ($withpicto) {
2779  if ($withpicto == 'fax') {
2780  $picto = 'phoning_fax';
2781  }elseif ($withpicto == 'phone') {
2782  $picto = 'phoning';
2783  }elseif ($withpicto == 'mobile') {
2784  $picto = 'phoning_mobile';
2785  } else {
2786  $picto = '';
2787  }
2788  }
2789  if ($adddivfloat) $rep .= '<div class="nospan float" style="margin-right: 10px">';
2790  else $rep .= '<span style="margin-right: 10px;">';
2791  $rep .= ($withpicto ?img_picto($titlealt, 'object_'.$picto.'.png').' ' : '').$newphone;
2792  if ($adddivfloat) $rep .= '</div>';
2793  else $rep .= '</span>';
2794  }
2795 
2796  return $rep;
2797 }
2798 
2806 function dol_print_ip($ip, $mode = 0)
2807 {
2808  global $conf, $langs;
2809 
2810  $ret = '';
2811 
2812  if (empty($mode)) $ret .= $ip;
2813 
2814  if ($mode != 2)
2815  {
2816  $countrycode = dolGetCountryCodeFromIp($ip);
2817  if ($countrycode) // If success, countrycode is us, fr, ...
2818  {
2819  if (file_exists(DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/theme/common/flags/'.$countrycode.'.png'))
2820  {
2821  $ret .= ' '.img_picto($countrycode.' '.$langs->trans("AccordingToGeoIPDatabase"), DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/flags/'.$countrycode.'.png', '', 1);
2822  }
2823  else $ret .= ' ('.$countrycode.')';
2824  }
2825  else
2826  {
2827  // Nothing
2828  }
2829  }
2830 
2831  return $ret;
2832 }
2833 
2842 function getUserRemoteIP()
2843 {
2844  $ip = empty($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR']) ? (empty($_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP']) ? (empty($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) ? '' : $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) : $_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP']) : $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'];
2845  return $ip;
2846 }
2847 
2854 function dolGetCountryCodeFromIp($ip)
2855 {
2856  global $conf;
2857 
2858  $countrycode = '';
2859 
2860  if (!empty($conf->geoipmaxmind->enabled))
2861  {
2862  $datafile = $conf->global->GEOIPMAXMIND_COUNTRY_DATAFILE;
2863  //$ip='24.24.24.24';
2864  //$datafile='/usr/share/GeoIP/GeoIP.dat'; Note that this must be downloaded datafile (not same than datafile provided with ubuntu packages)
2865  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/dolgeoip.class.php';
2866  $geoip = new DolGeoIP('country', $datafile);
2867  //print 'ip='.$ip.' databaseType='.$geoip->gi->databaseType." GEOIP_CITY_EDITION_REV1=".GEOIP_CITY_EDITION_REV1."\n";
2868  $countrycode = $geoip->getCountryCodeFromIP($ip);
2869  }
2870 
2871  return $countrycode;
2872 }
2873 
2874 
2881 function dol_user_country()
2882 {
2883  global $conf, $langs, $user;
2884 
2885  //$ret=$user->xxx;
2886  $ret = '';
2887  if (!empty($conf->geoipmaxmind->enabled))
2888  {
2889  $ip = getUserRemoteIP();
2890  $datafile = $conf->global->GEOIPMAXMIND_COUNTRY_DATAFILE;
2891  //$ip='24.24.24.24';
2892  //$datafile='E:\Mes Sites\Web\Admin1\awstats\maxmind\GeoIP.dat';
2893  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/dolgeoip.class.php';
2894  $geoip = new DolGeoIP('country', $datafile);
2895  $countrycode = $geoip->getCountryCodeFromIP($ip);
2896  $ret = $countrycode;
2897  }
2898  return $ret;
2899 }
2900 
2913 function dol_print_address($address, $htmlid, $element, $id, $noprint = 0, $charfornl = '')
2914 {
2915  global $conf, $user, $langs, $hookmanager;
2916 
2917  $out = '';
2918 
2919  if ($address)
2920  {
2921  if ($hookmanager) {
2922  $parameters = array('element' => $element, 'id' => $id);
2923  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printAddress', $parameters, $address);
2924  $out .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
2925  }
2926  if (empty($reshook))
2927  {
2928  if (empty($charfornl)) $out .= nl2br($address);
2929  else $out .= preg_replace('/[\r\n]+/', $charfornl, $address);
2930 
2931  // TODO Remove this block, we can add this using the hook now
2932  $showgmap = $showomap = 0;
2933  if (($element == 'thirdparty' || $element == 'societe') && !empty($conf->google->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->GOOGLE_ENABLE_GMAPS)) $showgmap = 1;
2934  if ($element == 'contact' && !empty($conf->google->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->GOOGLE_ENABLE_GMAPS_CONTACTS)) $showgmap = 1;
2935  if ($element == 'member' && !empty($conf->google->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->GOOGLE_ENABLE_GMAPS_MEMBERS)) $showgmap = 1;
2936  if (($element == 'thirdparty' || $element == 'societe') && !empty($conf->openstreetmap->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->OPENSTREETMAP_ENABLE_MAPS)) $showomap = 1;
2937  if ($element == 'contact' && !empty($conf->openstreetmap->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->OPENSTREETMAP_ENABLE_MAPS_CONTACTS)) $showomap = 1;
2938  if ($element == 'member' && !empty($conf->openstreetmap->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->OPENSTREETMAP_ENABLE_MAPS_MEMBERS)) $showomap = 1;
2939  if ($showgmap)
2940  {
2941  $url = dol_buildpath('/google/gmaps.php?mode='.$element.'&id='.$id, 1);
2942  $out .= ' <a href="'.$url.'" target="_gmaps"><img id="'.$htmlid.'" class="valigntextbottom" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/gmap.png"></a>';
2943  }
2944  if ($showomap)
2945  {
2946  $url = dol_buildpath('/openstreetmap/maps.php?mode='.$element.'&id='.$id, 1);
2947  $out .= ' <a href="'.$url.'" target="_gmaps"><img id="'.$htmlid.'_openstreetmap" class="valigntextbottom" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/gmap.png"></a>';
2948  }
2949  }
2950  }
2951  if ($noprint) return $out;
2952  else print $out;
2953 }
2954 
2955 
2963 function isValidEmail($address, $acceptsupervisorkey = 0)
2964 {
2965  if ($acceptsupervisorkey && $address == '__SUPERVISOREMAIL__') return true;
2966  if (filter_var($address, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL)) return true;
2967 
2968  return false;
2969 }
2970 
2978 function isValidMXRecord($domain)
2979 {
2980  if (function_exists('idn_to_ascii') && function_exists('checkdnsrr'))
2981  {
2982  if (!checkdnsrr(idn_to_ascii($domain), 'MX'))
2983  {
2984  return 0;
2985  }
2986  if (function_exists('getmxrr'))
2987  {
2988  $mxhosts = array();
2989  $weight = array();
2990  getmxrr(idn_to_ascii($domain), $mxhosts, $weight);
2991  if (count($mxhosts) > 1) return 1;
2992  if (count($mxhosts) == 1 && !empty($mxhosts[0])) return 1;
2993 
2994  return 0;
2995  }
2996  }
2997  return -1;
2998 }
2999 
3007 function isValidPhone($phone)
3008 {
3009  return true;
3010 }
3011 
3012 
3020 function dol_strlen($string, $stringencoding = 'UTF-8')
3021 {
3022  if (function_exists('mb_strlen')) return mb_strlen($string, $stringencoding);
3023  else return strlen($string);
3024 }
3025 
3036 function dol_substr($string, $start, $length, $stringencoding = '', $trunconbytes = 0)
3037 {
3038  global $langs;
3039 
3040  if (empty($stringencoding)) $stringencoding = $langs->charset_output;
3041 
3042  $ret = '';
3043  if (empty($trunconbytes))
3044  {
3045  if (function_exists('mb_substr'))
3046  {
3047  $ret = mb_substr($string, $start, $length, $stringencoding);
3048  }
3049  else
3050  {
3051  $ret = substr($string, $start, $length);
3052  }
3053  }
3054  else
3055  {
3056  if (function_exists('mb_strcut'))
3057  {
3058  $ret = mb_strcut($string, $start, $length, $stringencoding);
3059  }
3060  else
3061  {
3062  $ret = substr($string, $start, $length);
3063  }
3064  }
3065  return $ret;
3066 }
3067 
3068 
3082 function dol_trunc($string, $size = 40, $trunc = 'right', $stringencoding = 'UTF-8', $nodot = 0, $display = 0)
3083 {
3084  global $conf;
3085 
3086  if ($size == 0 || !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_TRUNC)) return $string;
3087 
3088  if (empty($stringencoding)) $stringencoding = 'UTF-8';
3089  // reduce for small screen
3090  if ($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen == 1 && $display == 1) $size = round($size / 3);
3091 
3092  // We go always here
3093  if ($trunc == 'right')
3094  {
3095  $newstring = dol_textishtml($string) ?dol_string_nohtmltag($string, 1) : $string;
3096  if (dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > ($size + ($nodot ? 0 : 3))) // If nodot is 0 and size is 1,2 or 3 chars more, we don't trunc and don't add ...
3097  return dol_substr($newstring, 0, $size, $stringencoding).($nodot ? '' : '...');
3098  else
3099  //return 'u'.$size.'-'.$newstring.'-'.dol_strlen($newstring,$stringencoding).'-'.$string;
3100  return $string;
3101  }
3102  elseif ($trunc == 'middle')
3103  {
3104  $newstring = dol_textishtml($string) ?dol_string_nohtmltag($string, 1) : $string;
3105  if (dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > 2 && dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > ($size + 1))
3106  {
3107  $size1 = round($size / 2);
3108  $size2 = round($size / 2);
3109  return dol_substr($newstring, 0, $size1, $stringencoding).'...'.dol_substr($newstring, dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) - $size2, $size2, $stringencoding);
3110  }
3111  else
3112  return $string;
3113  }
3114  elseif ($trunc == 'left')
3115  {
3116  $newstring = dol_textishtml($string) ?dol_string_nohtmltag($string, 1) : $string;
3117  if (dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > ($size + ($nodot ? 0 : 3))) // If nodot is 0 and size is 1,2 or 3 chars more, we don't trunc and don't add ...
3118  return '...'.dol_substr($newstring, dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) - $size, $size, $stringencoding);
3119  else
3120  return $string;
3121  }
3122  elseif ($trunc == 'wrap')
3123  {
3124  $newstring = dol_textishtml($string) ?dol_string_nohtmltag($string, 1) : $string;
3125  if (dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > ($size + 1))
3126  return dol_substr($newstring, 0, $size, $stringencoding)."\n".dol_trunc(dol_substr($newstring, $size, dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) - $size, $stringencoding), $size, $trunc);
3127  else
3128  return $string;
3129  }
3130  else return 'BadParam3CallingDolTrunc';
3131 }
3132 
3152 function img_picto($titlealt, $picto, $moreatt = '', $pictoisfullpath = false, $srconly = 0, $notitle = 0, $alt = '', $morecss = '', $marginleftonlyshort = 2)
3153 {
3154  global $conf, $langs;
3155 
3156  // We forge fullpathpicto for image to $path/img/$picto. By default, we take DOL_URL_ROOT/theme/$conf->theme/img/$picto
3157  $url = DOL_URL_ROOT;
3158  $theme = $conf->theme;
3159  $path = 'theme/'.$theme;
3160 
3161  // Define fullpathpicto to use into src
3162  if ($pictoisfullpath) {
3163  // Clean parameters
3164  if (!preg_match('/(\.png|\.gif|\.svg)$/i', $picto)) {
3165  $picto .= '.png';
3166  }
3167  $fullpathpicto = $picto;
3168  $reg = array();
3169  if (preg_match('/class="([^"]+)"/', $moreatt, $reg)) {
3170  $morecss .= ($morecss ? ' ' : '').$reg[1];
3171  $moreatt = str_replace('class="'.$reg[1].'"', '', $moreatt);
3172  }
3173  } else {
3174  $pictowithouttext = preg_replace('/(\.png|\.gif|\.svg)$/', '', $picto);

3308  'ticket'=>'infobox-contrat', 'title_accountancy'=>'infobox-bank_account', 'title_hrm'=>'infobox-holiday', 'trip'=>'infobox-expensereport', 'title_agenda'=>'infobox-action',
3309  //'title_setup'=>'infobox-action', 'tools'=>'infobox-action',
3310  'list-alt'=>'imgforviewmode', 'calendar'=>'imgforviewmode', 'calendarweek'=>'imgforviewmode', 'calendarmonth'=>'imgforviewmode', 'calendarday'=>'imgforviewmode', 'calendarperuser'=>'imgforviewmode'
3311  );

3313  $morecss .= ($morecss ? ' ' : '').$arrayconvpictotomorcess[$pictowithouttext];
3314  }
3315 
3316  // Define $color
3317  $arrayconvpictotocolor = array(
3318  'address'=>'#37a', 'building'=>'#37a', 'bom'=>'#a69944',
3319  'companies'=>'#37a', 'company'=>'#37a', 'contact'=>'#37a', 'dynamicprice'=>'#a69944',

3322  'map-marker-alt'=>'#aaa', 'mrp'=>'#a69944', 'product'=>'#a69944', 'service'=>'#a69944', 'stock'=>'#a69944',
3323  'other'=>'#ddd',
3324  'playdisabled'=>'#ccc', 'printer'=>'#444', 'projectpub'=>'#986c6a', 'resize'=>'#444', 'rss'=>'#cba',
3325  'shipment'=>'#a69944', 'stats'=>'#444', 'switch_off'=>'#999', 'uparrow'=>'#555', 'globe-americas'=>'#aaa',
3326  'website'=>'#304'
3327  );
3328  if (isset($arrayconvpictotocolor[$pictowithouttext])) {
3329  $facolor = $arrayconvpictotocolor[$pictowithouttext];
3330  }
3331 
3332  // This snippet only needed since function img_edit accepts only one additional parameter: no separate one for css only.
3333  // class/style need to be extracted to avoid duplicate class/style validation errors when $moreatt is added to the end of the attributes.
3334  $reg = array();
3335  if (preg_match('/class="([^"]+)"/', $moreatt, $reg)) {
3336  $morecss .= ($morecss ? ' ' : '').$reg[1];
3337  $moreatt = str_replace('class="'.$reg[1].'"', '', $moreatt);
3338  }
3339  if (preg_match('/style="([^"]+)"/', $moreatt, $reg)) {
3340  $morestyle = ' '.$reg[1];
3341  $moreatt = str_replace('style="'.$reg[1].'"', '', $moreatt);
3342  }
3343  $moreatt = trim($moreatt);
3344 
3345  $enabledisablehtml = '<span class="'.$fa.' '.$fakey.($marginleftonlyshort ? ($marginleftonlyshort == 1 ? ' marginleftonlyshort' : ' marginleftonly') : '');
3346  $enabledisablehtml .= ($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" style="'.($fasize ? ('font-size: '.$fasize.';') : '').($facolor ? (' color: '.$facolor.';') : '').($morestyle ? ' '.$morestyle : '').'"'.(($notitle || empty($titlealt)) ? '' : ' title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'"').($moreatt ? ' '.$moreatt : '').'>';
3347  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZEFORTEXTBROWSER)) {
3348  $enabledisablehtml .= $titlealt;
3349  }
3350  $enabledisablehtml .= '</span>';
3351 
3352  return $enabledisablehtml;
3353  }
3354 
3355  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_PATH)) {
3356  $path = $conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_PATH.'/theme/'.$theme; // If the theme does not have the same name as the module
3357  }
3358  elseif (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_RES)) {
3359  $path = $conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_RES.'/theme/'.$conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_RES; // To allow an external module to overwrite image resources whatever is activated theme
3360  }
3361  elseif (!empty($conf->modules_parts['theme']) && array_key_exists($theme, $conf->modules_parts['theme'])) {
3362  $path = $theme.'/theme/'.$theme; // If the theme have the same name as the module
3363  }
3364 
3365  // If we ask an image into $url/$mymodule/img (instead of default path)
3366  $regs = array();
3367  if (preg_match('/^([^@]+)@([^@]+)$/i', $picto, $regs)) {
3368  $picto = $regs[1];
3369  $path = $regs[2]; // $path is $mymodule
3370  }
3371 
3372  // Clean parameters
3373  if (!preg_match('/(\.png|\.gif|\.svg)$/i', $picto)) {
3374  $picto .= '.png';
3375  }
3376  // If alt path are defined, define url where img file is, according to physical path
3377  // ex: array(["main"]=>"/home/maindir/htdocs", ["alt0"]=>"/home/moddir0/htdocs", ...)
3378  foreach ($conf->file->dol_document_root as $type => $dirroot) {
3379  if ($type == 'main') {
3380  continue;
3381  }
3382  // This need a lot of time, that's why enabling alternative dir like "custom" dir is not recommanded
3383  if (file_exists($dirroot.'/'.$path.'/img/'.$picto)) {
3384  $url = DOL_URL_ROOT.$conf->file->dol_url_root[$type];
3385  break;
3386  }
3387  }
3388 
3389  // $url is '' or '/custom', $path is current theme or
3390  $fullpathpicto = $url.'/'.$path.'/img/'.$picto;
3391  }
3392 
3393  if ($srconly) {
3394  return $fullpathpicto;
3395  }
3396  // tag title is used for tooltip on <a>, tag alt can be used with very simple text on image for blind people
3397  return '<img src="'.$fullpathpicto.'" alt="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'"'.(($notitle || empty($titlealt)) ? '' : ' title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'"').($moreatt ? ' '.$moreatt.($morecss ? ' class="'.$morecss.'"' : '') : ' class="inline-block'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"').'>'; // Alt is used for accessibility, title for popup
3398 }
3399 
3413 function img_object($titlealt, $picto, $moreatt = '', $pictoisfullpath = false, $srconly = 0, $notitle = 0)
3414 {
3415  if (strpos($picto, '^') === 0) return img_picto($titlealt, str_replace('^', '', $picto), $moreatt, $pictoisfullpath, $srconly, $notitle);
3416  else return img_picto($titlealt, 'object_'.$picto, $moreatt, $pictoisfullpath, $srconly, $notitle);
3417 }
3418 
3430 function img_weather($titlealt, $picto, $moreatt = '', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $morecss = '')
3431 {
3432  global $conf;
3433 
3434  if (is_numeric($picto))
3435  {
3436  $leveltopicto = array(0=>'weather-clear.png', 1=>'weather-few-clouds.png', 2=>'weather-clouds.png', 3=>'weather-many-clouds.png', 4=>'weather-storm.png');
3437  //return '<i class="fa fa-weather-level'.$picto.'"></i>';
3438  $picto = $leveltopicto[$picto];
3439  }
3440  elseif (!preg_match('/(\.png|\.gif)$/i', $picto)) $picto .= '.png';
3441 
3442  $path = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/'.$conf->theme.'/img/weather/'.$picto;
3443 
3444  return img_picto($titlealt, $path, $moreatt, 1, 0, 0, '', $morecss);
3445 }
3446 
3457 function img_picto_common($titlealt, $picto, $moreatt = '', $pictoisfullpath = 0)
3458 {
3459  global $conf;
3460 
3461  if (!preg_match('/(\.png|\.gif)$/i', $picto)) $picto .= '.png';
3462 
3463  if ($pictoisfullpath) $path = $picto;
3464  else
3465  {
3466  $path = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/'.$picto;
3467 
3468  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MODULE_CAN_OVERWRITE_COMMONICONS))
3469  {
3470  $themepath = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/theme/'.$conf->theme.'/img/'.$picto;
3471 
3472  if (file_exists($themepath)) $path = $themepath;
3473  }
3474  }
3475 
3476  return img_picto($titlealt, $path, $moreatt, 1);
3477 }
3478 
3486 function img_action($titlealt, $numaction)
3487 {
3488  global $langs;
3489 
3490  if (empty($titlealt) || $titlealt == 'default')
3491  {
3492  if ($numaction == '-1' || $numaction == 'ST_NO') { $numaction = -1; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeDoNotContact'); }
3493  elseif ($numaction == '0' || $numaction == 'ST_NEVER') { $numaction = 0; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeNeverContacted'); }
3494  elseif ($numaction == '1' || $numaction == 'ST_TODO') { $numaction = 1; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeToContact'); }
3495  elseif ($numaction == '2' || $numaction == 'ST_PEND') { $numaction = 2; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeContactInProcess'); }
3496  elseif ($numaction == '3' || $numaction == 'ST_DONE') { $numaction = 3; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeContactDone'); }
3497  else { $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeStatus '.$numaction); $numaction = 0; }
3498  }
3499  if (!is_numeric($numaction)) $numaction = 0;
3500 
3501  return img_picto($titlealt, 'stcomm'.$numaction.'.png');
3502 }
3503

3829 function img_credit_card($brand, $morecss = null)
3830 {
3831  if (is_null($morecss)) $morecss = 'fa-2x';
3832 
3833  if ($brand == 'visa' || $brand == 'Visa') {$brand = 'cc-visa'; }
3834  elseif ($brand == 'mastercard' || $brand == 'MasterCard') {$brand = 'cc-mastercard'; }
3835  elseif ($brand == 'amex' || $brand == 'American Express') {$brand = 'cc-amex'; }
3836  elseif ($brand == 'discover' || $brand == 'Discover') {$brand = 'cc-discover'; }
3837  elseif ($brand == 'jcb' || $brand == 'JCB') {$brand = 'cc-jcb'; }
3838  elseif ($brand == 'diners' || $brand == 'Diners club') {$brand = 'cc-diners-club'; }
3839  elseif (!in_array($brand, array('cc-visa', 'cc-mastercard', 'cc-amex', 'cc-discover', 'cc-jcb', 'cc-diners-club'))) {$brand = 'credit-card'; }
3840 
3841  return '<span class="fa fa-'.$brand.' fa-fw'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"></span>';
3842 }
3843 
3852 function img_mime($file, $titlealt = '', $morecss = '')
3853 {
3854  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
3855 
3856  $mimetype = dol_mimetype($file, '', 1);
3857  $mimeimg = dol_mimetype($file, '', 2);
3858  $mimefa = dol_mimetype($file, '', 4);
3859 
3860  if (empty($titlealt)) $titlealt = 'Mime type: '.$mimetype;
3861 
3862  //return img_picto_common($titlealt, 'mime/'.$mimeimg, 'class="'.$morecss.'"');
3863  return '<i class="fa fa-'.$mimefa.' paddingright"'.($titlealt ? ' title="'.$titlealt.'"' : '').'></i>';
3864 }

3874 function img_search($titlealt = 'default', $other = '')
3875 {
3876  global $conf, $langs;
3877

3881 
3882  $input = '<input type="image" class="liste_titre" name="button_search" src="'.$img.'" ';
3883  $input .= 'value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'" >';
3884 
3885  return $input;

3920 function info_admin($text, $infoonimgalt = 0, $nodiv = 0, $admin = '1', $morecss = '', $textfordropdown = '')
3921 {
3922  global $conf, $langs;
3923 
3924  if ($infoonimgalt)
3925  {
3926  $result = img_picto($text, 'info', 'class="hideonsmartphone'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"');
3927  }
3928  else {
3929  if (empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) $textfordropdown = '';
3930 
3931  $class = (empty($admin) ? 'undefined' : ($admin == '1' ? 'info' : $admin));
3932  $result = ($nodiv ? '' : '<div class="'.$class.' hideonsmartphone'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').($textfordropdown ? ' hidden' : '').'">').'<span class="fa fa-info-circle" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($admin ? $langs->trans('InfoAdmin') : $langs->trans('Note')).'"></span> '.$text.($nodiv ? '' : '</div>');
3933 
3934  if ($textfordropdown) {
3935  $tmpresult .= '<span class="'.$class.'text opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans($textfordropdown).' '.img_picto($langs->trans($textfordropdown), '1downarrow').'</span>';
3936  $tmpresult .= '<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
3937  jQuery(document).ready(function() {
3938  jQuery(".'.$class.'text").click(function() {
3939  console.log("toggle text");
3940  jQuery(".'.$class.'").toggle();
3941  });
3942  });
3943  </script>';
3944 
3945  $result = $tmpresult.$result;
3946  }
3947  }
3948 
3949  return $result;
3950 }
3951 
3952 
3964 function dol_print_error($db = '', $error = '', $errors = null)
3965 {
3966  global $conf, $langs, $argv;
3967  global $dolibarr_main_prod;
3968 
3969  $out = '';
3970  $syslog = '';
3971 
3972  // Si erreur intervenue avant chargement langue
3973  if (!$langs)
3974  {
3975  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/translate.class.php';
3976  $langs = new Translate('', $conf);
3977  $langs->load("main");
3978  }
3979  // Load translation files required by the page
3980  $langs->loadLangs(array('main', 'errors'));
3981 
3982  if ($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']) // Mode web
3983  {
3984  $out .= $langs->trans("DolibarrHasDetectedError").".<br>\n";
3985  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL)) $out .= "You use an experimental or develop level of features, so please do NOT report any bugs, except if problem is confirmed moving option MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL back to 0.<br>\n";
3986  $out .= $langs->trans("InformationToHelpDiagnose").":<br>\n";
3987 
3988  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("Date").":</b> ".dol_print_date(time(), 'dayhourlog')."<br>\n";
3989  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("Dolibarr").":</b> ".DOL_VERSION." - https://www.dolibarr.org<br>\n";
3990  if (isset($conf->global->MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL)) $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("LevelOfFeature").":</b> ".$conf->global->MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL."<br>\n";
3991  if (function_exists("phpversion"))
3992  {
3993  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("PHP").":</b> ".phpversion()."<br>\n";
3994  }
3995  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("Server").":</b> ".$_SERVER["SERVER_SOFTWARE"]."<br>\n";
3996  if (function_exists("php_uname"))
3997  {
3998  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("OS").":</b> ".php_uname()."<br>\n";
3999  }
4000  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("UserAgent").":</b> ".$_SERVER["HTTP_USER_AGENT"]."<br>\n";
4001  $out .= "<br>\n";
4002  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("RequestedUrl").":</b> ".dol_htmlentities($_SERVER["REQUEST_URI"], ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8')."<br>\n";
4003  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("Referer").":</b> ".(isset($_SERVER["HTTP_REFERER"]) ?dol_htmlentities($_SERVER["HTTP_REFERER"], ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8') : '')."<br>\n";
4004  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("MenuManager").":</b> ".(isset($conf->standard_menu) ? $conf->standard_menu : '')."<br>\n";
4005  $out .= "<br>\n";
4006  $syslog .= "url=".dol_escape_htmltag($_SERVER["REQUEST_URI"]);
4007  $syslog .= ", query_string=".dol_escape_htmltag($_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]);
4008  }
4009  else // Mode CLI
4010  {
4011  $out .= '> '.$langs->transnoentities("ErrorInternalErrorDetected").":\n".$argv[0]."\n";
4012  $syslog .= "pid=".dol_getmypid();
4013  }
4014 
4015  if (!empty($conf->modules))
4016  {
4017  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("Modules").":</b> ".join(', ', $conf->modules)."<br>\n";
4018  }
4019 
4020  if (is_object($db))
4021  {
4022  if ($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']) // Mode web
4023  {
4024  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("DatabaseTypeManager").":</b> ".$db->type."<br>\n";
4025  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("RequestLastAccessInError").":</b> ".($db->lastqueryerror() ?dol_escape_htmltag($db->lastqueryerror()) : $langs->trans("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."<br>\n";
4026  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("ReturnCodeLastAccessInError").":</b> ".($db->lasterrno() ?dol_escape_htmltag($db->lasterrno()) : $langs->trans("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."<br>\n";
4027  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("InformationLastAccessInError").":</b> ".($db->lasterror() ?dol_escape_htmltag($db->lasterror()) : $langs->trans("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."<br>\n";
4028  $out .= "<br>\n";
4029  }
4030  else // Mode CLI
4031  {
4032  // No dol_escape_htmltag for output, we are in CLI mode
4033  $out .= '> '.$langs->transnoentities("DatabaseTypeManager").":\n".$db->type."\n";
4034  $out .= '> '.$langs->transnoentities("RequestLastAccessInError").":\n".($db->lastqueryerror() ? $db->lastqueryerror() : $langs->transnoentities("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."\n";
4035  $out .= '> '.$langs->transnoentities("ReturnCodeLastAccessInError").":\n".($db->lasterrno() ? $db->lasterrno() : $langs->transnoentities("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."\n";
4036  $out .= '> '.$langs->transnoentities("InformationLastAccessInError").":\n".($db->lasterror() ? $db->lasterror() : $langs->transnoentities("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."\n";
4037  }
4038  $syslog .= ", sql=".$db->lastquery();
4039  $syslog .= ", db_error=".$db->lasterror();
4040  }
4041 
4042  if ($error || $errors)
4043  {
4044  $langs->load("errors");
4045 
4046  // Merge all into $errors array
4047  if (is_array($error) && is_array($errors)) $errors = array_merge($error, $errors);
4048  elseif (is_array($error)) $errors = $error;
4049  elseif (is_array($errors)) $errors = array_merge(array($error), $errors);
4050  else $errors = array_merge(array($error));
4051 
4052  foreach ($errors as $msg)
4053  {
4054  if (empty($msg)) continue;
4055  if ($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']) // Mode web
4056  {
4057  $out .= "<b>".$langs->trans("Message").":</b> ".dol_escape_htmltag($msg)."<br>\n";
4058  }
4059  else // Mode CLI
4060  {
4061  $out .= '> '.$langs->transnoentities("Message").":\n".$msg."\n";
4062  }
4063  $syslog .= ", msg=".$msg;
4064  }
4065  }
4066  if (empty($dolibarr_main_prod) && $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'] && function_exists('xdebug_print_function_stack') && function_exists('xdebug_call_file'))
4067  {
4068  xdebug_print_function_stack();
4069  $out .= '<b>XDebug informations:</b>'."<br>\n";
4070  $out .= 'File: '.xdebug_call_file()."<br>\n";
4071  $out .= 'Line: '.xdebug_call_line()."<br>\n";
4072  $out .= 'Function: '.xdebug_call_function()."<br>\n";
4073  $out .= "<br>\n";
4074  }
4075 
4076  if (empty($dolibarr_main_prod)) print $out;
4077  else // This should not happen, except if there is a bug somewhere. Enabled and check log in such case.
4078  {
4079  print 'This website or feature is currently temporarly not available or failed after a technical error.<br><br>This may be due to a maintenance operation. Current status of operation are on next line...<br><br>'."\n";
4080  $langs->load("errors");
4081  print $langs->trans("DolibarrHasDetectedError").'. ';
4082  print $langs->trans("YouCanSetOptionDolibarrMainProdToZero");
4083  define("MAIN_CORE_ERROR", 1);
4084  }
4085  //else print 'Sorry, an error occured but the parameter $dolibarr_main_prod is defined in conf file so no message is reported to your browser. Please read the log file for error message.';
4086  dol_syslog("Error ".$syslog, LOG_ERR);
4087 }
4088 
4099 function dol_print_error_email($prefixcode, $errormessage = '', $errormessages = array(), $morecss = 'error', $email = '')
4100 {
4101  global $langs, $conf;
4102 
4103  if (empty($email)) $email = $conf->global->MAIN_INFO_SOCIETE_MAIL;
4104 
4105  $langs->load("errors");
4106  $now = dol_now();
4107 
4108  print '<br><div class="center login_main_message"><div class="'.$morecss.'">';
4109  print $langs->trans("ErrorContactEMail", $email, $prefixcode.dol_print_date($now, '%Y%m%d%H%M%S'));
4110  if ($errormessage) print '<br><br>'.$errormessage;
4111  if (is_array($errormessages) && count($errormessages))
4112  {
4113  foreach ($errormessages as $mesgtoshow)
4114  {
4115  print '<br><br>'.$mesgtoshow;
4116  }
4117  }
4118  print '</div></div>';
4119 }

4136 function print_liste_field_titre($name, $file = "", $field = "", $begin = "", $moreparam = "", $moreattrib = "", $sortfield = "", $sortorder = "", $prefix = "", $tooltip = "")

4140 
4158 function getTitleFieldOfList($name, $thead = 0, $file = "", $field = "", $begin = "", $moreparam = "", $moreattrib = "", $sortfield = "", $sortorder = "", $prefix = "", $disablesortlink = 0, $tooltip = '')
4159 {
4160  global $conf, $langs, $form;
4161  //print "$name, $file, $field, $begin, $options, $moreattrib, $sortfield, $sortorder<br>\n";
4162 
4163  if ($moreattrib == 'class="right"') $prefix .= 'right '; // For backward compatibility
4164 
4165  $sortorder = strtoupper($sortorder);
4166  $out = '';
4167  $sortimg = '';
4168 
4169  $tag = 'th';
4170  if ($thead == 2) $tag = 'div';
4171 
4172  $tmpsortfield = explode(',', $sortfield);
4173  $sortfield1 = trim($tmpsortfield[0]); // If $sortfield is 'd.datep,d.id', it becomes 'd.datep'
4174  $tmpfield = explode(',', $field);
4175  $field1 = trim($tmpfield[0]); // If $field is 'd.datep,d.id', it becomes 'd.datep'
4176 
4177  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_WRAPPING_ON_COLUMN_TITLE)) {
4178  $prefix = 'wrapcolumntitle '.$prefix;
4179  }
4180  //var_dump('field='.$field.' field1='.$field1.' sortfield='.$sortfield.' sortfield1='.$sortfield1);
4181  // If field is used as sort criteria we use a specific css class liste_titre_sel
4182  // Example if (sortfield,field)=("nom","xxx.nom") or (sortfield,field)=("nom","nom")
4183  if ($field1 && ($sortfield1 == $field1 || $sortfield1 == preg_replace("/^[^\.]+\./", "", $field1))) {
4184  $out .= '<'.$tag.' class="'.$prefix.'liste_titre_sel" '.$moreattrib;
4185  $out .= (($field && empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_WRAPPING_ON_COLUMN_TITLE) && preg_match('/^[a-zA-Z_0-9\s\.\-:]*$/', $name)) ? ' title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans($name)).'"' : '');
4186  $out .= '>';
4187  }
4188  else {
4189  $out .= '<'.$tag.' class="'.$prefix.'liste_titre" '.$moreattrib;
4190  $out .= (($field && empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_WRAPPING_ON_COLUMN_TITLE) && preg_match('/^[a-zA-Z_0-9\s\.\-:]*$/', $name)) ? ' title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans($name)).'"' : '');
4191  $out .= '>';
4192  }
4193 
4194  if (empty($thead) && $field && empty($disablesortlink)) // If this is a sort field
4195  {
4196  $options = preg_replace('/sortfield=([a-zA-Z0-9,\s\.]+)/i', '', $moreparam);
4197  $options = preg_replace('/sortorder=([a-zA-Z0-9,\s\.]+)/i', '', $options);
4198  $options = preg_replace('/&+/i', '&', $options);
4199  if (!preg_match('/^&/', $options)) $options = '&'.$options;
4200 
4201  $sortordertouseinlink = '';
4202  if ($field1 != $sortfield1) // We are on another field than current sorted field
4203  {
4204  if (preg_match('/^DESC/i', $sortorder))
4205  {
4206  $sortordertouseinlink .= str_repeat('desc,', count(explode(',', $field)));
4207  }
4208  else // We reverse the var $sortordertouseinlink
4209  {
4210  $sortordertouseinlink .= str_repeat('asc,', count(explode(',', $field)));
4211  }
4212  }
4213  else // We are on field that is the first current sorting criteria
4214  {
4215  if (preg_match('/^ASC/i', $sortorder)) // We reverse the var $sortordertouseinlink
4216  {
4217  $sortordertouseinlink .= str_repeat('desc,', count(explode(',', $field)));
4218  }
4219  else
4220  {
4221  $sortordertouseinlink .= str_repeat('asc,', count(explode(',', $field)));
4222  }
4223  }
4224  $sortordertouseinlink = preg_replace('/,$/', '', $sortordertouseinlink);
4225  $out .= '<a class="reposition" href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder='.$sortordertouseinlink.'&begin='.$begin.$options.'"';
4226  //$out .= (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_WRAPPING_ON_COLUMN_TITLE) ? ' title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans($name)).'"' : '');
4227  $out .= '>';
4228  }
4229 
4230  if ($tooltip) $out .= $form->textwithpicto($langs->trans($name), $langs->trans($tooltip));
4231  else $out .= $langs->trans($name);
4232 
4233  if (empty($thead) && $field && empty($disablesortlink)) // If this is a sort field
4234  {
4235  $out .= '</a>';
4236  }
4237 
4238  if (empty($thead) && $field) // If this is a sort field
4239  {
4240  $options = preg_replace('/sortfield=([a-zA-Z0-9,\s\.]+)/i', '', $moreparam);
4241  $options = preg_replace('/sortorder=([a-zA-Z0-9,\s\.]+)/i', '', $options);
4242  $options = preg_replace('/&+/i', '&', $options);
4243  if (!preg_match('/^&/', $options)) $options = '&'.$options;
4244 
4245  if (!$sortorder || $field1 != $sortfield1)
4246  {
4247  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=asc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_down("A-Z",0).'</a>';
4248  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=desc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_up("Z-A",0).'</a>';
4249  }
4250  else
4251  {
4252  if (preg_match('/^DESC/', $sortorder)) {
4253  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=asc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_down("A-Z",0).'</a>';
4254  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=desc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_up("Z-A",1).'</a>';
4255  $sortimg .= '<span class="nowrap">'.img_up("Z-A", 0, 'paddingleft').'</span>';
4256  }
4257  if (preg_match('/^ASC/', $sortorder)) {
4258  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=asc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_down("A-Z",1).'</a>';
4259  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=desc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_up("Z-A",0).'</a>';
4260  $sortimg .= '<span class="nowrap">'.img_down("A-Z", 0, 'paddingleft').'</span>';
4261  }
4262  }
4263  }
4264 
4265  $out .= $sortimg;
4266 
4267  $out .= '</'.$tag.'>';
4268 
4269  return $out;
4270 }
4271 
4280 function print_titre($title)
4281 {
4282  dol_syslog(__FUNCTION__." is deprecated", LOG_WARNING);
4283 
4284  print '<div class="titre">'.$title.'</div>';
4285 }

4298 function print_fiche_titre($title, $mesg = '', $picto = 'generic', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $id = '')

4300  print load_fiche_titre($title, $mesg, $picto, $pictoisfullpath, $id);

4302 
4316 function load_fiche_titre($titre, $morehtmlright = '', $picto = 'generic', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $id = '', $morecssontable = '', $morehtmlcenter = '')
4317 {
4318  global $conf;
4319 
4320  $return = '';
4321 
4322  if ($picto == 'setup') $picto = 'generic';
4323 
4324  $return .= "\n";
4325  $return .= '<table '.($id ? 'id="'.$id.'" ' : '').'class="centpercent notopnoleftnoright table-fiche-title'.($morecssontable ? ' '.$morecssontable : '').'">'; // maring bottom must be same than into print_barre_list
4326  $return .= '<tr class="titre">';
4327  if ($picto) $return .= '<td class="nobordernopadding widthpictotitle valignmiddle col-picto">'.img_picto('', $picto, 'class="valignmiddle widthpictotitle pictotitle"', $pictoisfullpath).'</td>';
4328  $return .= '<td class="nobordernopadding valignmiddle col-title">';
4329  $return .= '<div class="titre inline-block">'.$titre.'</div>';
4330  $return .= '</td>';
4331  if (dol_strlen($morehtmlcenter))
4332  {
4333  $return .= '<td class="nobordernopadding center valignmiddle">'.$morehtmlcenter.'</td>';
4334  }
4335  if (dol_strlen($morehtmlright))
4336  {
4337  $return .= '<td class="nobordernopadding titre_right wordbreakimp right valignmiddle">'.$morehtmlright.'</td>';
4338  }
4339  $return .= '</tr></table>'."\n";
4340 
4341  return $return;
4342 }
4343 
4366 function print_barre_liste($titre, $page, $file, $options = '', $sortfield = '', $sortorder = '', $morehtmlcenter = '', $num = -1, $totalnboflines = '', $picto = 'generic', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $morehtmlright = '', $morecss = '', $limit = -1, $hideselectlimit = 0, $hidenavigation = 0, $pagenavastextinput = 0)
4367 {
4368  global $conf, $langs;
4369 
4370  $savlimit = $limit;
4371  $savtotalnboflines = $totalnboflines;
4372  $totalnboflines = abs($totalnboflines);
4373 
4374  if ($picto == 'setup') $picto = 'title_setup.png';
4375  if (($conf->browser->name == 'ie') && $picto == 'generic') $picto = 'title.gif';
4376  if ($limit < 0) $limit = $conf->liste_limit;
4377  if ($savlimit != 0 && (($num > $limit) || ($num == -1) || ($limit == 0)))
4378  {
4379  $nextpage = 1;
4380  }
4381  else
4382  {
4383  $nextpage = 0;
4384  }
4385  //print 'totalnboflines='.$totalnboflines.'-savlimit='.$savlimit.'-limit='.$limit.'-num='.$num.'-nextpage='.$nextpage;
4386 
4387  print "\n";
4388  print "<!-- Begin title '".$titre."' -->\n";
4389  print '<table class="centpercent notopnoleftnoright table-fiche-title'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"><tr>'; // maring bottom must be same than into load_fiche_tire
4390 
4391  // Left
4392 
4393  if ($picto && $titre) print '<td class="nobordernopadding widthpictotitle valignmiddle col-picto">'.img_picto('', $picto, 'class="valignmiddle pictotitle widthpictotitle"', $pictoisfullpath).'</td>';
4394  print '<td class="nobordernopadding valignmiddle col-title">';
4395  print '<div class="titre inline-block">'.$titre;
4396  if (!empty($titre) && $savtotalnboflines >= 0 && (string) $savtotalnboflines != '') print '<span class="opacitymedium colorblack paddingleft">('.$totalnboflines.')</span>';
4397  print '</div></td>';
4398 
4399  // Center
4400  if ($morehtmlcenter)
4401  {
4402  print '<td class="nobordernopadding center valignmiddle">'.$morehtmlcenter.'</td>';
4403  }
4404 
4405  // Right
4406  print '<td class="nobordernopadding valignmiddle right">';
4407  if ($sortfield) $options .= "&sortfield=".urlencode($sortfield);
4408  if ($sortorder) $options .= "&sortorder=".urlencode($sortorder);
4409  // Show navigation bar
4410  $pagelist = '';
4411  if ($savlimit != 0 && ($page > 0 || $num > $limit))
4412  {
4413  if ($totalnboflines) // If we know total nb of lines
4414  {
4415  // Define nb of extra page links before and after selected page + ... + first or last
4416  $maxnbofpage = (empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) ? 4 : 0);
4417 
4418  if ($limit > 0) $nbpages = ceil($totalnboflines / $limit);
4419  else $nbpages = 1;
4420  $cpt = ($page - $maxnbofpage);
4421  if ($cpt < 0) { $cpt = 0; }
4422 
4423  if ($cpt >= 1)
4424  {
4425  if (empty($pagenavastextinput)) {
4426  $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><a href="'.$file.'?page=0'.$options.'">1</a></li>';
4427  if ($cpt > 2) $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><span class="inactive">...</span></li>';
4428  elseif ($cpt == 2) $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><a href="'.$file.'?page=1'.$options.'">2</a></li>';
4429  }
4430  }
4431 
4432  do
4433  {
4434  if ($pagenavastextinput) {
4435  if ($cpt == $page)
4436  {
4437  $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><input type="text" class="width25 center pageplusone" name="pageplusone" value="'.($page + 1).'"></li>';
4438  $pagelist .= '/';
4439  //if (($cpt + 1) < $nbpages) $pagelist .= '/';
4440  }
4441  } else {
4442  if ($cpt == $page)
4443  {
4444  $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><span class="active">'.($page + 1).'</span></li>';
4445  }
4446  else
4447  {
4448  $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><a href="'.$file.'?page='.$cpt.$options.'">'.($cpt + 1).'</a></li>';
4449  }
4450  }
4451  $cpt++;
4452  }
4453  while ($cpt < $nbpages && $cpt <= ($page + $maxnbofpage));
4454 
4455  if (empty($pagenavastextinput)) {
4456  if ($cpt < $nbpages)
4457  {
4458  if ($cpt < $nbpages - 2) $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><span class="inactive">...</span></li>';
4459  elseif ($cpt == $nbpages - 2) $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><a href="'.$file.'?page='.($nbpages - 2).$options.'">'.($nbpages - 1).'</a></li>';
4460  $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><a href="'.$file.'?page='.($nbpages - 1).$options.'">'.$nbpages.'</a></li>';
4461  }
4462  } else {
4463  //var_dump($page.' '.$cpt.' '.$nbpages);
4464  //if (($page + 1) < $nbpages) {
4465  $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><a href="'.$file.'?page='.($nbpages - 1).$options.'">'.$nbpages.'</a></li>';
4466  //}
4467  }
4468  }
4469  else
4470  {
4471  $pagelist .= '<li class="pagination"><span class="active">'.($page + 1)."</li>";
4472  }
4473  }
4474 
4475  if ($savlimit || $morehtmlright) {
4476  print_fleche_navigation($page, $file, $options, $nextpage, $pagelist, $morehtmlright, $savlimit, $totalnboflines, $hideselectlimit); // output the div and ul for previous/last completed with page numbers into $pagelist
4477  }
4478 
4479  // js to autoselect page field on focus
4480  if ($pagenavastextinput) {
4481  print ajax_autoselect('.pageplusone');
4482  }
4483 
4484  print '</td>';
4485 
4486  print '</tr></table>'."\n";
4487  print "<!-- End title -->\n\n";
4488 }
4489 
4504 function print_fleche_navigation($page, $file, $options = '', $nextpage = 0, $betweenarrows = '', $afterarrows = '', $limit = -1, $totalnboflines = 0, $hideselectlimit = 0)
4505 {
4506  global $conf, $langs;
4507 
4508  print '<div class="pagination"><ul>';
4509  if ((int) $limit > 0 && empty($hideselectlimit))
4510  {
4511  $pagesizechoices = '10:10,15:15,20:20,30:30,40:40,50:50,100:100,250:250,500:500,1000:1000,5000:5000';
4512  //$pagesizechoices.=',0:'.$langs->trans("All"); // Not yet supported
4513  //$pagesizechoices.=',2:2';
4514  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_PAGESIZE_CHOICES)) $pagesizechoices = $conf->global->MAIN_PAGESIZE_CHOICES;
4515 
4516  print '<li class="pagination">';
4517  print '<select class="flat selectlimit" name="limit" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("MaxNbOfRecordPerPage")).'">';
4518  $tmpchoice = explode(',', $pagesizechoices);
4519  $tmpkey = $limit.':'.$limit;
4520  if (!in_array($tmpkey, $tmpchoice)) $tmpchoice[] = $tmpkey;
4521  $tmpkey = $conf->liste_limit.':'.$conf->liste_limit;
4522  if (!in_array($tmpkey, $tmpchoice)) $tmpchoice[] = $tmpkey;
4523  asort($tmpchoice, SORT_NUMERIC);
4524  foreach ($tmpchoice as $val)
4525  {
4526  $selected = '';
4527  $tmp = explode(':', $val);
4528  $key = $tmp[0];
4529  $val = $tmp[1];
4530  if ($key != '' && $val != '')
4531  {
4532  if ((int) $key == (int) $limit)
4533  {
4534  $selected = ' selected="selected"';
4535  }
4536  print '<option name="'.$key.'"'.$selected.'>'.dol_escape_htmltag($val).'</option>'."\n";
4537  }
4538  }
4539  print '</select>';
4540  if ($conf->use_javascript_ajax)
4541  {
4542  print '<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE select limit to launch submit of page -->
4543  <script>
4544  jQuery(document).ready(function () {
4545  jQuery(".selectlimit").change(function() {
4546  console.log("Change limit. Send submit");
4547  $(this).parents(\'form:first\').submit();
4548  });
4549  });
4550  </script>
4551  ';
4552  }
4553  print '</li>';
4554  }
4555  if ($page > 0)
4556  {
4557  print '<li class="pagination paginationpage"><a class="paginationprevious" href="'.$file.'?page='.($page - 1).$options.'"><i class="fa fa-chevron-left" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Previous")).'"></i></a></li>';
4558  }
4559  if ($betweenarrows)
4560  {
4561  print '<!--<div class="betweenarrows nowraponall inline-block">-->';
4562  print $betweenarrows;
4563  print '<!--</div>-->';
4564  }
4565  if ($nextpage > 0)
4566  {
4567  print '<li class="pagination paginationpage"><a class="paginationnext" href="'.$file.'?page='.($page + 1).$options.'"><i class="fa fa-chevron-right" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Next")).'"></i></a></li>';
4568  }
4569  if ($afterarrows)
4570  {
4571  print '<li class="paginationafterarrows">';
4572  print $afterarrows;
4573  print '</li>';
4574  }
4575  print '</ul></div>'."\n";
4576 }
4577 
4578 
4589 function vatrate($rate, $addpercent = false, $info_bits = 0, $usestarfornpr = 0)
4590 {
4591  $morelabel = '';
4592 
4593  if (preg_match('/%/', $rate))
4594  {
4595  $rate = str_replace('%', '', $rate);
4596  $addpercent = true;
4597  }
4598  if (preg_match('/\((.*)\)/', $rate, $reg))
4599  {
4600  $morelabel = ' ('.$reg[1].')';
4601  $rate = preg_replace('/\s*'.preg_quote($morelabel, '/').'/', '', $rate);
4602  }
4603  if (preg_match('/\*/', $rate))
4604  {
4605  $rate = str_replace('*', '', $rate);
4606  $info_bits |= 1;
4607  }
4608 
4609  // If rate is '9/9/9' we don't change it. If rate is '9.000' we apply price()
4610  if (!preg_match('/\//', $rate)) $ret = price($rate, 0, '', 0, 0).($addpercent ? '%' : '');
4611  else
4612  {
4613  // TODO Split on / and output with a price2num to have clean numbers without ton of 000.
4614  $ret = $rate.($addpercent ? '%' : '');
4615  }
4616  if (($info_bits & 1) && $usestarfornpr >= 0) $ret .= ' *';
4617  $ret .= $morelabel;
4618  return $ret;
4619 }
4620 
4621 
4637 function price($amount, $form = 0, $outlangs = '', $trunc = 1, $rounding = -1, $forcerounding = -1, $currency_code = '')
4638 {
4639  global $langs, $conf;
4640 
4641  // Clean parameters
4642  if (empty($amount)) $amount = 0; // To have a numeric value if amount not defined or = ''
4643  $amount = (is_numeric($amount) ? $amount : 0); // Check if amount is numeric, for example, an error occured when amount value = o (letter) instead 0 (number)
4644  if ($rounding < 0) $rounding = min($conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_UNIT, $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_TOT);
4645  $nbdecimal = $rounding;
4646 
4647  // Output separators by default (french)
4648  $dec = ','; $thousand = ' ';
4649 
4650  // If $outlangs not forced, we use use language
4651  if (!is_object($outlangs)) $outlangs = $langs;
4652 
4653  if ($outlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorDecimal") != "SeparatorDecimal") $dec = $outlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorDecimal");
4654  if ($outlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorThousand") != "SeparatorThousand") $thousand = $outlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorThousand");
4655  if ($thousand == 'None') $thousand = '';
4656  elseif ($thousand == 'Space') $thousand = ' ';
4657  //print "outlangs=".$outlangs->defaultlang." amount=".$amount." html=".$form." trunc=".$trunc." nbdecimal=".$nbdecimal." dec='".$dec."' thousand='".$thousand."'<br>";
4658 
4659  //print "amount=".$amount."-";
4660  $amount = str_replace(',', '.', $amount); // should be useless
4661  //print $amount."-";
4662  $datas = explode('.', $amount);
4663  $decpart = isset($datas[1]) ? $datas[1] : '';
4664  $decpart = preg_replace('/0+$/i', '', $decpart); // Supprime les 0 de fin de partie decimale
4665  //print "decpart=".$decpart."<br>";
4666  $end = '';
4667 
4668  // We increase nbdecimal if there is more decimal than asked (to not loose information)
4669  if (dol_strlen($decpart) > $nbdecimal) $nbdecimal = dol_strlen($decpart);
4670  // Si on depasse max
4671  if ($trunc && $nbdecimal > $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_SHOWN)
4672  {
4673  $nbdecimal = $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_SHOWN;
4674  if (preg_match('/\.\.\./i', $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_SHOWN))
4675  {
4676  // Si un affichage est tronque, on montre des ...
4677  $end = '...';
4678  }
4679  }
4680 
4681  // If force rounding
4682  if ($forcerounding >= 0) $nbdecimal = $forcerounding;
4683 
4684  // Format number
4685  $output = number_format($amount, $nbdecimal, $dec, $thousand);
4686  if ($form)
4687  {
4688  $output = preg_replace('/\s/', '&nbsp;', $output);
4689  $output = preg_replace('/\'/', '&#039;', $output);
4690  }
4691  // Add symbol of currency if requested
4692  $cursymbolbefore = $cursymbolafter = '';
4693  if ($currency_code)
4694  {
4695  if ($currency_code == 'auto') $currency_code = $conf->currency;
4696 
4697  $listofcurrenciesbefore = array('AUD', 'CAD', 'CNY', 'COP', 'CLP', 'GBP', 'HKD', 'MXN', 'PEN', 'USD');
4698  $listoflanguagesbefore = array('nl_NL');
4699  if (in_array($currency_code, $listofcurrenciesbefore) || in_array($outlangs->defaultlang, $listoflanguagesbefore))
4700  {
4701  $cursymbolbefore .= $outlangs->getCurrencySymbol($currency_code);
4702  }
4703  else
4704  {
4705  $tmpcur = $outlangs->getCurrencySymbol($currency_code);
4706  $cursymbolafter .= ($tmpcur == $currency_code ? ' '.$tmpcur : $tmpcur);
4707  }
4708  }
4709  $output = $cursymbolbefore.$output.$end.($cursymbolafter ? ' ' : '').$cursymbolafter;
4710 
4711  return $output;
4712 }
4713 
4734 function price2num($amount, $rounding = '', $option = 0)
4735 {
4736  global $langs, $conf;
4737 
4738  // Round PHP function does not allow number like '1,234.56' nor '1.234,56' nor '1 234,56'
4739  // Numbers must be '1234.56'
4740  // Decimal delimiter for PHP and database SQL requests must be '.'
4741  $dec = ','; $thousand = ' ';
4742  if ($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorDecimal") != "SeparatorDecimal") $dec = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorDecimal");
4743  if ($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorThousand") != "SeparatorThousand") $thousand = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorThousand");
4744  if ($thousand == 'None') $thousand = '';
4745  elseif ($thousand == 'Space') $thousand = ' ';
4746  //print "amount=".$amount." html=".$form." trunc=".$trunc." nbdecimal=".$nbdecimal." dec='".$dec."' thousand='".$thousand."'<br>";
4747 
4748  // Convert value to universal number format (no thousand separator, '.' as decimal separator)
4749  if ($option != 1) { // If not a PHP number or unknown, we change or clean format
4750  //print 'PP'.$amount.' - '.$dec.' - '.$thousand.' - '.intval($amount).'<br>';
4751  if (!is_numeric($amount)) {
4752  $amount = preg_replace('/[a-zA-Z\/\\\*\(\)<>\_]/', '', $amount);
4753  }
4754 
4755  if ($option == 2 && $thousand == '.' && preg_match('/\.(\d\d\d)$/', (string) $amount)) { // It means the . is used as a thousand separator and string come frominput data, so 1.123 is 1123
4756  $amount = str_replace($thousand, '', $amount);
4757  }
4758 
4759  // Convert amount to format with dolibarr dec and thousand (this is because PHP convert a number
4760  // to format defined by LC_NUMERIC after a calculation and we want source format to be like defined by Dolibarr setup.
4761  // So if number was already a good number, it is converted into local Dolibarr setup.
4762  if (is_numeric($amount))
4763  {
4764  // We put in temps value of decimal ("0.00001"). Works with 0 and 2.0E-5 and 9999.10
4765  $temps = sprintf("%0.10F", $amount - intval($amount)); // temps=0.0000000000 or 0.0000200000 or 9999.1000000000
4766  $temps = preg_replace('/([\.1-9])0+$/', '\\1', $temps); // temps=0. or 0.00002 or 9999.1
4767  $nbofdec = max(0, dol_strlen($temps) - 2); // -2 to remove "0."
4768  $amount = number_format($amount, $nbofdec, $dec, $thousand);
4769  }
4770  //print "QQ".$amount."<br>\n";
4771 
4772  // Now make replace (the main goal of function)
4773  if ($thousand != ',' && $thousand != '.') {
4774  $amount = str_replace(',', '.', $amount); // To accept 2 notations for french users
4775  }
4776  $amount = str_replace(' ', '', $amount); // To avoid spaces
4777  $amount = str_replace($thousand, '', $amount); // Replace of thousand before replace of dec to avoid pb if thousand is .
4778  $amount = str_replace($dec, '.', $amount);
4779  }
4780 
4781  // Now, make a rounding if required
4782  if ($rounding)
4783  {
4784  $nbofdectoround = '';
4785  if ($rounding == 'MU') $nbofdectoround = $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_UNIT;
4786  elseif ($rounding == 'MT') $nbofdectoround = $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_TOT;
4787  elseif ($rounding == 'MS') $nbofdectoround = empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_STOCK) ? 5 : $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_STOCK;
4788  elseif ($rounding == 'CR') $nbofdectoround = 8;
4789  elseif (is_numeric($rounding)) $nbofdectoround = $rounding;
4790  //print "RR".$amount.' - '.$nbofdectoround.'<br>';
4791  if (dol_strlen($nbofdectoround)) $amount = round($amount, $nbofdectoround); // $nbofdectoround can be 0.
4792  else return 'ErrorBadParameterProvidedToFunction';
4793  //print 'SS'.$amount.' - '.$nbofdec.' - '.$dec.' - '.$thousand.' - '.$nbofdectoround.'<br>';
4794 
4795  // Convert amount to format with dolibarr dec and thousand (this is because PHP convert a number
4796  // to format defined by LC_NUMERIC after a calculation and we want source format to be defined by Dolibarr setup.
4797  if (is_numeric($amount))
4798  {
4799  // We put in temps value of decimal ("0.00001"). Works with 0 and 2.0E-5 and 9999.10
4800  $temps = sprintf("%0.10F", $amount - intval($amount)); // temps=0.0000000000 or 0.0000200000 or 9999.1000000000
4801  $temps = preg_replace('/([\.1-9])0+$/', '\\1', $temps); // temps=0. or 0.00002 or 9999.1
4802  $nbofdec = max(0, dol_strlen($temps) - 2); // -2 to remove "0."
4803  $amount = number_format($amount, min($nbofdec, $nbofdectoround), $dec, $thousand); // Convert amount to format with dolibarr dec and thousand
4804  }
4805  //print "TT".$amount.'<br>';
4806 
4807  // Always make replace because each math function (like round) replace
4808  // with local values and we want a number that has a SQL string format x.y
4809  if ($thousand != ',' && $thousand != '.') $amount = str_replace(',', '.', $amount); // To accept 2 notations for french users
4810  $amount = str_replace(' ', '', $amount); // To avoid spaces
4811  $amount = str_replace($thousand, '', $amount); // Replace of thousand before replace of dec to avoid pb if thousand is .
4812  $amount = str_replace($dec, '.', $amount);
4813  }
4814 
4815  return $amount;
4816 }
4817 
4829 function showDimensionInBestUnit($dimension, $unit, $type, $outputlangs, $round = -1, $forceunitoutput = 'no')
4830 {
4831  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/product.lib.php';
4832 
4833  if (($forceunitoutput == 'no' && $dimension < 1 / 10000 && $unit < 90) || (is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput == -6))
4834  {
4835  $dimension = $dimension * 1000000;
4836  $unit = $unit - 6;
4837  }
4838  elseif (($forceunitoutput == 'no' && $dimension < 1 / 10 && $unit < 90) || (is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput == -3))
4839  {
4840  $dimension = $dimension * 1000;
4841  $unit = $unit - 3;
4842  }
4843  elseif (($forceunitoutput == 'no' && $dimension > 100000000 && $unit < 90) || (is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput == 6))
4844  {
4845  $dimension = $dimension / 1000000;
4846  $unit = $unit + 6;
4847  }
4848  elseif (($forceunitoutput == 'no' && $dimension > 100000 && $unit < 90) || (is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput == 3))
4849  {
4850  $dimension = $dimension / 1000;
4851  $unit = $unit + 3;
4852  }
4853  // Special case when we want output unit into pound or ounce
4854  /* TODO
4855  if ($unit < 90 && $type == 'weight' && is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && (($forceunitoutput == 98) || ($forceunitoutput == 99))
4856  {
4857  $dimension = // convert dimension from standard unit into ounce or pound
4858  $unit = $forceunitoutput;
4859  }
4860  if ($unit > 90 && $type == 'weight' && is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput < 90)
4861  {
4862  $dimension = // convert dimension from standard unit into ounce or pound
4863  $unit = $forceunitoutput;
4864  }*/
4865 
4866  $ret = price($dimension, 0, $outputlangs, 0, 0, $round).' '.measuringUnitString(0, $type, $unit);
4867 
4868  return $ret;
4869 }
4870 
4871 
4884 function get_localtax($vatrate, $local, $thirdparty_buyer = "", $thirdparty_seller = "", $vatnpr = 0)
4885 {
4886  global $db, $conf, $mysoc;
4887 
4888  if (empty($thirdparty_seller) || !is_object($thirdparty_seller)) $thirdparty_seller = $mysoc;
4889 
4890  dol_syslog("get_localtax tva=".$vatrate." local=".$local." thirdparty_buyer id=".(is_object($thirdparty_buyer) ? $thirdparty_buyer->id : '')."/country_code=".(is_object($thirdparty_buyer) ? $thirdparty_buyer->country_code : '')." thirdparty_seller id=".$thirdparty_seller->id."/country_code=".$thirdparty_seller->country_code." thirdparty_seller localtax1_assuj=".$thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj." thirdparty_seller localtax2_assuj=".$thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj);
4891 
4892  $vatratecleaned = $vatrate;
4893  $reg = array();
4894  if (preg_match('/^(.*)\s*\((.*)\)$/', $vatrate, $reg)) // If vat is "xx (yy)"
4895  {
4896  $vatratecleaned = trim($reg[1]);
4897  $vatratecode = $reg[2];
4898  }
4899 
4900  /*if ($thirdparty_buyer->country_code != $thirdparty_seller->country_code)
4901  {
4902  return 0;
4903  }*/
4904 
4905  // Some test to guess with no need to make database access
4906  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'ES') // For spain localtaxes 1 and 2, tax is qualified if buyer use local tax
4907  {
4908  if ($local == 1)
4909  {
4910  if (!$mysoc->localtax1_assuj || (string) $vatratecleaned == "0") return 0;
4911  if ($thirdparty_seller->id == $mysoc->id)
4912  {
4913  if (!$thirdparty_buyer->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
4914  }
4915  else
4916  {
4917  if (!$thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
4918  }
4919  }
4920 
4921  if ($local == 2)
4922  {
4923  //if (! $mysoc->localtax2_assuj || (string) $vatratecleaned == "0") return 0;
4924  if (!$mysoc->localtax2_assuj) return 0; // If main vat is 0, IRPF may be different than 0.
4925  if ($thirdparty_seller->id == $mysoc->id)
4926  {
4927  if (!$thirdparty_buyer->localtax2_assuj) return 0;
4928  }
4929  else
4930  {
4931  if (!$thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) return 0;
4932  }
4933  }
4934  }
4935  else
4936  {
4937  if ($local == 1 && !$thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
4938  if ($local == 2 && !$thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) return 0;
4939  }
4940 
4941  // For some country MAIN_GET_LOCALTAXES_VALUES_FROM_THIRDPARTY is forced to on.
4942  if (in_array($mysoc->country_code, array('ES')))
4943  {
4944  $conf->global->MAIN_GET_LOCALTAXES_VALUES_FROM_THIRDPARTY = 1;
4945  }
4946 
4947  // Search local taxes
4948  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_GET_LOCALTAXES_VALUES_FROM_THIRDPARTY))
4949  {
4950  if ($local == 1)
4951  {
4952  if ($thirdparty_seller != $mysoc)
4953  {
4954  if (!isOnlyOneLocalTax($local)) // TODO We should provide $vatrate to search on correct line and not always on line with highest vat rate
4955  {
4956  return $thirdparty_seller->localtax1_value;
4957  }
4958  }
4959  else // i am the seller
4960  {
4961  if (!isOnlyOneLocalTax($local)) // TODO If seller is me, why not always returning this, even if there is only one locatax vat.
4962  {
4963  return $conf->global->MAIN_INFO_VALUE_LOCALTAX1;
4964  }
4965  }
4966  }
4967  if ($local == 2)
4968  {
4969  if ($thirdparty_seller != $mysoc)
4970  {
4971  if (!isOnlyOneLocalTax($local)) // TODO We should provide $vatrate to search on correct line and not always on line with highest vat rate
4972  // TODO We should also return value defined on thirdparty only if defined
4973  {
4974  return $thirdparty_seller->localtax2_value;
4975  }
4976  }
4977  else // i am the seller
4978  {
4979  if (in_array($mysoc->country_code, array('ES')))
4980  {
4981  return $thirdparty_buyer->localtax2_value;
4982  }
4983  else
4984  {
4985  return $conf->global->MAIN_INFO_VALUE_LOCALTAX2;
4986  }
4987  }
4988  }
4989  }
4990 
4991  // By default, search value of local tax on line of common tax
4992  $sql = "SELECT t.localtax1, t.localtax2, t.localtax1_type, t.localtax2_type";
4993  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
4994  $sql .= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$db->escape($thirdparty_seller->country_code)."'";
4995  $sql .= " AND t.taux = ".((float) $vatratecleaned)." AND t.active = 1";
4996  if ($vatratecode) $sql .= " AND t.code ='".$db->escape($vatratecode)."'"; // If we have the code, we use it in priority
4997  else $sql .= " AND t.recuperableonly ='".$db->escape($vatnpr)."'";
4998  dol_syslog("get_localtax", LOG_DEBUG);
4999  $resql = $db->query($sql);
5000 
5001  if ($resql)
5002  {
5003  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
5004  if ($local == 1) return $obj->localtax1;
5005  elseif ($local == 2) return $obj->localtax2;
5006  }
5007 
5008  return 0;
5009 }
5010 
5011 
5020 function isOnlyOneLocalTax($local)
5021 {
5022  $tax = get_localtax_by_third($local);
5023 
5024  $valors = explode(":", $tax);
5025 
5026  if (count($valors) > 1)
5027  {
5028  return false;
5029  }
5030  else
5031  {
5032  return true;
5033  }
5034 }
5035 
5042 function get_localtax_by_third($local)
5043 {
5044  global $db, $mysoc;
5045  $sql = "SELECT t.localtax1, t.localtax2 ";
5046  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t inner join ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c ON c.rowid=t.fk_pays";
5047  $sql .= " WHERE c.code = '".$mysoc->country_code."' AND t.active = 1 AND t.taux=(";
5048  $sql .= " SELECT max(tt.taux) FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as tt inner join ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c ON c.rowid=tt.fk_pays";
5049  $sql .= " WHERE c.code = '".$mysoc->country_code."' AND tt.active = 1";
5050  $sql .= " )";
5051 
5052  $resql = $db->query($sql);
5053  if ($resql)
5054  {
5055  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
5056  if ($local == 1) return $obj->localtax1;
5057  elseif ($local == 2) return $obj->localtax2;
5058  }
5059 
5060  return 0;
5061 }
5062 
5063 
5075 function getTaxesFromId($vatrate, $buyer = null, $seller = null, $firstparamisid = 1)
5076 {
5077  global $db, $mysoc;
5078 
5079  dol_syslog("getTaxesFromId vat id or rate = ".$vatrate);
5080 
5081  // Search local taxes
5082  $sql = "SELECT t.rowid, t.code, t.taux as rate, t.recuperableonly as npr, t.accountancy_code_sell, t.accountancy_code_buy";
5083  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t";
5084  if ($firstparamisid) $sql .= " WHERE t.rowid = ".(int) $vatrate;
5085  else
5086  {
5087  $vatratecleaned = $vatrate;
5088  $vatratecode = '';
5089  if (preg_match('/^(.*)\s*\((.*)\)$/', $vatrate, $reg)) // If vat is "xx (yy)"
5090  {
5091  $vatratecleaned = $reg[1];
5092  $vatratecode = $reg[2];
5093  }
5094 
5095  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
5096  /*if ($mysoc->country_code == 'ES') $sql.= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$buyer->country_code."'"; // vat in spain use the buyer country ??
5097  else $sql.= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$seller->country_code."'";*/
5098  $sql .= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$seller->country_code."'";
5099  $sql .= " AND t.taux = ".((float) $vatratecleaned)." AND t.active = 1";
5100  if ($vatratecode) $sql .= " AND t.code = '".$vatratecode."'";
5101  }
5102 
5103  $resql = $db->query($sql);
5104  if ($resql)
5105  {
5106  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
5107  if ($obj) return array('rowid'=>$obj->rowid, 'code'=>$obj->code, 'rate'=>$obj->rate, 'npr'=>$obj->npr, 'accountancy_code_sell'=>$obj->accountancy_code_sell, 'accountancy_code_buy'=>$obj->accountancy_code_buy);
5108  else return array();
5109  }
5110  else dol_print_error($db);
5111 
5112  return array();
5113 }
5114 
5131 function getLocalTaxesFromRate($vatrate, $local, $buyer, $seller, $firstparamisid = 0)
5132 {
5133  global $db, $mysoc;
5134 
5135  dol_syslog("getLocalTaxesFromRate vatrate=".$vatrate." local=".$local);
5136 
5137  // Search local taxes
5138  $sql = "SELECT t.taux as rate, t.code, t.localtax1, t.localtax1_type, t.localtax2, t.localtax2_type, t.accountancy_code_sell, t.accountancy_code_buy";
5139  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t";
5140  if ($firstparamisid) $sql .= " WHERE t.rowid = ".(int) $vatrate;
5141  else
5142  {
5143  $vatratecleaned = $vatrate;
5144  $vatratecode = '';
5145  $reg = array();
5146  if (preg_match('/^(.*)\s*\((.*)\)$/', $vatrate, $reg)) // If vat is "x.x (yy)"
5147  {
5148  $vatratecleaned = $reg[1];
5149  $vatratecode = $reg[2];
5150  }
5151 
5152  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
5153  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'ES') $sql .= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$db->escape($buyer->country_code)."'"; // local tax in spain use the buyer country ??
5154  else $sql .= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$db->escape($seller->country_code)."'";
5155  $sql .= " AND t.taux = ".((float) $vatratecleaned)." AND t.active = 1";
5156  if ($vatratecode) $sql .= " AND t.code = '".$db->escape($vatratecode)."'";
5157  }
5158 
5159  $resql = $db->query($sql);
5160  if ($resql)
5161  {
5162  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
5163 
5164  $vateratestring = $obj->rate.($obj->code ? ' ('.$obj->code.')' : '');
5165 
5166  if ($local == 1)
5167  {
5168  return array($obj->localtax1_type, get_localtax($vateratestring, $local, $buyer, $seller), $obj->accountancy_code_sell, $obj->accountancy_code_buy);
5169  }
5170  elseif ($local == 2)
5171  {
5172  return array($obj->localtax2_type, get_localtax($vateratestring, $local, $buyer, $seller), $obj->accountancy_code_sell, $obj->accountancy_code_buy);
5173  }
5174  else
5175  {
5176  return array($obj->localtax1_type, get_localtax($vateratestring, 1, $buyer, $seller), $obj->localtax2_type, get_localtax($vateratestring, 2, $buyer, $seller), $obj->accountancy_code_sell, $obj->accountancy_code_buy);
5177  }
5178  }
5179 
5180  return 0;
5181 }
5182 
5193 function get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_seller, $idprodfournprice = 0)
5194 {
5195  global $db, $conf, $mysoc;
5196 
5197  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
5198 
5199  $ret = 0;
5200  $found = 0;
5201 
5202  if ($idprod > 0)
5203  {
5204  // Load product
5205  $product = new Product($db);
5206  $result = $product->fetch($idprod);
5207 
5208  if ($mysoc->country_code == $thirdparty_seller->country_code) // If selling country is ours
5209  {
5210  if ($idprodfournprice > 0) // We want vat for product for a "supplier" object
5211  {
5212  $product->get_buyprice($idprodfournprice, 0, 0, 0);
5213  $ret = $product->vatrate_supplier;
5214  if ($product->default_vat_code) $ret .= ' ('.$product->default_vat_code.')';
5215  }
5216  else
5217  {
5218  $ret = $product->tva_tx; // Default vat of product we defined
5219  if ($product->default_vat_code) $ret .= ' ('.$product->default_vat_code.')';
5220  }
5221  $found = 1;
5222  }
5223  else
5224  {
5225  // TODO Read default product vat according to countrycode and product. Vat for couple countrycode/product is a feature not implemeted yet.
5226  // May be usefull/required if hidden option SERVICE_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC is on
5227  }
5228  }
5229 
5230  if (!$found)
5231  {
5232  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS))
5233  {
5234  // If vat of product for the country not found or not defined, we return the first higher vat of country.
5235  $sql = "SELECT t.taux as vat_rate, t.code as default_vat_code";
5236  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
5237  $sql .= " WHERE t.active=1 AND t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code='".$thirdparty_seller->country_code."'";
5238  $sql .= " ORDER BY t.taux DESC, t.code ASC, t.recuperableonly ASC";
5239  $sql .= $db->plimit(1);
5240 
5241  $resql = $db->query($sql);
5242  if ($resql)
5243  {
5244  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
5245  if ($obj)
5246  {
5247  $ret = $obj->vat_rate;
5248  if ($obj->default_vat_code) $ret .= ' ('.$obj->default_vat_code.')';
5249  }
5250  $db->free($sql);
5251  }
5252  else dol_print_error($db);
5253  }
5254  else $ret = $conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS; // Forced value if autodetect fails
5255  }
5256 
5257  dol_syslog("get_product_vat_for_country: ret=".$ret);
5258  return $ret;
5259 }
5260 
5270 function get_product_localtax_for_country($idprod, $local, $thirdparty_seller)
5271 {
5272  global $db, $mysoc;
5273 
5274  if (!class_exists('Product')) {
5275  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
5276  }
5277 
5278  $ret = 0;
5279  $found = 0;
5280 
5281  if ($idprod > 0)
5282  {
5283  // Load product
5284  $product = new Product($db);
5285  $result = $product->fetch($idprod);
5286 
5287  if ($mysoc->country_code == $thirdparty_seller->country_code) // If selling country is ours
5288  {
5289  /* Not defined yet, so we don't use this
5290  if ($local==1) $ret=$product->localtax1_tx;
5291  elseif ($local==2) $ret=$product->localtax2_tx;
5292  $found=1;
5293  */
5294  }
5295  else
5296  {
5297  // TODO Read default product vat according to countrycode and product
5298  }
5299  }
5300 
5301  if (!$found)
5302  {
5303  // If vat of product for the country not found or not defined, we return higher vat of country.
5304  $sql = "SELECT taux as vat_rate, localtax1, localtax2";
5305  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
5306  $sql .= " WHERE t.active=1 AND t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code='".$thirdparty_seller->country_code."'";
5307  $sql .= " ORDER BY t.taux DESC, t.recuperableonly ASC";
5308  $sql .= $db->plimit(1);
5309 
5310  $resql = $db->query($sql);
5311  if ($resql)
5312  {
5313  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
5314  if ($obj)
5315  {
5316  if ($local == 1) $ret = $obj->localtax1;
5317  elseif ($local == 2) $ret = $obj->localtax2;
5318  }
