5319  }
5320  else dol_print_error($db);
5321  }
5322 
5323  dol_syslog("get_product_localtax_for_country: ret=".$ret);
5324  return $ret;
5325 }
5326 
5343 function get_default_tva(Societe $thirdparty_seller, Societe $thirdparty_buyer, $idprod = 0, $idprodfournprice = 0)
5344 {
5345  global $conf;
5346 
5347  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/company.lib.php';
5348 
5349  // Note: possible values for tva_assuj are 0/1 or franchise/reel
5350  $seller_use_vat = ((is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->tva_assuj) && !$thirdparty_seller->tva_assuj) || (!is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->tva_assuj) && $thirdparty_seller->tva_assuj == 'franchise')) ? 0 : 1;
5351 
5352  $seller_country_code = $thirdparty_seller->country_code;
5353  $seller_in_cee = isInEEC($thirdparty_seller);
5354 
5355  $buyer_country_code = $thirdparty_buyer->country_code;
5356  $buyer_in_cee = isInEEC($thirdparty_buyer);
5357 
5358  dol_syslog("get_default_tva: seller use vat=".$seller_use_vat.", seller country=".$seller_country_code.", seller in cee=".$seller_in_cee.", buyer vat number=".$thirdparty_buyer->tva_intra." buyer country=".$buyer_country_code.", buyer in cee=".$buyer_in_cee.", idprod=".$idprod.", idprodfournprice=".$idprodfournprice.", SERVICE_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC=".(!empty($conf->global->SERVICES_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC) ? $conf->global->SERVICES_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC : ''));
5359 
5360  // If services are eServices according to EU Council Directive 2002/38/EC (http://ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/taxation/vat/traders/e-commerce/article_1610_en.htm)
5361  // we use the buyer VAT.
5362  if (!empty($conf->global->SERVICE_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC))
5363  {
5364  if ($seller_in_cee && $buyer_in_cee && !$thirdparty_buyer->isACompany())
5365  {
5366  //print 'VATRULE 0';
5367  return get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_buyer, $idprodfournprice);
5368  }
5369  }
5370 
5371  // If seller does not use VAT
5372  if (!$seller_use_vat)
5373  {
5374  //print 'VATRULE 1';
5375  return 0;
5376  }
5377 
5378  // Le test ci-dessus ne devrait pas etre necessaire. Me signaler l'exemple du cas juridique concerne si le test suivant n'est pas suffisant.
5379 
5380  // Si le (pays vendeur = pays acheteur) alors la TVA par defaut=TVA du produit vendu. Fin de regle.
5381  if (($seller_country_code == $buyer_country_code)
5382  || (in_array($seller_country_code, array('FR,MC')) && in_array($buyer_country_code, array('FR', 'MC')))) // Warning ->country_code not always defined
5383  {
5384  //print 'VATRULE 2';
5385  return get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_seller, $idprodfournprice);
5386  }
5387 
5388  // Si (vendeur et acheteur dans Communaute europeenne) et (bien vendu = moyen de transports neuf comme auto, bateau, avion) alors TVA par defaut=0 (La TVA doit etre paye par l'acheteur au centre d'impots de son pays et non au vendeur). Fin de regle.
5389  // Not supported
5390 
5391  // Si (vendeur et acheteur dans Communaute europeenne) et (acheteur = entreprise) alors TVA par defaut=0. Fin de regle
5392  // Si (vendeur et acheteur dans Communaute europeenne) et (acheteur = particulier) alors TVA par defaut=TVA du produit vendu. Fin de regle
5393  if (($seller_in_cee && $buyer_in_cee))
5394  {
5395  $isacompany = $thirdparty_buyer->isACompany();
5396  if ($isacompany)
5397  {
5398  //print 'VATRULE 3';
5399  return 0;
5400  }
5401  else
5402  {
5403  //print 'VATRULE 4';
5404  return get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_seller, $idprodfournprice);
5405  }
5406  }
5407 
5408  // Si (vendeur en France et acheteur hors Communaute europeenne et acheteur particulier) alors TVA par defaut=TVA du produit vendu. Fin de regle
5409  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_VAT_OF_PRODUCT_FOR_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_OUT_OF_EEC) && empty($buyer_in_cee) && !$thirdparty_buyer->isACompany()) {
5410  return get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_seller, $idprodfournprice);
5411  }
5412 
5413  // Sinon la TVA proposee par defaut=0. Fin de regle.
5414  // Rem: Cela signifie qu'au moins un des 2 est hors Communaute europeenne et que le pays differe
5415  //print 'VATRULE 5';
5416  return 0;
5417 }
5418 
5419 
5430 function get_default_npr(Societe $thirdparty_seller, Societe $thirdparty_buyer, $idprod = 0, $idprodfournprice = 0)
5431 {
5432  global $db;
5433 
5434  if ($idprodfournprice > 0)
5435  {
5436  if (!class_exists('ProductFournisseur')) {
5437  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/fourn/class/fournisseur.product.class.php';
5438  }
5439  $prodprice = new ProductFournisseur($db);
5440  $prodprice->fetch_product_fournisseur_price($idprodfournprice);
5441  return $prodprice->fourn_tva_npr;
5442  }
5443  elseif ($idprod > 0)
5444  {
5445  if (!class_exists('Product')) {
5446  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
5447  }
5448  $prod = new Product($db);
5449  $prod->fetch($idprod);
5450  return $prod->tva_npr;
5451  }
5452 
5453  return 0;
5454 }
5455 
5469 function get_default_localtax($thirdparty_seller, $thirdparty_buyer, $local, $idprod = 0)
5470 {
5471  global $mysoc;
5472 
5473  if (!is_object($thirdparty_seller)) return -1;
5474  if (!is_object($thirdparty_buyer)) return -1;
5475 
5476  if ($local == 1) // Localtax 1
5477  {
5478  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'ES')
5479  {
5480  if (is_numeric($thirdparty_buyer->localtax1_assuj) && !$thirdparty_buyer->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
5481  }
5482  else
5483  {
5484  // Si vendeur non assujeti a Localtax1, localtax1 par default=0
5485  if (is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) && !$thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
5486  if (!is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) && $thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj == 'localtax1off') return 0;
5487  }
5488  }
5489  elseif ($local == 2) //I Localtax 2
5490  {
5491  // Si vendeur non assujeti a Localtax2, localtax2 par default=0
5492  if (is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) && !$thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) return 0;
5493  if (!is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) && $thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj == 'localtax2off') return 0;
5494  }
5495 
5496  if ($thirdparty_seller->country_code == $thirdparty_buyer->country_code)
5497  {
5498  return get_product_localtax_for_country($idprod, $local, $thirdparty_seller);
5499  }
5500 
5501  return 0;
5502 }
5503 
5512 function yn($yesno, $case = 1, $color = 0)
5513 {
5514  global $langs;
5515  $result = 'unknown'; $classname = '';
5516  if ($yesno == 1 || strtolower($yesno) == 'yes' || strtolower($yesno) == 'true') // A mettre avant test sur no a cause du == 0
5517  {
5518  $result = $langs->trans('yes');
5519  if ($case == 1 || $case == 3) $result = $langs->trans("Yes");
5520  if ($case == 2) $result = '<input type="checkbox" value="1" checked disabled>';
5521  if ($case == 3) $result = '<input type="checkbox" value="1" checked disabled> '.$result;
5522 
5523  $classname = 'ok';
5524  }
5525  elseif ($yesno == 0 || strtolower($yesno) == 'no' || strtolower($yesno) == 'false')
5526  {
5527  $result = $langs->trans("no");
5528  if ($case == 1 || $case == 3) $result = $langs->trans("No");
5529  if ($case == 2) $result = '<input type="checkbox" value="0" disabled>';
5530  if ($case == 3) $result = '<input type="checkbox" value="0" disabled> '.$result;
5531 
5532  if ($color == 2) $classname = 'ok';
5533  else $classname = 'error';
5534  }
5535  if ($color) return '<font class="'.$classname.'">'.$result.'</font>';
5536  return $result;
5537 }
5538 
5554 function get_exdir($num, $level, $alpha, $withoutslash, $object, $modulepart)
5555 {
5556  global $conf;
5557 
5558  $path = '';
5559 
5560  $arrayforoldpath = array('cheque', 'user', 'category', 'holiday', 'supplier_invoice', 'invoice_supplier', 'mailing', 'supplier_payment');
5561  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_OLD_PATH_FOR_PHOTO)) $arrayforoldpath[] = 'product';
5562  if (!empty($level) && in_array($modulepart, $arrayforoldpath))
5563  {
5564  // This part should be removed once all code is using "get_exdir" to forge path, with all parameters provided.
5565  if (empty($alpha)) $num = preg_replace('/([^0-9])/i', '', $num);
5566  else $num = preg_replace('/^.*\-/i', '', $num);
5567  $num = substr("000".$num, -$level);
5568  if ($level == 1) $path = substr($num, 0, 1);
5569  if ($level == 2) $path = substr($num, 1, 1).'/'.substr($num, 0, 1);
5570  if ($level == 3) $path = substr($num, 2, 1).'/'.substr($num, 1, 1).'/'.substr($num, 0, 1);
5571  }
5572  else
5573  {
5574  // TODO
5575  // We will enhance here a common way of forging path for document storage
5576  // Here, object->id, object->ref and modulepart are required.
5577  //var_dump($modulepart);
5578  if (in_array($modulepart, array('thirdparty', 'contact', 'member', 'propal', 'proposal', 'commande', 'order', 'facture', 'invoice',
5579  'supplier_order', 'supplier_proposal', 'shipment', 'contract', 'expensereport', 'ficheinter')))
5580  {
5581  $path = ($object->ref ? $object->ref : $object->id);
5582  }
5583  }
5584 
5585  if (empty($withoutslash) && !empty($path)) $path .= '/';
5586 
5587  return $path;
5588 }
5589 
5598 function dol_mkdir($dir, $dataroot = '', $newmask = null)
5599 {
5600  global $conf;
5601 
5602  dol_syslog("functions.lib::dol_mkdir: dir=".$dir, LOG_INFO);
5603 
5604  $dir_osencoded = dol_osencode($dir);
5605  if (@is_dir($dir_osencoded)) return 0;
5606 
5607  $nberr = 0;
5608  $nbcreated = 0;
5609 
5610  $ccdir = '';
5611  if (!empty($dataroot)) {
5612  // Remove data root from loop
5613  $dir = str_replace($dataroot.'/', '', $dir);
5614  $ccdir = $dataroot.'/';
5615  }
5616 
5617  $cdir = explode("/", $dir);
5618  $num = count($cdir);
5619  for ($i = 0; $i < $num; $i++)
5620  {
5621  if ($i > 0) $ccdir .= '/'.$cdir[$i];
5622  else $ccdir .= $cdir[$i];
5623  if (preg_match("/^.:$/", $ccdir, $regs)) continue; // Si chemin Windows incomplet, on poursuit par rep suivant
5624 
5625  // Attention, le is_dir() peut echouer bien que le rep existe.
5626  // (ex selon config de open_basedir)
5627  if ($ccdir)
5628  {
5629  $ccdir_osencoded = dol_osencode($ccdir);
5630  if (!@is_dir($ccdir_osencoded))
5631  {
5632  dol_syslog("functions.lib::dol_mkdir: Directory '".$ccdir."' does not exists or is outside open_basedir PHP setting.", LOG_DEBUG);
5633 
5634  umask(0);
5635  $dirmaskdec = octdec($newmask);
5636  if (empty($newmask)) {
5637  $dirmaskdec = empty($conf->global->MAIN_UMASK) ? octdec('0755') : octdec($conf->global->MAIN_UMASK);
5638  }
5639  $dirmaskdec |= octdec('0111'); // Set x bit required for directories
5640  if (!@mkdir($ccdir_osencoded, $dirmaskdec))
5641  {
5642  // Si le is_dir a renvoye une fausse info, alors on passe ici.
5643  dol_syslog("functions.lib::dol_mkdir: Fails to create directory '".$ccdir."' or directory already exists.", LOG_WARNING);
5644  $nberr++;
5645  }
5646  else
5647  {
5648  dol_syslog("functions.lib::dol_mkdir: Directory '".$ccdir."' created", LOG_DEBUG);
5649  $nberr = 0; // On remet a zero car si on arrive ici, cela veut dire que les echecs precedents peuvent etre ignore
5650  $nbcreated++;
5651  }
5652  }
5653  else
5654  {
5655  $nberr = 0; // On remet a zero car si on arrive ici, cela veut dire que les echecs precedents peuvent etre ignores
5656  }
5657  }
5658  }
5659  return ($nberr ? -$nberr : $nbcreated);
5660 }
5661 
5662 
5668 function picto_required()
5669 {
5670  return '<span class="fieldrequired">*</span>';
5671 }
5672 
5673 
5690 function dol_string_nohtmltag($stringtoclean, $removelinefeed = 1, $pagecodeto = 'UTF-8', $strip_tags = 0, $removedoublespaces = 1)
5691 {
5692  if ($removelinefeed == 2) $stringtoclean = preg_replace('/<br[^>]*>(\n|\r)+/ims', '<br>', $stringtoclean);
5693  $temp = preg_replace('/<br[^>]*>/i', "\n", $stringtoclean);
5694 
5695  if ($strip_tags) {
5696  $temp = strip_tags($temp);
5697  } else {
5698  $pattern = "/<[^<>]+>/";
5699  // Exemple of $temp: <a href="/myurl" title="<u>A title</u>">0000-021</a>
5700  $temp = preg_replace($pattern, "", $temp); // pass 1
5701  // $temp after pass 1: <a href="/myurl" title="A title">0000-021
5702  $temp = preg_replace($pattern, "", $temp); // pass 2
5703  // $temp after pass 2: 0000-021
5704  }
5705 
5706  $temp = dol_html_entity_decode($temp, ENT_COMPAT, $pagecodeto);
5707 
5708  // Remove also carriage returns
5709  if ($removelinefeed == 1) $temp = str_replace(array("\r\n", "\r", "\n"), " ", $temp);
5710 
5711  // And double quotes
5712  if ($removedoublespaces) {
5713  while (strpos($temp, " ")) {
5714  $temp = str_replace(" ", " ", $temp);
5715  }
5716  }
5717 
5718  return trim($temp);
5719 }
5720 
5730 function dol_string_onlythesehtmltags($stringtoclean, $cleanalsosomestyles = 1)
5731 {
5732  $allowed_tags = array(
5733  "html", "head", "meta", "body", "article", "a", "abbr", "b", "blockquote", "br", "cite", "div", "dl", "dd", "dt", "em", "font", "img", "ins", "hr", "i", "li", "link",
5734  "ol", "p", "q", "s", "section", "span", "strike", "strong", "title", "table", "tr", "th", "td", "u", "ul", "sup", "sub", "blockquote", "pre", "h1", "h2", "h3", "h4", "h5", "h6"
5735  );
5736  $allowed_tags_string = join("><", $allowed_tags);
5737  $allowed_tags_string = preg_replace('/^>/', '', $allowed_tags_string);
5738  $allowed_tags_string = preg_replace('/<$/', '', $allowed_tags_string);
5739  $allowed_tags_string = '<'.$allowed_tags_string.'>';
5740 
5741  if ($cleanalsosomestyles) {
5742  $stringtoclean = preg_replace('/position\s*:\s*(absolute|fixed)\s*!\s*important/', '', $stringtoclean); // Note: If hacker try to introduce css comment into string to bypass this regex, the string must also be encoded by the dol_htmlentitiesbr during output so it become harmless
5743  }
5744 
5745  $temp = strip_tags($stringtoclean, $allowed_tags_string);
5746 
5747  return $temp;
5748 }
5749 
5761 function dol_string_neverthesehtmltags($stringtoclean, $disallowed_tags = array('textarea'), $cleanalsosomestyles = 0)
5762 {
5763  $temp = $stringtoclean;
5764  foreach ($disallowed_tags as $tagtoremove)
5765  {
5766  $temp = preg_replace('/<\/?'.$tagtoremove.'>/', '', $temp);
5767  $temp = preg_replace('/<\/?'.$tagtoremove.'\s+[^>]*>/', '', $temp);
5768  }
5769 
5770  if ($cleanalsosomestyles) {
5771  $temp = preg_replace('/position\s*:\s*(absolute|fixed)\s*!\s*important/', '', $temp); // Note: If hacker try to introduce css comment into string to avoid this, string should be encoded by the dol_htmlentitiesbr so be harmless
5772  }
5773 
5774  return $temp;
5775 }
5776 
5777 
5787 function dolGetFirstLineOfText($text, $nboflines = 1, $charset = 'UTF-8')
5788 {
5789  if ($nboflines == 1)
5790  {
5791  if (dol_textishtml($text))
5792  {
5793  $firstline = preg_replace('/<br[^>]*>.*$/s', '', $text); // The s pattern modifier means the . can match newline characters
5794  $firstline = preg_replace('/<div[^>]*>.*$/s', '', $firstline); // The s pattern modifier means the . can match newline characters
5795  }
5796  else
5797  {
5798  $firstline = preg_replace('/[\n\r].*/', '', $text);
5799  }
5800  return $firstline.((strlen($firstline) != strlen($text)) ? '...' : '');
5801  }
5802  else
5803  {
5804  $ishtml = 0;
5805  if (dol_textishtml($text))
5806  {
5807  $text = preg_replace('/\n/', '', $text);
5808  $ishtml = 1;
5809  $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => " ", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
5810  }
5811  else
5812  {
5813  $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => "<br>", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
5814  }
5815 
5816  $text = strtr($text, $repTable);
5817  if ($charset == 'UTF-8') { $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/Uu'; } // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag. /u is for UTF8 support
5818  else $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/U'; // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag.
5819  $a = preg_split($pattern, $text, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
5820 
5821  $firstline = '';
5822  $i = 0;
5823  $nba = count($a); // 2x nb of lines in $a because $a contains also a line for each new line separator
5824  while (($i < $nba) && ($i < ($nboflines * 2)))
5825  {
5826  if ($i % 2 == 0) $firstline .= $a[$i];
5827  elseif (($i < (($nboflines * 2) - 1)) && ($i < ($nba - 1))) $firstline .= ($ishtml ? "<br>\n" : "\n");
5828  $i++;
5829  }
5830  unset($a);
5831  return $firstline.(($i < $nba) ? '...' : '');
5832  }
5833 }
5834 
5835 
5846 function dol_nl2br($stringtoencode, $nl2brmode = 0, $forxml = false)
5847 {
5848  if (!$nl2brmode) {
5849  return nl2br($stringtoencode, $forxml);
5850  } else {
5851  $ret = preg_replace('/(\r\n|\r|\n)/i', ($forxml ? '<br />' : '<br>'), $stringtoencode);
5852  return $ret;
5853  }
5854 }
5855 
5856 
5874 function dol_htmlentitiesbr($stringtoencode, $nl2brmode = 0, $pagecodefrom = 'UTF-8', $removelasteolbr = 1)
5875 {
5876  $newstring = $stringtoencode;
5877  if (dol_textishtml($stringtoencode)) // Check if text is already HTML or not
5878  {
5879  $newstring = preg_replace('/<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>/i', '<br>', $newstring); // Replace "<br type="_moz" />" by "<br>". It's same and avoid pb with FPDF.
5880  if ($removelasteolbr) $newstring = preg_replace('/<br>$/i', '', $newstring); // Remove last <br> (remove only last one)
5881  $newstring = strtr($newstring, array('&'=>'__and__', '<'=>'__lt__', '>'=>'__gt__', '"'=>'__dquot__'));
5882  $newstring = dol_htmlentities($newstring, ENT_COMPAT, $pagecodefrom); // Make entity encoding
5883  $newstring = strtr($newstring, array('__and__'=>'&', '__lt__'=>'<', '__gt__'=>'>', '__dquot__'=>'"'));
5884  }
5885  else
5886  {
5887  if ($removelasteolbr) $newstring = preg_replace('/(\r\n|\r|\n)$/i', '', $newstring); // Remove last \n (may remove several)
5888  $newstring = dol_nl2br(dol_htmlentities($newstring, ENT_COMPAT, $pagecodefrom), $nl2brmode);
5889  }
5890  // Other substitutions that htmlentities does not do
5891  //$newstring=str_replace(chr(128),'&euro;',$newstring); // 128 = 0x80. Not in html entity table. // Seems useles with TCPDF. Make bug with UTF8 languages
5892  return $newstring;
5893 }
5894 
5902 function dol_htmlentitiesbr_decode($stringtodecode, $pagecodeto = 'UTF-8')
5903 {
5904  $ret = dol_html_entity_decode($stringtodecode, ENT_COMPAT, $pagecodeto);
5905  $ret = preg_replace('/'."\r\n".'<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>/i', "<br>", $ret);
5906  $ret = preg_replace('/<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>'."\r\n".'/i', "\r\n", $ret);
5907  $ret = preg_replace('/<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>'."\n".'/i', "\n", $ret);
5908  $ret = preg_replace('/<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>/i', "\n", $ret);
5909  return $ret;
5910 }
5911 
5918 function dol_htmlcleanlastbr($stringtodecode)
5919 {
5920  $ret = preg_replace('/(<br>|<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>|'."\n".'|'."\r".')+$/i', "", $stringtodecode);
5921  return $ret;
5922 }
5923 
5933 function dol_html_entity_decode($a, $b, $c = 'UTF-8', $keepsomeentities = 0)
5934 {
5935  $newstring = $a;
5936  if ($keepsomeentities) $newstring = strtr($newstring, array('&amp;'=>'__andamp__', '&lt;'=>'__andlt__', '&gt;'=>'__andgt__', '"'=>'__dquot__'));
5937  $newstring = html_entity_decode($newstring, $b, $c);
5938  if ($keepsomeentities) $newstring = strtr($newstring, array('__andamp__'=>'&amp;', '__andlt__'=>'&lt;', '__andgt__'=>'&gt;', '__dquot__'=>'"'));
5939  return $newstring;
5940 }
5941 
5952 function dol_htmlentities($string, $flags = null, $encoding = 'UTF-8', $double_encode = false)
5953 {
5954  return htmlentities($string, $flags, $encoding, $double_encode);
5955 }
5956 
5966 function dol_string_is_good_iso($s, $clean = 0)
5967 {
5968  $len = dol_strlen($s);
5969  $out = '';
5970  $ok = 1;
5971  for ($scursor = 0; $scursor < $len; $scursor++)
5972  {
5973  $ordchar = ord($s[$scursor]);
5974  //print $scursor.'-'.$ordchar.'<br>';
5975  if ($ordchar < 32 && $ordchar != 13 && $ordchar != 10) { $ok = 0; break; }
5976  elseif ($ordchar > 126 && $ordchar < 160) { $ok = 0; break; }
5977  elseif ($clean) {
5978  $out .= $s[$scursor];
5979  }
5980  }
5981  if ($clean) return $out;
5982  return $ok;
5983 }
5984 
5993 function dol_nboflines($s, $maxchar = 0)
5994 {
5995  if ($s == '') return 0;
5996  $arraystring = explode("\n", $s);
5997  $nb = count($arraystring);
5998 
5999  return $nb;
6000 }
6001 
6002 
6012 function dol_nboflines_bis($text, $maxlinesize = 0, $charset = 'UTF-8')
6013 {
6014  $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => "<br>", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
6015  if (dol_textishtml($text)) $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => " ", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
6016 
6017  $text = strtr($text, $repTable);
6018  if ($charset == 'UTF-8') { $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/Uu'; } // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag. /u is for UTF8 support
6019  else $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/U'; // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag.
6020  $a = preg_split($pattern, $text, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
6021 
6022  $nblines = (int) floor((count($a) + 1) / 2);
6023  // count possible auto line breaks
6024  if ($maxlinesize)
6025  {
6026  foreach ($a as $line)
6027  {
6028  if (dol_strlen($line) > $maxlinesize)
6029  {
6030  //$line_dec = html_entity_decode(strip_tags($line));
6031  $line_dec = html_entity_decode($line);
6032  if (dol_strlen($line_dec) > $maxlinesize)
6033  {
6034  $line_dec = wordwrap($line_dec, $maxlinesize, '\n', true);
6035  $nblines += substr_count($line_dec, '\n');
6036  }
6037  }
6038  }
6039  }
6040 
6041  unset($a);
6042  return $nblines;
6043 }
6044 
6053 function dol_textishtml($msg, $option = 0)
6054 {
6055  if ($option == 1)
6056  {
6057  if (preg_match('/<html/i', $msg)) return true;
6058  elseif (preg_match('/<body/i', $msg)) return true;
6059  elseif (preg_match('/<\/textarea/i', $msg)) return true;
6060  elseif (preg_match('/<br/i', $msg)) return true;
6061  return false;
6062  }
6063  else
6064  {
6065  if (preg_match('/<html/i', $msg)) return true;
6066  elseif (preg_match('/<body/i', $msg)) return true;
6067  elseif (preg_match('/<\/textarea/i', $msg)) return true;
6068  elseif (preg_match('/<(b|em|i|u)>/i', $msg)) return true;
6069  elseif (preg_match('/<br\/>/i', $msg)) return true;
6070  elseif (preg_match('/<(br|div|font|li|p|span|strong|table)>/i', $msg)) return true;
6071  elseif (preg_match('/<(br|div|font|li|p|span|strong|table)\s+[^<>\/]*>/i', $msg)) return true;
6072  elseif (preg_match('/<(br|div|font|li|p|span|strong|table)\s+[^<>\/]*\/>/i', $msg)) return true;
6073  elseif (preg_match('/<img\s+[^<>]*src[^<>]*>/i', $msg)) return true; // must accept <img src="http://example.com/aaa.png" />
6074  elseif (preg_match('/<a\s+[^<>]*href[^<>]*>/i', $msg)) return true; // must accept <a href="http://example.com/aaa.png" />
6075  elseif (preg_match('/<h[0-9]>/i', $msg)) return true;
6076  elseif (preg_match('/&[A-Z0-9]{1,6};/i', $msg)) return true; // Html entities names (http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_entities.asp)
6077  elseif (preg_match('/&#[0-9]{2,3};/i', $msg)) return true; // Html entities numbers (http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_entities.asp)
6078 
6079  return false;
6080  }
6081 }
6082 
6097 function dol_concatdesc($text1, $text2, $forxml = false, $invert = false)
6098 {
6099  if (!empty($invert))
6100  {
6101  $tmp = $text1;
6102  $text1 = $text2;
6103  $text2 = $tmp;
6104  }
6105 
6106  $ret = '';
6107  $ret .= (!dol_textishtml($text1) && dol_textishtml($text2)) ? dol_nl2br(dol_escape_htmltag($text1, 0, 1, '', 1), 0, $forxml) : $text1;
6108  $ret .= (!empty($text1) && !empty($text2)) ? ((dol_textishtml($text1) || dol_textishtml($text2)) ? ($forxml ? "<br >\n" : "<br>\n") : "\n") : "";
6109  $ret .= (dol_textishtml($text1) && !dol_textishtml($text2)) ? dol_nl2br(dol_escape_htmltag($text2, 0, 1, '', 1), 0, $forxml) : $text2;
6110  return $ret;
6111 }
6112 
6113 
6114 
6125 function getCommonSubstitutionArray($outputlangs, $onlykey = 0, $exclude = null, $object = null)
6126 {
6127  global $db, $conf, $mysoc, $user, $extrafields;
6128 
6129  $substitutionarray = array();
6130 
6131  if (empty($exclude) || !in_array('user', $exclude))
6132  {
6133  // Add SIGNATURE into substitutionarray first, so, when we will make the substitution,
6134  // this will include signature content first and then replace var found into content of signature
6135  $signature = $user->signature;
6136  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
6137  '__USER_SIGNATURE__' => (string) (($signature && empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN)) ? ($onlykey == 2 ? dol_trunc(dol_string_nohtmltag($signature), 30) : $signature) : '')
6138  )
6139  );
6140  // For backward compatibility
6141  if ($onlykey != 2)
6142  {
6143  $substitutionarray['__SIGNATURE__'] = (string) (($signature && empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN)) ? ($onlykey == 2 ? dol_trunc(dol_string_nohtmltag($signature), 30) : $signature) : '');
6144  }
6145 
6146  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
6147  '__USER_ID__' => (string) $user->id,
6148  '__USER_LOGIN__' => (string) $user->login,
6149  '__USER_EMAIL__' => (string) $user->email,
6150  '__USER_LASTNAME__' => (string) $user->lastname,
6151  '__USER_FIRSTNAME__' => (string) $user->firstname,
6152  '__USER_FULLNAME__' => (string) $user->getFullName($outputlangs),
6153  '__USER_SUPERVISOR_ID__' => (string) ($user->fk_user ? $user->fk_user : '0'),
6154  '__USER_REMOTE_IP__' => (string) getUserRemoteIP()
6155  )
6156  );
6157  }
6158  if ((empty($exclude) || !in_array('mycompany', $exclude)) && is_object($mysoc))
6159  {
6160  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
6161  '__MYCOMPANY_NAME__' => $mysoc->name,
6162  '__MYCOMPANY_EMAIL__' => $mysoc->email,
6163  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID1__' => $mysoc->idprof1,
6164  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID2__' => $mysoc->idprof2,
6165  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID3__' => $mysoc->idprof3,
6166  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID4__' => $mysoc->idprof4,
6167  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID5__' => $mysoc->idprof5,
6168  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID6__' => $mysoc->idprof6,
6169  '__MYCOMPANY_CAPITAL__' => $mysoc->capital,
6170  '__MYCOMPANY_FULLADDRESS__' => $mysoc->getFullAddress(1, ', '),
6171  '__MYCOMPANY_ADDRESS__' => $mysoc->address,
6172  '__MYCOMPANY_ZIP__' => $mysoc->zip,
6173  '__MYCOMPANY_TOWN__' => $mysoc->town,
6174  '__MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY__' => $mysoc->country,
6175  '__MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY_ID__' => $mysoc->country_id,
6176  '__MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY_CODE__' => $mysoc->country_code,
6177  '__MYCOMPANY_CURRENCY_CODE__' => $conf->currency
6178  ));
6179  }
6180 
6181  if (($onlykey || is_object($object)) && (empty($exclude) || !in_array('object', $exclude)))
6182  {
6183  if ($onlykey)
6184  {
6185  $substitutionarray['__ID__'] = '__ID__';
6186  $substitutionarray['__REF__'] = '__REF__';
6187  $substitutionarray['__REF_CLIENT__'] = '__REF_CLIENT__';
6188  $substitutionarray['__REF_SUPPLIER__'] = '__REF_SUPPLIER__';
6189  $substitutionarray['__NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = '__NOTE_PUBLIC__';
6190  $substitutionarray['__NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = '__NOTE_PRIVATE__';
6191  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_XXX__'] = '__EXTRAFIELD_XXX__';
6192 
6193  if (!empty($conf->societe->enabled))
6194  {
6195  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ID__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_ID__';
6196  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NAME__';
6197  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__';
6198  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_CLIENT__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_CODE_CLIENT__';
6199  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_FOURNISSEUR__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_CODE_FOURNISSEUR__';
6200  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__';
6201  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_PHONE__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_PHONE__';
6202  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_FAX__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_FAX__';
6203  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ADDRESS__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_ADDRESS__';
6204  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ZIP__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_ZIP__';
6205  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TOWN__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_TOWN__';
6206  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF1__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF1__';
6207  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF2__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF2__';
6208  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF3__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF3__';
6209  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF4__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF4__';
6210  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF5__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF5__';
6211  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF6__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF6__';
6212  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TVAINTRA__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_TVAINTRA__';
6213  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PUBLIC__';
6214  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PRIVATE__';
6215  }
6216  if (!empty($conf->adherent->enabled))
6217  {
6218  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ID__'] = '__MEMBER_ID__';
6219  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_CIVILITY__'] = '__MEMBER_CIVILITY__';
6220  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRSTNAME__'] = '__MEMBER_FIRSTNAME__';
6221  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LASTNAME__'] = '__MEMBER_LASTNAME__';
6222  /*$substitutionarray['__MEMBER_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = '__MEMBER_NOTE_PUBLIC__';
6223  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = '__MEMBER_NOTE_PRIVATE__';*/
6224  }
6225  if (!empty($conf->projet->enabled))
6226  {
6227  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_ID__'] = '__PROJECT_ID__';
6228  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_REF__'] = '__PROJECT_REF__';
6229  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NAME__'] = '__PROJECT_NAME__';
6230  /*$substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = '__PROJECT_NOTE_PUBLIC__';
6231  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = '__PROJECT_NOTE_PRIVATE__';*/
6232  }
6233  if (!empty($conf->contrat->enabled))
6234  {
6235  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATE__'] = 'Highest date planned for a service start';
6236  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATETIME__'] = 'Highest date and hour planned for service start';
6237  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATE__'] = 'Lowest data for planned expiration of service';
6238  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATETIME__'] = 'Lowest date and hour for planned expiration of service';
6239  }
6240  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_URL__'] = 'UrlToPayOnlineIfApplicable';
6241  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_TEXT_AND_URL__'] = 'TextAndUrlToPayOnlineIfApplicable';
6242  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT__'] = 'Security key (if key is not unique per record)';
6243  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_MEMBER__'] = 'Security key for payment on a member subscription (one key per member)';
6244  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_ORDER__'] = 'Security key for payment on an order';
6245  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_INVOICE__'] = 'Security key for payment on an invoice';
6246  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_CONTRACTLINE__'] = 'Security key for payment on a a service';
6247 
6248  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_PROPOSAL__'] = 'Direct download url of a proposal';
6249  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_ORDER__'] = 'Direct download url of an order';
6250  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_INVOICE__'] = 'Direct download url of an invoice';
6251 
6252  if (!empty($conf->expedition->enabled))
6253  {
6254  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUM__'] = 'Shipping tacking number';
6255  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUMURL__'] = 'Shipping tracking url';
6256  }
6257  }
6258  else
6259  {
6260  $substitutionarray['__ID__'] = $object->id;
6261  $substitutionarray['__REF__'] = $object->ref;
6262  $substitutionarray['__REF_CLIENT__'] = (isset($object->ref_client) ? $object->ref_client : (isset($object->ref_customer) ? $object->ref_customer : null));
6263  $substitutionarray['__REF_SUPPLIER__'] = (isset($object->ref_supplier) ? $object->ref_supplier : null);
6264  $substitutionarray['__NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = (isset($object->note_public) ? $object->note_public : null);
6265  $substitutionarray['__NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = (isset($object->note_private) ? $object->note_private : null);
6266 
6267  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : '');
6268 
6269  // For backward compatibility
6270  $substitutionarray['__REFCLIENT__'] = (isset($object->ref_client) ? $object->ref_client : (isset($object->ref_customer) ? $object->ref_customer : null));
6271  $substitutionarray['__REFSUPPLIER__'] = (isset($object->ref_supplier) ? $object->ref_supplier : null);
6272  $substitutionarray['__REFCLIENT__'] = (isset($object->ref_client) ? $object->ref_client : (isset($object->ref_customer) ? $object->ref_customer : null));
6273  $substitutionarray['__REFSUPPLIER__'] = (isset($object->ref_supplier) ? $object->ref_supplier : null);
6274  $substitutionarray['__SUPPLIER_ORDER_DATE_DELIVERY__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : '');
6275  $substitutionarray['__SUPPLIER_ORDER_DELAY_DELIVERY__'] = $outputlangs->transnoentities("AvailabilityType".$object->availability_code) != ('AvailabilityType'.$object->availability_code) ? $outputlangs->transnoentities("AvailabilityType".$object->availability_code) : $outputlangs->convToOutputCharset(isset($object->availability) ? $object->availability : '');
6276 
6277  $birthday = dol_print_date($object->birth, 'day');
6278 
6279  if ($object->id > 0)
6280  {
6281  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ID__'] = $object->id;
6282  if (method_exists($object, 'getCivilityLabel')) $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_CIVILITY__'] = $object->getCivilityLabel();
6283  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRSTNAME__'] = $object->firstname;
6284  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LASTNAME__'] = $object->lastname;
6285  if (method_exists($object, 'getFullName')) $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FULLNAME__'] = $object->getFullName($outputlangs);
6286  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_COMPANY__'] = $object->societe;
6287  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ADDRESS__'] = $object->address;
6288  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ZIP__'] = $object->zip;
6289  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_TOWN__'] = $object->town;
6290  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_COUNTRY__'] = $object->country;
6291  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_EMAIL__'] = $object->email;
6292  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_BIRTH__'] = $birthday;
6293  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHOTO__'] = $object->photo;
6294  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LOGIN__'] = $object->login;
6295  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PASSWORD__'] = $object->pass;
6296  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHONE__'] = $object->phone;
6297  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHONEPRO__'] = $object->phone_perso;
6298  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHONEMOBILE__'] = $object->phone_mobile;
6299  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($object->first_subscription_date, 'dayrfc');
6300  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_START__'] = dol_print_date($object->first_subscription_date_start, 'dayrfc');
6301  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_END__'] = dol_print_date($object->first_subscription_date_end, 'dayrfc');
6302  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LAST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($object->last_subscription_date, 'dayrfc');
6303  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LAST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_START__'] = dol_print_date($object->last_subscription_date_start, 'dayrfc');
6304  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LAST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_END__'] = dol_print_date($object->last_subscription_date_end, 'dayrfc');
6305  }
6306 
6307  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'societe')
6308  {
6309  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ID__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->id : '');
6310  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->name : '');
6311  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->name_alias : '');
6312  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_CLIENT__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->code_client : '');
6313  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_FOURNISSEUR__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->code_fournisseur : '');
6314  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->email : '');
6315  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_PHONE__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->phone : '');
6316  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_FAX__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->fax : '');
6317  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ADDRESS__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->address : '');
6318  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ZIP__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->zip : '');
6319  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TOWN__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->town : '');
6320  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_COUNTRY_ID__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->country_id : '');
6321  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_COUNTRY_CODE__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->country_code : '');
6322  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF1__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof1 : '');
6323  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF2__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof2 : '');
6324  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF3__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof3 : '');
6325  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF4__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof4 : '');
6326  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF5__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof5 : '');
6327  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF6__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof6 : '');
6328  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TVAINTRA__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->tva_intra : '');
6329  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = (is_object($object) ?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->note_public) : '');
6330  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = (is_object($object) ?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->note_private) : '');
6331  }
6332  elseif (is_object($object->thirdparty) && $object->thirdparty->id > 0)
6333  {
6334  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ID__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->id : '');
6335  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->name : '');
6336  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->name_alias : '');
6337  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_CLIENT__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->code_client : '');
6338  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_FOURNISSEUR__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->code_fournisseur : '');
6339  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->email : '');
6340  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_PHONE__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->phone : '');
6341  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_FAX__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->fax : '');
6342  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ADDRESS__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->address : '');
6343  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ZIP__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->zip : '');
6344  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TOWN__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->town : '');
6345  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_COUNTRY_ID__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->country_id : '');
6346  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_COUNTRY_CODE__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->country_code : '');
6347  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF1__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof1 : '');
6348  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF2__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof2 : '');
6349  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF3__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof3 : '');
6350  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF4__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof4 : '');
6351  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF5__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof5 : '');
6352  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF6__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof6 : '');
6353  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TVAINTRA__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->tva_intra : '');
6354  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->thirdparty->note_public) : '');
6355  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->thirdparty->note_private) : '');
6356  }
6357 
6358  if (is_object($object->project) && $object->project->id > 0)
6359  {
6360  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_ID__'] = (is_object($object->project) ? $object->project->id : '');
6361  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_REF__'] = (is_object($object->project) ? $object->project->ref : '');
6362  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NAME__'] = (is_object($object->project) ? $object->project->title : '');
6363  }
6364  if (is_object($object->projet) && $object->projet->id > 0) // Deprecated, for backward compatibility
6365  {
6366  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_ID__'] = (is_object($object->projet) ? $object->projet->id : '');
6367  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_REF__'] = (is_object($object->projet) ? $object->projet->ref : '');
6368  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NAME__'] = (is_object($object->projet) ? $object->projet->title : '');
6369  }
6370 
6371  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'shipping')
6372  {
6373  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUM__'] = $object->tracking_number;
6374  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUMURL__'] = $object->tracking_url;
6375  }
6376 
6377  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'contrat' && is_array($object->lines))
6378  {
6379  if ($object->id > 0)
6380  {
6381  $dateplannedstart = '';
6382  $datenextexpiration = '';
6383  foreach ($object->lines as $line)
6384  {
6385  if ($line->date_ouverture_prevue > $dateplannedstart) $dateplannedstart = $line->date_ouverture_prevue;
6386  if ($line->statut == 4 && $line->date_fin_prevue && (!$datenextexpiration || $line->date_fin_prevue < $datenextexpiration)) $datenextexpiration = $line->date_fin_prevue;
6387  }
6388  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($dateplannedstart, 'dayrfc');
6389  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATETIME__'] = dol_print_date($dateplannedstart, 'standard');
6390  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($datenextexpiration, 'dayrfc');
6391  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATETIME__'] = dol_print_date($datenextexpiration, 'standard');
6392  }
6393  }
6394 
6395  // Create dynamic tags for __EXTRAFIELD_FIELD__
6396  if ($object->table_element && $object->id > 0)
6397  {
6398  if (!is_object($extrafields)) $extrafields = new ExtraFields($db);
6399  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($object->table_element, true);
6400 
6401  if ($object->fetch_optionals() > 0)
6402  {
6403  if (is_array($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['label']) && count($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['label']) > 0)
6404  {
6405  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['label'] as $key => $label) {
6406  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'__'] = $object->array_options['options_'.$key];
6407  if ($extrafields->attribute_type[$key] == 'date') {
6408  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_' . strtoupper($key) . '__'] = dol_print_date($object->array_options['options_' . $key], 'day');
6409  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_' . strtoupper($key) . '_LOCALE__'] = dol_print_date($object->array_options['options_' . $key], 'day', 'tzserver', $outputlangs);
6410  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_' . strtoupper($key) . '_RFC__'] = dol_print_date($object->array_options['options_' . $key], 'dayrfc');
6411  } elseif ($extrafields->attribute_type[$key] == 'datetime') {
6412  $datetime = $object->array_options['options_'.$key];
6413  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_' . strtoupper($key) . '__'] = ($datetime != "0000-00-00 00:00:00" ? dol_print_date($datetime, 'dayhour') : '');
6414  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_' . strtoupper($key) . '_LOCALE__'] = ($datetime != "0000-00-00 00:00:00" ? dol_print_date($datetime, 'dayhour', 'tzserver', $outputlangs) : '');
6415  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_' . strtoupper($key) . '_DAY_LOCALE__'] = ($datetime != "0000-00-00 00:00:00" ? dol_print_date($datetime, 'day', 'tzserver', $outputlangs) : '');
6416  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_' . strtoupper($key) . '_RFC__'] = ($datetime != "0000-00-00 00:00:00" ? dol_print_date($datetime, 'dayhourrfc') : '');
6417  }
6418  }
6419  }
6420  }
6421  }
6422 
6423  // Complete substitution array with the url to make online payment
6424  $paymenturl = '';
6425  if (empty($substitutionarray['__REF__']))
6426  {
6427  $paymenturl = '';
6428  }
6429  else
6430  {
6431  // Set the online payment url link into __ONLINE_PAYMENT_URL__ key
6432  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/payments.lib.php';
6433  $outputlangs->loadLangs(array('paypal', 'other'));
6434  $typeforonlinepayment = 'free';
6435  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'commande') $typeforonlinepayment = 'order';
6436  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'facture') $typeforonlinepayment = 'invoice';
6437  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'member') $typeforonlinepayment = 'member';
6438  $url = getOnlinePaymentUrl(0, $typeforonlinepayment, $substitutionarray['__REF__']);
6439  $paymenturl = $url;
6440  }
6441 
6442  if ($object->id > 0)
6443  {
6444  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_TEXT_AND_URL__'] = ($paymenturl ?str_replace('\n', "\n", $outputlangs->trans("PredefinedMailContentLink", $paymenturl)) : '');
6445  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_URL__'] = $paymenturl;
6446 
6447  if (!empty($conf->global->PROPOSAL_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'propal')
6448  {
6449  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_PROPOSAL__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
6450  }
6451  else $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_PROPOSAL__'] = '';
6452  if (!empty($conf->global->ORDER_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'commande')
6453  {
6454  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_ORDER__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
6455  }
6456  else $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_ORDER__'] = '';
6457  if (!empty($conf->global->INVOICE_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'facture')
6458  {
6459  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_INVOICE__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
6460  }
6461  else $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_INVOICE__'] = '';
6462 
6463  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'propal') $substitutionarray['__URL_PROPOSAL__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/comm/propal/card.php?id=".$object->id;
6464  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'commande') $substitutionarray['__URL_ORDER__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/commande/card.php?id=".$object->id;
6465  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'facture') $substitutionarray['__URL_INVOICE__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/compta/facture/card.php?id=".$object->id;
6466  }
6467  }
6468  }
6469  if (empty($exclude) || !in_array('objectamount', $exclude))
6470  {
6471  $substitutionarray['__DATE_YMD__'] = is_object($object) ? (isset($object->date) ? dol_print_date($object->date, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : null) : '';
6472  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DUE_YMD__'] = is_object($object) ? (isset($object->date_lim_reglement) ? dol_print_date($object->date_lim_reglement, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : null) : '';
6473 
6474  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_ttc : '';
6475  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_EXCL_TAX__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_ht : '';
6476  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_VAT__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_vat ? $object->total_vat : $object->total_tva) : '';
6477  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(1)) $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX2__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_localtax1 : '';
6478  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(2)) $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX3__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_localtax2 : '';
6479 
6480  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_ttc ? price($object->total_ttc, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null) : '';
6481  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_EXCL_TAX_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_ht ? price($object->total_ht, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null) : '';
6482  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_VAT_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_vat ? price($object->total_vat, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : ($object->total_tva ? price($object->total_tva, 0, $outputlangs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency) : null)) : '';
6483  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(1)) $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX2_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_localtax1 ? price($object->total_localtax1, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null) : '';
6484  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(2)) $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX3_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_localtax2 ? price($object->total_localtax2, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null) : '';
6485 
6486  // TODO Add keys for foreign multicurrency
6487 
6488  // For backward compatibility
6489  if ($onlykey != 2)
6490  {
6491  $substitutionarray['__TOTAL_TTC__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_ttc : '';
6492  $substitutionarray['__TOTAL_HT__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_ht : '';
6493  $substitutionarray['__TOTAL_VAT__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_vat ? $object->total_vat : $object->total_tva) : '';
6494  }
6495  }
6496 
6497  //var_dump($substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_FORMATED__']);
6498  if (empty($exclude) || !in_array('date', $exclude))
6499  {
6500  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
6501 
6502  $tmp = dol_getdate(dol_now(), true);
6503  $tmp2 = dol_get_prev_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
6504  $tmp3 = dol_get_prev_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
6505  $tmp4 = dol_get_next_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
6506  $tmp5 = dol_get_next_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
6507 
6508  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
6509  '__DAY__' => (string) $tmp['mday'],
6510  '__DAY_TEXT__' => $outputlangs->trans('Day'.$tmp['wday']), // Monday
6511  '__DAY_TEXT_SHORT__' => $outputlangs->trans($tmp['weekday'].'Min'), // Mon
6512  '__DAY_TEXT_MIN__' => $outputlangs->trans('Short'.$tmp['weekday']), // M
6513  '__MONTH__' => (string) $tmp['mon'],
6514  '__MONTH_TEXT__' => $outputlangs->trans('Month'.sprintf("%02d", $tmp['mon'])),
6515  '__MONTH_TEXT_SHORT__' => $outputlangs->trans('MonthShort'.sprintf("%02d", $tmp['mon'])),
6516  '__MONTH_TEXT_MIN__' => $outputlangs->trans('MonthVeryShort'.sprintf("%02d", $tmp['mon'])),
6517  '__YEAR__' => (string) $tmp['year'],
6518  '__PREVIOUS_DAY__' => (string) $tmp2['day'],
6519  '__PREVIOUS_MONTH__' => (string) $tmp3['month'],
6520  '__PREVIOUS_YEAR__' => (string) ($tmp['year'] - 1),
6521  '__NEXT_DAY__' => (string) $tmp4['day'],
6522  '__NEXT_MONTH__' => (string) $tmp5['month'],
6523  '__NEXT_YEAR__' => (string) ($tmp['year'] + 1),
6524  ));
6525  }
6526 
6527  if (!empty($conf->multicompany->enabled))
6528  {
6529  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array('__ENTITY_ID__' => $conf->entity));
6530  }
6531  if (empty($exclude) || !in_array('system', $exclude))
6532  {
6533  $substitutionarray['__DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT;
6534  $substitutionarray['__(AnyTranslationKey)__'] = $outputlangs->trans('TranslationOfKey');
6535  $substitutionarray['__(AnyTranslationKey|langfile)__'] = $outputlangs->trans('TranslationOfKey').' (load also language file before)';
6536  $substitutionarray['__[AnyConstantKey]__'] = $outputlangs->trans('ValueOfConstantKey');
6537  }
6538 
6539  return $substitutionarray;
6540 }
6541 
6556 function make_substitutions($text, $substitutionarray, $outputlangs = null)
6557 {
6558  global $conf, $langs;
6559 
6560  if (!is_array($substitutionarray)) return 'ErrorBadParameterSubstitutionArrayWhenCalling_make_substitutions';
6561 
6562  if (empty($outputlangs)) $outputlangs = $langs;
6563 
6564  // Make substitution for language keys: __(AnyTranslationKey)__ or __(AnyTranslationKey|langfile)__
6565  if (is_object($outputlangs))
6566  {
6567  $reg = array();
6568  while (preg_match('/__\(([^\)]+)\)__/', $text, $reg))
6569  {
6570  $msgishtml = 0;
6571  if (dol_textishtml($text, 1)) $msgishtml = 1;
6572 
6573  // If key is __(TranslationKey|langfile)__, then force load of langfile.lang
6574  $tmp = explode('|', $reg[1]);
6575  if (!empty($tmp[1])) $outputlangs->load($tmp[1]);
6576 
6577  $text = preg_replace('/__\('.preg_quote($reg[1], '/').'\)__/', $msgishtml ?dol_htmlentitiesbr($outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv($reg[1])) : $outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv($reg[1]), $text);
6578  }
6579  }
6580 
6581  // Make substitution for constant keys.
6582  // Must be after the substitution of translation, so if the text of translation contains a string __[xxx]__, it is also converted.
6583  $reg = array();
6584  while (preg_match('/__\[([^\]]+)\]__/', $text, $reg))
6585  {
6586  $msgishtml = 0;
6587  if (dol_textishtml($text, 1)) $msgishtml = 1;
6588 
6589  $keyfound = $reg[1];
6590  if (preg_match('/(_pass|_pw|password|secret|_key|key$)/i', $keyfound)) $newval = '*****forbidden*****';
6591  else $newval = empty($conf->global->$keyfound) ? '' : $conf->global->$keyfound;
6592  $text = preg_replace('/__\['.preg_quote($keyfound, '/').'\]__/', $msgishtml ?dol_htmlentitiesbr($newval) : $newval, $text);
6593  }
6594 
6595  // Make substitition for array $substitutionarray
6596  foreach ($substitutionarray as $key => $value)
6597  {
6598  if (!isset($value)) continue; // If value is null, it same than not having substitution key at all into array, we do not replace.
6599 
6600  if ($key == '__SIGNATURE__' && (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN))) $value = ''; // Protection
6601  if ($key == '__USER_SIGNATURE__' && (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN))) $value = ''; // Protection
6602 
6603  $text = str_replace("$key", "$value", $text); // We must keep the " to work when value is 123.5 for example
6604  }
6605 
6606  return $text;
6607 }
6608 
6621 function complete_substitutions_array(&$substitutionarray, $outputlangs, $object = null, $parameters = null, $callfunc = "completesubstitutionarray")
6622 {
6623  global $conf, $user;
6624 
6625  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
6626 
6627  // Add a substitution key for each extrafields, using key __EXTRA_XXX__
6628  // TODO Remove this. Already available into the getCommonSubstitutionArray used to build the substitution array.
6629  /*if (is_object($object) && is_array($object->array_options))
6630  {
6631  foreach($object->array_options as $key => $val)
6632  {
6633  $keyshort=preg_replace('/^(options|extra)_/','',$key);
6634  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.$keyshort.'__']=$val;
6635  // For backward compatibiliy
6636  $substitutionarray['%EXTRA_'.$keyshort.'%']=$val;
6637  }
6638  }*/
6639 
6640  // Check if there is external substitution to do, requested by plugins
6641  $dirsubstitutions = array_merge(array(), (array) $conf->modules_parts['substitutions']);
6642 
6643  foreach ($dirsubstitutions as $reldir)
6644  {
6645  $dir = dol_buildpath($reldir, 0);
6646 
6647  // Check if directory exists
6648  if (!dol_is_dir($dir)) continue;
6649 
6650  $substitfiles = dol_dir_list($dir, 'files', 0, 'functions_');
6651  foreach ($substitfiles as $substitfile)
6652  {
6653  $reg = array();
6654  if (preg_match('/functions_(.*)\.lib\.php/i', $substitfile['name'], $reg))
6655  {
6656  $module = $reg[1];
6657 
6658  dol_syslog("Library ".$substitfile['name']." found into ".$dir);
6659  // Include the user's functions file
6660  require_once $dir.$substitfile['name'];
6661  // Call the user's function, and only if it is defined
6662  $function_name = $module."_".$callfunc;
6663  if (function_exists($function_name)) {
6664  $function_name($substitutionarray, $outputlangs, $object, $parameters);
6665  }
6666  }
6667  }
6668  }
6669 }
6670 
6680 function print_date_range($date_start, $date_end, $format = '', $outputlangs = '')
6681 {
6682  print get_date_range($date_start, $date_end, $format, $outputlangs);
6683 }
6684 
6695 function get_date_range($date_start, $date_end, $format = '', $outputlangs = '', $withparenthesis = 1)
6696 {
6697  global $langs;
6698 
6699  $out = '';
6700 
6701  if (!is_object($outputlangs)) $outputlangs = $langs;
6702 
6703  if ($date_start && $date_end)
6704  {
6705  $out .= ($withparenthesis ? ' (' : '').$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('DateFromTo', dol_print_date($date_start, $format, false, $outputlangs), dol_print_date($date_end, $format, false, $outputlangs)).($withparenthesis ? ')' : '');
6706  }
6707  if ($date_start && !$date_end)
6708  {
6709  $out .= ($withparenthesis ? ' (' : '').$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('DateFrom', dol_print_date($date_start, $format, false, $outputlangs)).($withparenthesis ? ')' : '');
6710  }
6711  if (!$date_start && $date_end)
6712  {
6713  $out .= ($withparenthesis ? ' (' : '').$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('DateUntil', dol_print_date($date_end, $format, false, $outputlangs)).($withparenthesis ? ')' : '');
6714  }
6715 
6716  return $out;
6717 }
6718 
6727 function dolGetFirstLastname($firstname, $lastname, $nameorder = -1)
6728 {
6729  global $conf;
6730 
6731  $ret = '';
6732  // If order not defined, we use the setup
6733  if ($nameorder < 0) $nameorder = (empty($conf->global->MAIN_FIRSTNAME_NAME_POSITION) ? 1 : 0);
6734  if ($nameorder && $nameorder != 2 && $nameorder != 3)
6735  {
6736  $ret .= $firstname;
6737  if ($firstname && $lastname) $ret .= ' ';
6738  $ret .= $lastname;
6739  }
6740  elseif ($nameorder == 2 || $nameorder == 3)
6741  {
6742  $ret .= $firstname;
6743  if (empty($ret) && $nameorder == 3)
6744  {
6745  $ret .= $lastname;
6746  }
6747  }
6748  else
6749  {
6750  $ret .= $lastname;
6751  if ($firstname && $lastname) $ret .= ' ';
6752  $ret .= $firstname;
6753  }
6754  return $ret;
6755 }
6756 
6757 
6768 function setEventMessage($mesgs, $style = 'mesgs')
6769 {
6770  //dol_syslog(__FUNCTION__ . " is deprecated", LOG_WARNING); This is not deprecated, it is used by setEventMessages function
6771  if (!is_array($mesgs)) // If mesgs is a string
6772  {
6773  if ($mesgs) $_SESSION['dol_events'][$style][] = $mesgs;
6774  }
6775  else // If mesgs is an array
6776  {
6777  foreach ($mesgs as $mesg)
6778  {
6779  if ($mesg) $_SESSION['dol_events'][$style][] = $mesg;
6780  }
6781  }
6782 }
6783 
6795 function setEventMessages($mesg, $mesgs, $style = 'mesgs', $messagekey = '')
6796 {
6797  if (empty($mesg) && empty($mesgs))
6798  {
6799  dol_syslog("Try to add a message in stack with empty message", LOG_WARNING);
6800  }
6801  else
6802  {
6803  if ($messagekey)
6804  {
6805  // Complete message with a js link to set a cookie "DOLHIDEMESSAGE".$messagekey;
6806  // TODO
6807  $mesg .= '';
6808  }
6809  if (empty($messagekey) || empty($_COOKIE["DOLHIDEMESSAGE".$messagekey]))
6810  {
6811  if (!in_array((string) $style, array('mesgs', 'warnings', 'errors'))) dol_print_error('', 'Bad parameter style='.$style.' for setEventMessages');
6812  if (empty($mesgs)) setEventMessage($mesg, $style);
6813  else
6814  {
6815  if (!empty($mesg) && !in_array($mesg, $mesgs)) setEventMessage($mesg, $style); // Add message string if not already into array
6816  setEventMessage($mesgs, $style);
6817  }
6818  }
6819  }
6820 }
6821 
6831 function dol_htmloutput_events($disabledoutputofmessages = 0)
6832 {
6833  // Show mesgs
6834  if (isset($_SESSION['dol_events']['mesgs'])) {
6835  if (empty($disabledoutputofmessages)) dol_htmloutput_mesg('', $_SESSION['dol_events']['mesgs']);
6836  unset($_SESSION['dol_events']['mesgs']);
6837  }
6838 
6839  // Show errors
6840  if (isset($_SESSION['dol_events']['errors'])) {
6841  if (empty($disabledoutputofmessages)) dol_htmloutput_mesg('', $_SESSION['dol_events']['errors'], 'error');
6842  unset($_SESSION['dol_events']['errors']);
6843  }
6844 
6845  // Show warnings
6846  if (isset($_SESSION['dol_events']['warnings'])) {
6847  if (empty($disabledoutputofmessages)) dol_htmloutput_mesg('', $_SESSION['dol_events']['warnings'], 'warning');
6848  unset($_SESSION['dol_events']['warnings']);
6849  }
6850 }
6851 
6866 function get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = '', $style = 'ok', $keepembedded = 0)
6867 {
6868  global $conf, $langs;
6869 
6870  $ret = 0; $return = '';
6871  $out = '';
6872  $divstart = $divend = '';
6873 
6874  // If inline message with no format, we add it.
6875  if ((empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) || !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_JQUERY_JNOTIFY) || $keepembedded) && !preg_match('/<div class=".*">/i', $out))
6876  {
6877  $divstart = '<div class="'.$style.' clearboth">';
6878  $divend = '</div>';
6879  }
6880 
6881  if ((is_array($mesgarray) && count($mesgarray)) || $mesgstring)
6882  {
6883  $langs->load("errors");
6884  $out .= $divstart;
6885  if (is_array($mesgarray) && count($mesgarray))
6886  {
6887  foreach ($mesgarray as $message)
6888  {
6889  $ret++;
6890  $out .= $langs->trans($message);
6891  if ($ret < count($mesgarray)) $out .= "<br>\n";
6892  }
6893  }
6894  if ($mesgstring)
6895  {
6896  $langs->load("errors");
6897  $ret++;
6898  $out .= $langs->trans($mesgstring);
6899  }
6900  $out .= $divend;
6901  }
6902 
6903  if ($out)
6904  {
6905  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_JQUERY_JNOTIFY) && empty($keepembedded))
6906  {
6907  $return = '<script>
6908  $(document).ready(function() {
6909  var block = '.(!empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_BLOCKUI) ? "true" : "false").'
6910  if (block) {
6911  $.dolEventValid("","'.dol_escape_js($out).'");
6912  } else {
6913  /* jnotify(message, preset of message type, keepmessage) */
6914  $.jnotify("'.dol_escape_js($out).'",
6915  "'.($style == "ok" ? 3000 : $style).'",
6916  '.($style == "ok" ? "false" : "true").',
6917  { remove: function (){} } );
6918  }
6919  });
6920  </script>';
6921  }
6922  else
6923  {
6924  $return = $out;
6925  }
6926  }
6927 
6928  return $return;
6929 }
6930 
6942 function get_htmloutput_errors($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = array(), $keepembedded = 0)
6943 {
6944  return get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, 'error', $keepembedded);
6945 }
6946 
6960 function dol_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = array(), $style = 'ok', $keepembedded = 0)
6961 {
6962  if (empty($mesgstring) && (!is_array($mesgarray) || count($mesgarray) == 0)) return;
6963 
6964  $iserror = 0;
6965  $iswarning = 0;
6966  if (is_array($mesgarray))
6967  {
6968  foreach ($mesgarray as $val)
6969  {
6970  if ($val && preg_match('/class="error"/i', $val)) { $iserror++; break; }
6971  if ($val && preg_match('/class="warning"/i', $val)) { $iswarning++; break; }
6972  }
6973  }
6974  elseif ($mesgstring && preg_match('/class="error"/i', $mesgstring)) $iserror++;
6975  elseif ($mesgstring && preg_match('/class="warning"/i', $mesgstring)) $iswarning++;
6976  if ($style == 'error') $iserror++;
6977  if ($style == 'warning') $iswarning++;
6978 
6979  if ($iserror || $iswarning)
6980  {
6981  // Remove div from texts
6982  $mesgstring = preg_replace('/<\/div><div class="(error|warning)">/', '<br>', $mesgstring);
6983  $mesgstring = preg_replace('/<div class="(error|warning)">/', '', $mesgstring);
6984  $mesgstring = preg_replace('/<\/div>/', '', $mesgstring);
6985  // Remove div from texts array
6986  if (is_array($mesgarray))
6987  {
6988  $newmesgarray = array();
6989  foreach ($mesgarray as $val)
6990  {
6991  if (is_string($val))
6992  {
6993  $tmpmesgstring = preg_replace('/<\/div><div class="(error|warning)">/', '<br>', $val);
6994  $tmpmesgstring = preg_replace('/<div class="(error|warning)">/', '', $tmpmesgstring);
6995  $tmpmesgstring = preg_replace('/<\/div>/', '', $tmpmesgstring);
6996  $newmesgarray[] = $tmpmesgstring;
6997  }
6998  else
6999  {
7000  dol_syslog("Error call of dol_htmloutput_mesg with an array with a value that is not a string", LOG_WARNING);
7001  }
7002  }
7003  $mesgarray = $newmesgarray;
7004  }
7005  print get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, ($iserror ? 'error' : 'warning'), $keepembedded);
7006  }
7007  else print get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, 'ok', $keepembedded);
7008 }
7009 
7021 function dol_htmloutput_errors($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = array(), $keepembedded = 0)
7022 {
7023  dol_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, 'error', $keepembedded);
7024 }
7025 
7039 function dol_sort_array(&$array, $index, $order = 'asc', $natsort = 0, $case_sensitive = 0, $keepindex = 0)
7040 {
7041  // Clean parameters
7042  $order = strtolower($order);
7043 
7044  if (is_array($array))
7045  {
7046  $sizearray = count($array);
7047  if ($sizearray > 0)
7048  {
7049  $temp = array();
7050  foreach (array_keys($array) as $key)
7051  {
7052  if (is_object($array[$key]))
7053  {
7054  $temp[$key] = $array[$key]->$index;
7055  }
7056  else
7057  {
7058  $temp[$key] = $array[$key][$index];
7059  }
7060  }
7061 
7062  if (!$natsort) {
7063  ($order == 'asc') ? asort($temp) : arsort($temp);
7064  } else {
7065  ($case_sensitive) ? natsort($temp) : natcasesort($temp);
7066  if ($order != 'asc') $temp = array_reverse($temp, true);
7067  }
7068 
7069  $sorted = array();
7070 
7071  foreach (array_keys($temp) as $key)
7072  {
7073  (is_numeric($key) && empty($keepindex)) ? $sorted[] = $array[$key] : $sorted[$key] = $array[$key];
7074  }
7075 
7076  return $sorted;
7077  }
7078  }
7079  return $array;
7080 }
7081 
7082 
7089 function utf8_check($str)
7090 {
7091  // We must use here a binary strlen function (so not dol_strlen)
7092  $strLength = dol_strlen($str);
7093  for ($i = 0; $i < $strLength; $i++)
7094  {
7095  if (ord($str[$i]) < 0x80) continue; // 0bbbbbbb
7096  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xE0) == 0xC0) $n = 1; // 110bbbbb
7097  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xF0) == 0xE0) $n = 2; // 1110bbbb
7098  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xF8) == 0xF0) $n = 3; // 11110bbb
7099  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xFC) == 0xF8) $n = 4; // 111110bb
7100  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xFE) == 0xFC) $n = 5; // 1111110b
7101  else return false; // Does not match any model
7102  for ($j = 0; $j < $n; $j++) { // n bytes matching 10bbbbbb follow ?
7103  if ((++$i == strlen($str)) || ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xC0) != 0x80))
7104  return false;
7105  }
7106  }
7107  return true;
7108 }
7109 
7116 function ascii_check($str)
7117 {
7118  if (function_exists('mb_check_encoding')) {
7119  //if (mb_detect_encoding($str, 'ASCII', true) return false;
7120  if (!mb_check_encoding($str, 'ASCII')) return false;
7121  } else {
7122  if (preg_match('/[^\x00-\x7f]/', $str)) return false; // Contains a byte > 7f
7123  }
7124 
7125  return true;
7126 }
7127 
7128 
7136 function dol_osencode($str)
7137 {
7138  global $conf;
7139 
7140  $tmp = ini_get("unicode.filesystem_encoding"); // Disponible avec PHP 6.0
7141  if (empty($tmp) && !empty($_SERVER["WINDIR"])) $tmp = 'iso-8859-1'; // By default for windows
7142  if (empty($tmp)) $tmp = 'utf-8'; // By default for other
7143  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_FILESYSTEM_ENCODING)) $tmp = $conf->global->MAIN_FILESYSTEM_ENCODING;
7144 
7145  if ($tmp == 'iso-8859-1') return utf8_decode($str);
7146  return $str;
7147 }
7148 
7149 
7163 function dol_getIdFromCode($db, $key, $tablename, $fieldkey = 'code', $fieldid = 'id', $entityfilter = 0)
7164 {
7165  global $cache_codes;
7166 
7167  // If key empty
7168  if ($key == '') return '';
7169 
7170  // Check in cache
7171  if (isset($cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid])) // Can be defined to 0 or ''
7172  {
7173  return $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid]; // Found in cache
7174  }
7175 
7176  dol_syslog('dol_getIdFromCode (value for field '.$fieldid.' from key '.$key.' not found into cache)', LOG_DEBUG);
7177 
7178  $sql = "SELECT ".$fieldid." as valuetoget";
7179  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$tablename;
7180  $sql .= " WHERE ".$fieldkey." = '".$db->escape($key)."'";
7181  if (!empty($entityfilter))
7182  $sql .= " AND entity IN (".getEntity($tablename).")";
7183 
7184  $resql = $db->query($sql);
7185  if ($resql)
7186  {
7187  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
7188  if ($obj) $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid] = $obj->valuetoget;
7189  else $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid] = '';
7190  $db->free($resql);
7191  return $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid];
7192  }
7193  else
7194  {
7195  return -1;
7196  }
7197 }
7198 
7205 function verifCond($strRights)
7206 {
7207  global $user, $conf, $langs;
7208  global $leftmenu;
7209  global $rights; // To export to dol_eval function
7210 
7211  //print $strRights."<br>\n";
7212  $rights = true;
7213  if ($strRights != '')
7214  {
7215  $str = 'if(!('.$strRights.')) { $rights = false; }';
7216  dol_eval($str); // The dol_eval must contains all the global $xxx used into a condition
7217  }
7218  return $rights;
7219 }
7220 
7230 function dol_eval($s, $returnvalue = 0, $hideerrors = 1)
7231 {
7232  // Only global variables can be changed by eval function and returned to caller
7233  global $db, $langs, $user, $conf, $website, $websitepage;
7234  global $action, $mainmenu, $leftmenu;
7235  global $rights;
7236  global $object;
7237  global $mysoc;
7238 
7239  global $obj; // To get $obj used into list when dol_eval is used for computed fields and $obj is not yet $object
7240  global $soc; // For backward compatibility
7241 
7242  //print $s."<br>\n";
7243  if ($returnvalue)
7244  {
7245  if ($hideerrors) return @eval('return '.$s.';');
7246  else return eval('return '.$s.';');
7247  }
7248  else
7249  {
7250  if ($hideerrors) @eval($s);
7251  else eval($s);
7252  }
7253 }
7254 
7261 function dol_validElement($element)
7262 {
7263  return (trim($element) != '');
7264 }
7265 
7273 function picto_from_langcode($codelang, $moreatt = '')
7274 {
7275  global $langs;
7276 
7277  if (empty($codelang)) return '';
7278 
7279  if ($codelang == 'auto')
7280  {
7281  return '<span class="fa fa-globe"></span>';
7282  }
7283 
7284  $langtocountryflag = array(
7285  'ar_AR' => '',
7286  'ca_ES' => 'catalonia',
7287  'da_DA' => 'dk',
7288  'fr_CA' => 'mq',
7289  'sv_SV' => 'se'
7290  );
7291 
7292  if (isset($langtocountryflag[$codelang])) $flagImage = $langtocountryflag[$codelang];
7293  else
7294  {
7295  $tmparray = explode('_', $codelang);
7296  $flagImage = empty($tmparray[1]) ? $tmparray[0] : $tmparray[1];
7297  }
7298 
7299  return img_picto_common($codelang, 'flags/'.strtolower($flagImage).'.png', $moreatt);
7300 }
7301 
7309 function getLanguageCodeFromCountryCode($countrycode)
7310 {
7311  global $mysoc;
7312 
7313  if (empty($countrycode)) return null;
7314 
7315  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == 'MQ') return 'fr_CA';
7316  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == 'SE') return 'sv_SE'; // se_SE is Sami/Sweden, and we want in priority sv_SE for SE country
7317  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == 'CH')
7318  {
7319  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'FR') return 'fr_CH';
7320  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'DE') return 'de_CH';
7321  }
7322 
7323  // Locale list taken from:
7324  // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3191664/
7325  // list-of-all-locales-and-their-short-codes
7326  $locales = array(
7327  'af-ZA',
7328  'am-ET',
7329  'ar-AE',
7330  'ar-BH',
7331  'ar-DZ',
7332  'ar-EG',
7333  'ar-IQ',
7334  'ar-JO',

7339  'ar-OM',
7340  'ar-QA',

7344  'ar-YE',
7345  'as-IN',
7346  'ba-RU',
7347  'be-BY',
7348  'bg-BG',
7349  'bn-BD',
7350  'bn-IN',
7351  'bo-CN',
7352  'br-FR',
7353  'ca-ES',
7354  'co-FR',
7355  'cs-CZ',
7356  'cy-GB',
7357  'da-DK',
7358  'de-AT',
7359  'de-CH',
7360  'de-DE',
7361  'de-LI',
7362  'de-LU',
7363  'dv-MV',
7364  'el-GR',
7365  'en-AU',
7366  'en-BZ',
7367  'en-CA',
7368  'en-GB',
7369  'en-IE',
7370  'en-IN',
