7449  'ne-NP',
7450  'nl-BE',
7451  'nl-NL',
7452  'nn-NO',
7453  'oc-FR',
7454  'or-IN',
7455  'pa-IN',
7456  'pl-PL',
7457  'ps-AF',
7458  'pt-BR',
7459  'pt-PT',
7460  'rm-CH',
7461  'ro-RO',
7462  'ru-RU',
7463  'rw-RW',
7464  'sa-IN',
7465  'se-FI',
7466  'se-NO',
7467  'se-SE',
7468  'si-LK',
7469  'sk-SK',
7470  'sl-SI',
7471  'sq-AL',
7472  'sv-FI',
7473  'sv-SE',
7474  'sw-KE',
7475  'ta-IN',
7476  'te-IN',
7477  'th-TH',
7478  'tk-TM',
7479  'tn-ZA',
7480  'tr-TR',
7481  'tt-RU',
7482  'ug-CN',
7483  'uk-UA',
7484  'ur-PK',
7485  'vi-VN',
7486  'wo-SN',
7487  'xh-ZA',
7488  'yo-NG',
7489  'zh-CN',
7490  'zh-HK',
7491  'zh-MO',
7492  'zh-SG',
7493  'zh-TW',
7494  'zu-ZA',
7495  );
7496 
7497  $buildprimarykeytotest = strtolower($countrycode).'-'.strtoupper($countrycode);
7498  if (in_array($buildprimarykeytotest, $locales)) return strtolower($countrycode).'_'.strtoupper($countrycode);
7499 
7500  if (function_exists('locale_get_primary_language') && function_exists('locale_get_region')) // Need extension php-intl
7501  {
7502  foreach ($locales as $locale)
7503  {
7504  $locale_language = locale_get_primary_language($locale);
7505  $locale_region = locale_get_region($locale);
7506  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == $locale_region)
7507  {
7508  //var_dump($locale.'-'.$locale_language.'-'.$locale_region);
7509  return strtolower($locale_language).'_'.strtoupper($locale_region);
7510  }
7511  }
7512  }
7513  else
7514  {
7515  dol_syslog("Warning Exention php-intl is not available", LOG_WARNING);
7516  }
7517 
7518  return null;
7519 }
7520 
7550 function complete_head_from_modules($conf, $langs, $object, &$head, &$h, $type, $mode = 'add')
7551 {
7552  global $hookmanager;
7553 
7554  if (isset($conf->modules_parts['tabs'][$type]) && is_array($conf->modules_parts['tabs'][$type]))
7555  {
7556  foreach ($conf->modules_parts['tabs'][$type] as $value)
7557  {
7558  $values = explode(':', $value);
7559 
7560  if ($mode == 'add' && !preg_match('/^\-/', $values[1]))
7561  {
7562  if (count($values) == 6) // new declaration with permissions: $value='objecttype:+tabname1:Title1:langfile@mymodule:$user->rights->mymodule->read:/mymodule/mynewtab1.php?id=__ID__'
7563  {
7564  if ($values[0] != $type) continue;
7565 
7566  if (verifCond($values[4]))
7567  {
7568  if ($values[3]) $langs->load($values[3]);
7569  if (preg_match('/SUBSTITUTION_([^_]+)/i', $values[2], $reg))
7570  {
7571  $substitutionarray = array();
7572  complete_substitutions_array($substitutionarray, $langs, $object, array('needforkey'=>$values[2]));
7573  $label = make_substitutions($reg[1], $substitutionarray);
7574  }
7575  else $label = $langs->trans($values[2]);
7576 
7577  $head[$h][0] = dol_buildpath(preg_replace('/__ID__/i', ((is_object($object) && !empty($object->id)) ? $object->id : ''), $values[5]), 1);
7578  $head[$h][1] = $label;
7579  $head[$h][2] = str_replace('+', '', $values[1]);
7580  $h++;
7581  }
7582  }
7583  elseif (count($values) == 5) // deprecated
7584  {
7585  dol_syslog('Passing 5 values in tabs module_parts is deprecated. Please update to 6 with permissions.', LOG_WARNING);
7586 
7587  if ($values[0] != $type) continue;
7588  if ($values[3]) $langs->load($values[3]);
7589  if (preg_match('/SUBSTITUTION_([^_]+)/i', $values[2], $reg))
7590  {
7591  $substitutionarray = array();
7592  complete_substitutions_array($substitutionarray, $langs, $object, array('needforkey'=>$values[2]));
7593  $label = make_substitutions($reg[1], $substitutionarray);
7594  }
7595  else $label = $langs->trans($values[2]);
7596 
7597  $head[$h][0] = dol_buildpath(preg_replace('/__ID__/i', ((is_object($object) && !empty($object->id)) ? $object->id : ''), $values[4]), 1);
7598  $head[$h][1] = $label;
7599  $head[$h][2] = str_replace('+', '', $values[1]);
7600  $h++;
7601  }
7602  }
7603  elseif ($mode == 'remove' && preg_match('/^\-/', $values[1]))
7604  {
7605  if ($values[0] != $type) continue;
7606  $tabname = str_replace('-', '', $values[1]);
7607  foreach ($head as $key => $val)
7608  {
7609  $condition = (!empty($values[3]) ? verifCond($values[3]) : 1);
7610  //var_dump($key.' - '.$tabname.' - '.$head[$key][2].' - '.$values[3].' - '.$condition);
7611  if ($head[$key][2] == $tabname && $condition)
7612  {
7613  unset($head[$key]);
7614  break;
7615  }
7616  }
7617  }
7618  }
7619  }
7620 
7621  // No need to make a return $head. Var is modified as a reference
7622  if (!empty($hookmanager))
7623  {
7624  $parameters = array('object' => $object, 'mode' => $mode, 'head' => $head);
7625  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('completeTabsHead', $parameters);
7626  if ($reshook > 0)
7627  {
7628  $head = $hookmanager->resArray;
7629  $h = count($head);
7630  }
7631  }
7632 }
7633 
7645 function printCommonFooter($zone = 'private')
7646 {
7647  global $conf, $hookmanager, $user, $debugbar;
7648  global $action;
7649  global $micro_start_time;
7650 
7651  if ($zone == 'private') print "\n".'<!-- Common footer for private page -->'."\n";
7652  else print "\n".'<!-- Common footer for public page -->'."\n";
7653 
7654  // A div to store page_y POST parameter so we can read it using javascript
7655  print "\n<!-- A div to store page_y POST parameter -->\n";
7656  print '<div id="page_y" style="display: none;">'.$_POST['page_y'].'</div>'."\n";
7657 
7658  $parameters = array();
7659  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printCommonFooter', $parameters); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
7660  if (empty($reshook))
7661  {
7662  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_HTML_FOOTER)) print $conf->global->MAIN_HTML_FOOTER."\n";
7663 
7664  print "\n";
7665  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax))
7666  {
7667  print '<script>'."\n";
7668  print 'jQuery(document).ready(function() {'."\n";
7669 
7670  if ($zone == 'private' && empty($conf->dol_use_jmobile))
7671  {
7672  print "\n";
7673  print '/* JS CODE TO ENABLE to manage handler to switch left menu page (menuhider) */'."\n";
7674  print 'jQuery("li.menuhider").click(function(event) {';
7675  print ' if (!$( "body" ).hasClass( "sidebar-collapse" )){ event.preventDefault(); }'."\n";
7676  print ' console.log("We click on .menuhider");'."\n";
7677  print ' $("body").toggleClass("sidebar-collapse")'."\n";
7678  print '});'."\n";
7679  }
7680 
7681  // Management of focus and mandatory for fields
7682  if ($action == 'create' || $action == 'edit' || (empty($action) && (preg_match('/new\.php/', $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"]))))
7683  {
7684  print '/* JS CODE TO ENABLE to manage focus and mandatory form fields */'."\n";
7685  $relativepathstring = $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"];
7686  // Clean $relativepathstring
7687  if (constant('DOL_URL_ROOT')) $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(constant('DOL_URL_ROOT'), '/').'/', '', $relativepathstring);
7688  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^\//', '', $relativepathstring);
7689  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^custom\//', '', $relativepathstring);
7690  //$tmpqueryarraywehave = explode('&', dol_string_nohtmltag($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
7691  if (!empty($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['focus']))
7692  {
7693  foreach ($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['focus'] as $defkey => $defval)
7694  {
7695  $qualified = 0;
7696  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
7697  {
7698  $tmpqueryarraytohave = explode('&', $defkey);
7699  $foundintru = 0;
7700  foreach ($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
7701  {
7702  $tmpquerytohaveparam = explode('=', $tmpquerytohave);
7703  //print "console.log('".$tmpquerytohaveparam[0]." ".$tmpquerytohaveparam[1]." ".GETPOST($tmpquerytohaveparam[0])."');";
7704  if (!GETPOSTISSET($tmpquerytohaveparam[0]) || ($tmpquerytohaveparam[1] != GETPOST($tmpquerytohaveparam[0]))) $foundintru = 1;
7705  }
7706  if (!$foundintru) $qualified = 1;
7707  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
7708  }
7709  else $qualified = 1;
7710 
7711  if ($qualified)
7712  {
7713  foreach ($defval as $paramkey => $paramval)
7714  {
7715  // Set focus on field
7716  print 'jQuery("input[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").focus();'."\n";
7717  print 'jQuery("textarea[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").focus();'."\n";
7718  print 'jQuery("select[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").focus();'."\n"; // Not really usefull, but we keep it in case of.
7719  }
7720  }
7721  }
7722  }
7723  if (!empty($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['mandatory']))
7724  {
7725  foreach ($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['mandatory'] as $defkey => $defval)
7726  {
7727  $qualified = 0;
7728  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
7729  {
7730  $tmpqueryarraytohave = explode('&', $defkey);
7731  $foundintru = 0;
7732  foreach ($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
7733  {
7734  $tmpquerytohaveparam = explode('=', $tmpquerytohave);
7735  //print "console.log('".$tmpquerytohaveparam[0]." ".$tmpquerytohaveparam[1]." ".GETPOST($tmpquerytohaveparam[0])."');";
7736  if (!GETPOSTISSET($tmpquerytohaveparam[0]) || ($tmpquerytohaveparam[1] != GETPOST($tmpquerytohaveparam[0]))) $foundintru = 1;
7737  }
7738  if (!$foundintru) $qualified = 1;
7739  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
7740  }
7741  else $qualified = 1;
7742 
7743  if ($qualified)
7744  {
7745  foreach ($defval as $paramkey => $paramval)
7746  {
7747  // Add property 'required' on input
7748  print 'jQuery("input[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").prop(\'required\',true);'."\n";
7749  print 'jQuery("textarea[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").prop(\'required\',true);'."\n";
7750  print 'jQuery("select[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").prop(\'required\',true);'."\n"; // required on a select works only if key is "", this does not happen in Dolibarr
7751  }
7752  }
7753  }
7754  }
7755  }
7756 
7757  print '});'."\n";
7758 
7759  // End of tuning
7760  if (!empty($_SERVER['MAIN_SHOW_TUNING_INFO']) || !empty($conf->global->MAIN_SHOW_TUNING_INFO))
7761  {
7762  print "\n";
7763  print "/* JS CODE TO ENABLE to add memory info */\n";
7764  print 'window.console && console.log("';
7765  if (!empty($conf->global->MEMCACHED_SERVER)) print 'MEMCACHED_SERVER='.$conf->global->MEMCACHED_SERVER.' - ';
7766  print 'MAIN_OPTIMIZE_SPEED='.(isset($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZE_SPEED) ? $conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZE_SPEED : 'off');
7767  if (!empty($micro_start_time)) // Works only if MAIN_SHOW_TUNING_INFO is defined at $_SERVER level. Not in global variable.
7768  {
7769  $micro_end_time = microtime(true);
7770  print ' - Build time: '.ceil(1000 * ($micro_end_time - $micro_start_time)).' ms';
7771  }
7772 
7773  if (function_exists("memory_get_usage")) {
7774  print ' - Mem: '.memory_get_usage(); // Do not use true here, it seems it takes the peak amount
7775  }
7776  if (function_exists("memory_get_peak_usage")) {
7777  print ' - Real mem peak: '.memory_get_peak_usage(true);
7778  }
7779  if (function_exists("zend_loader_file_encoded"))
7780  {
7781  print ' - Zend encoded file: '.(zend_loader_file_encoded() ? 'yes' : 'no');
7782  }
7783  print '");'."\n";
7784  }
7785 
7786  print "\n".'</script>'."\n";
7787 
7788  // Google Analytics
7789  // TODO Add a hook here
7790  if (!empty($conf->google->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_GOOGLE_AN_ID))
7791  {
7792  $tmptagarray = explode(',', $conf->global->MAIN_GOOGLE_AN_ID);
7793  foreach($tmptagarray as $tmptag) {
7794  print "\n";
7795  print "<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE for google analtics tag -->\n";
7796  print "
7797  <!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics -->
7798  <script async src=\"https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=".trim($tmptag)."\"></script>
7799  <script>
7800  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
7801  function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
7802  gtag('js', new Date());
7803 
7804  gtag('config', '".trim($tmptag)."');
7805  </script>";
7806  print "\n";
7807  }
7808  }
7809  }
7810 
7811  // Add Xdebug coverage of code
7812  if (defined('XDEBUGCOVERAGE'))
7813  {
7814  print_r(xdebug_get_code_coverage());
7815  }
7816 
7817  // Add DebugBar data
7818  if (!empty($user->rights->debugbar->read) && is_object($debugbar))
7819  {
7820  $debugbar['time']->stopMeasure('pageaftermaster');
7821  print '<!-- Output debugbar data -->'."\n";
7822  print $debugbar->getRenderer()->render();
7823  }
7824  elseif (count($conf->logbuffer)) // If there is some logs in buffer to show
7825  {
7826  print "\n";
7827  print "<!-- Start of log output\n";
7828  //print '<div class="hidden">'."\n";
7829  foreach ($conf->logbuffer as $logline)
7830  {
7831  print $logline."<br>\n";
7832  }
7833  //print '</div>'."\n";
7834  print "End of log output -->\n";
7835  }
7836  }
7837 }
7838 
7848 function dolExplodeIntoArray($string, $delimiter = ';', $kv = '=')
7849 {
7850  if ($a = explode($delimiter, $string))
7851  {
7852  $ka = array();
7853  foreach ($a as $s) { // each part
7854  if ($s) {
7855  if ($pos = strpos($s, $kv)) { // key/value delimiter
7856  $ka[trim(substr($s, 0, $pos))] = trim(substr($s, $pos + strlen($kv)));
7857  } else { // key delimiter not found
7858  $ka[] = trim($s);
7859  }
7860  }
7861  }
7862  return $ka;
7863  }
7864  return array();
7865 }
7866 
7867 
7874 function dol_set_focus($selector)
7875 {
7876  print "\n".'<!-- Set focus onto a specific field -->'."\n";
7877  print '<script>jQuery(document).ready(function() { jQuery("'.dol_escape_js($selector).'").focus(); });</script>'."\n";
7878 }
7879 
7880 
7888 function dol_getmypid()
7889 {
7890  if (!function_exists('getmypid')) {
7891  return mt_rand(1, 32768);
7892  } else {
7893  return getmypid();
7894  }
7895 }
7896 
7897 
7914 function natural_search($fields, $value, $mode = 0, $nofirstand = 0)
7915 {
7916  global $db, $langs;
7917 
7918  $value = trim($value);
7919 
7920  if ($mode == 0)
7921  {
7922  $value = preg_replace('/\*/', '%', $value); // Replace * with %
7923  }
7924  if ($mode == 1)
7925  {
7926  $value = preg_replace('/([<>=]+)\s+([0-9'.preg_quote($langs->trans("DecimalSeparator"), '/').'\-])/', '\1\2', $value); // Clean string '< 10' into '<10' so we can the explode on space to get all tests to do
7927  }
7928 
7929  $value = preg_replace('/\s*\|\s*/', '|', $value);
7930 
7931  $crits = explode(' ', $value);
7932  $res = '';
7933  if (!is_array($fields)) $fields = array($fields);
7934 
7935  $nboffields = count($fields);
7936  $end2 = count($crits);
7937  $j = 0;
7938  foreach ($crits as $crit)
7939  {
7940  $i = 0; $i2 = 0;
7941  $newres = '';
7942  foreach ($fields as $field)
7943  {
7944  if ($mode == 1)
7945  {
7946  $operator = '=';
7947  $newcrit = preg_replace('/([<>=]+)/', '', trim($crit));
7948 
7949  $reg = array();
7950  preg_match('/([<>=]+)/', trim($crit), $reg);
7951  if ($reg[1])
7952  {
7953  $operator = $reg[1];
7954  }
7955  if ($newcrit != '')
7956  {
7957  $numnewcrit = price2num($newcrit);
7958  if (is_numeric($numnewcrit))
7959  {
7960  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '').$field.' '.$operator.' '.$numnewcrit;
7961  }
7962  else
7963  {
7964  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '').'1 = 2'; // force false
7965  }
7966  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
7967  }
7968  }
7969  elseif ($mode == 2 || $mode == -2)
7970  {
7971  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '').$field." ".($mode == -2 ? 'NOT ' : '')."IN (".$db->escape(trim($crit)).")";
7972  if ($mode == -2) $newres .= ' OR '.$field.' IS NULL';
7973  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
7974  }
7975  elseif ($mode == 3 || $mode == -3)
7976  {
7977  $tmparray = explode(',', trim($crit));
7978  if (count($tmparray))
7979  {
7980  $listofcodes = '';
7981  foreach ($tmparray as $val)
7982  {
7983  if ($val)
7984  {
7985  $listofcodes .= ($listofcodes ? ',' : '');
7986  $listofcodes .= "'".$db->escape(trim($val))."'";
7987  }
7988  }
7989  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '').$field." ".($mode == -3 ? 'NOT ' : '')."IN (".$listofcodes.")";
7990  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
7991  }
7992  if ($mode == -3) $newres .= ' OR '.$field.' IS NULL';
7993  }
7994  elseif ($mode == 4)
7995  {
7996  $tmparray = explode(',', trim($crit));
7997  if (count($tmparray))
7998  {
7999  $listofcodes = '';
8000  foreach ($tmparray as $val)
8001  {
8002  if ($val)
8003  {
8004  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR (' : '(').$field.' LIKE \''.$db->escape(trim($val)).',%\'';
8005  $newres .= ' OR '.$field.' = \''.$db->escape(trim($val)).'\'';
8006  $newres .= ' OR '.$field.' LIKE \'%,'.$db->escape(trim($val)).'\'';
8007  $newres .= ' OR '.$field.' LIKE \'%,'.$db->escape(trim($val)).',%\'';
8008  $newres .= ')';
8009  $i2++;
8010  }
8011  }
8012  }
8013  }
8014  else // $mode=0
8015  {
8016  $tmpcrits = explode('|', $crit);
8017  $i3 = 0;
8018  foreach ($tmpcrits as $tmpcrit)
8019  {
8020  if ($tmpcrit !== '0' && empty($tmpcrit)) continue;
8021 
8022  $newres .= (($i2 > 0 || $i3 > 0) ? ' OR ' : '');
8023 
8024  if (preg_match('/\.(id|rowid)$/', $field)) // Special case for rowid that is sometimes a ref so used as a search field
8025  {
8026  $newres .= $field." = ".(is_numeric(trim($tmpcrit)) ?trim($tmpcrit) : '0');
8027  }
8028  else
8029  {
8030  $newres .= $field." LIKE '";
8031 
8032  $tmpcrit = trim($tmpcrit);
8033  $tmpcrit2 = $tmpcrit;
8034  $tmpbefore = '%'; $tmpafter = '%';
8035  if (preg_match('/^[\^\$]/', $tmpcrit))
8036  {
8037  $tmpbefore = '';
8038  $tmpcrit2 = preg_replace('/^[\^\$]/', '', $tmpcrit2);
8039  }
8040  if (preg_match('/[\^\$]$/', $tmpcrit))
8041  {
8042  $tmpafter = '';
8043  $tmpcrit2 = preg_replace('/[\^\$]$/', '', $tmpcrit2);
8044  }
8045  $newres .= $tmpbefore;
8046  $newres .= $db->escape($tmpcrit2);
8047  $newres .= $tmpafter;
8048  $newres .= "'";
8049  if ($tmpcrit2 == '')
8050  {
8051  $newres .= ' OR '.$field." IS NULL";
8052  }
8053  }
8054 
8055  $i3++;
8056  }
8057  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
8058  }
8059  $i++;
8060  }
8061  if ($newres) $res = $res.($res ? ' AND ' : '').($i2 > 1 ? '(' : '').$newres.($i2 > 1 ? ')' : '');
8062  $j++;
8063  }
8064  $res = ($nofirstand ? "" : " AND ")."(".$res.")";
8065  //print 'xx'.$res.'yy';
8066  return $res;
8067 }
8068 
8075 function showDirectDownloadLink($object)
8076 {
8077  global $conf, $langs;
8078 
8079  $out = '';
8080  $url = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
8081 
8082  if ($url)
8083  {
8084  $out .= img_picto('', 'globe').' '.$langs->trans("DirectDownloadLink").'<br>';
8085  $out .= '<input type="text" id="directdownloadlink" class="quatrevingtpercent" value="'.$url.'">';
8086  $out .= ajax_autoselect("directdownloadlink", 0);
8087  }
8088  return $out;
8089 }
8090 
8099 function getImageFileNameForSize($file, $extName, $extImgTarget = '')
8100 {
8101  $dirName = dirname($file);
8102  if ($dirName == '.') $dirName = '';
8103 
8104  $fileName = preg_replace('/(\.gif|\.jpeg|\.jpg|\.png|\.bmp|\.webp)$/i', '', $file); // We remove extension, whatever is its case
8105  $fileName = basename($fileName);
8106 
8107  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.jpg$/i', $file) ? '.jpg' : '');
8108  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.jpeg$/i', $file) ? '.jpeg' : '');
8109  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.gif$/i', $file) ? '.gif' : '');
8110  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.png$/i', $file) ? '.png' : '');
8111  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.bmp$/i', $file) ? '.bmp' : '');
8112  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.webp$/i', $file) ? '.webp' : '');
8113 
8114  if (!$extImgTarget) return $file;
8115 
8116  $subdir = '';
8117  if ($extName) $subdir = 'thumbs/';
8118 
8119  return ($dirName ? $dirName.'/' : '').$subdir.$fileName.$extName.$extImgTarget; // New filename for thumb
8120 }
8121 
8122 
8132 function getAdvancedPreviewUrl($modulepart, $relativepath, $alldata = 0, $param = '')
8133 {
8134  global $conf, $langs;
8135 
8136  if (empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) return '';
8137 
8138  $isAllowedForPreview = dolIsAllowedForPreview($relativepath);
8139 
8140  if ($alldata == 1)
8141  {
8142  if ($isAllowedForPreview) return array('target'=>'_blank', 'css'=>'documentpreview', 'url'=>DOL_URL_ROOT.'/document.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&attachment=0&file='.urlencode($relativepath).($param ? '&'.$param : ''), 'mime'=>dol_mimetype($relativepath));
8143  else return array();
8144  }
8145 
8146  // old behavior, return a string
8147  if ($isAllowedForPreview) return 'javascript:document_preview(\''.dol_escape_js(DOL_URL_ROOT.'/document.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&attachment=0&file='.urlencode($relativepath).($param ? '&'.$param : '')).'\', \''.dol_mimetype($relativepath).'\', \''.dol_escape_js($langs->trans('Preview')).'\')';
8148  else return '';
8149 }
8150 
8151 
8159 function ajax_autoselect($htmlname, $addlink = '')
8160 {
8161  global $langs;
8162  $out = '<script>
8163  jQuery(document).ready(function () {
8164  jQuery("'.((strpos($htmlname, '.') === 0 ? '' : '#').$htmlname).'").click(function() { jQuery(this).select(); } );
8165  });
8166  </script>';
8167  if ($addlink) $out .= ' <a href="'.$addlink.'" target="_blank">'.$langs->trans("Link").'</a>';
8168  return $out;
8169 }
8170 
8178 function dolIsAllowedForPreview($file)
8179 {
8180  global $conf;
8181 
8182  // Check .noexe extension in filename
8183  if (preg_match('/\.noexe$/i', $file)) return 0;
8184 
8185  // Check mime types
8186  $mime_preview = array('bmp', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif', 'tiff', 'pdf', 'plain', 'css', 'webp');
8187  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_ALLOW_SVG_FILES_AS_IMAGES)) $mime_preview[] = 'svg+xml';
8188  //$mime_preview[]='vnd.oasis.opendocument.presentation';
8189  //$mime_preview[]='archive';
8190  $num_mime = array_search(dol_mimetype($file, '', 1), $mime_preview);
8191  if ($num_mime !== false) return 1;
8192 
8193  // By default, not allowed for preview
8194  return 0;
8195 }
8196 
8206 function dol_mimetype($file, $default = 'application/octet-stream', $mode = 0)
8207 {
8208  $mime = $default;
8209  $imgmime = 'other.png';
8210  $famime = 'file-o';
8211  $srclang = '';
8212 
8213  $tmpfile = preg_replace('/\.noexe$/', '', $file);
8214 
8215  // Plain text files
8216  if (preg_match('/\.txt$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8217  if (preg_match('/\.rtx$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/richtext'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8218  if (preg_match('/\.csv$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/csv'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8219  if (preg_match('/\.tsv$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/tab-separated-values'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8220  if (preg_match('/\.(cf|conf|log)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8221  if (preg_match('/\.ini$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $srclang = 'ini'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8222  if (preg_match('/\.md$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $srclang = 'md'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8223  if (preg_match('/\.css$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/css'; $imgmime = 'css.png'; $srclang = 'css'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8224  // Certificate files
8225  if (preg_match('/\.(crt|cer|key|pub)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8226  // XML based (HTML/XML/XAML)
8227  if (preg_match('/\.(html|htm|shtml)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/html'; $imgmime = 'html.png'; $srclang = 'html'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8228  if (preg_match('/\.(xml|xhtml)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/xml'; $imgmime = 'other.png'; $srclang = 'xml'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8229  if (preg_match('/\.xaml$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/xml'; $imgmime = 'other.png'; $srclang = 'xaml'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8230  // Languages
8231  if (preg_match('/\.bas$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $srclang = 'bas'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8232  if (preg_match('/\.(c)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $srclang = 'c'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8233  if (preg_match('/\.(cpp)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $srclang = 'cpp'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8234  if (preg_match('/\.cs$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $srclang = 'cs'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8235  if (preg_match('/\.(h)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $srclang = 'h'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8236  if (preg_match('/\.(java|jsp)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $srclang = 'java'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8237  if (preg_match('/\.php([0-9]{1})?$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'php.png'; $srclang = 'php'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8238  if (preg_match('/\.phtml$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'php.png'; $srclang = 'php'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8239  if (preg_match('/\.(pl|pm)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'pl.png'; $srclang = 'perl'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8240  if (preg_match('/\.sql$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/plain'; $imgmime = 'text.png'; $srclang = 'sql'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8241  if (preg_match('/\.js$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/x-javascript'; $imgmime = 'jscript.png'; $srclang = 'js'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8242  // Open office
8243  if (preg_match('/\.odp$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.presentation'; $imgmime = 'ooffice.png'; $famime = 'file-powerpoint-o'; }
8244  if (preg_match('/\.ods$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.spreadsheet'; $imgmime = 'ooffice.png'; $famime = 'file-excel-o'; }
8245  if (preg_match('/\.odt$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.text'; $imgmime = 'ooffice.png'; $famime = 'file-word-o'; }
8246  // MS Office
8247  if (preg_match('/\.mdb$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/msaccess'; $imgmime = 'mdb.png'; $famime = 'file-o'; }
8248  if (preg_match('/\.doc(x|m)?$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/msword'; $imgmime = 'doc.png'; $famime = 'file-word-o'; }
8249  if (preg_match('/\.dot(x|m)?$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/msword'; $imgmime = 'doc.png'; $famime = 'file-word-o'; }
8250  if (preg_match('/\.xlt(x)?$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/vnd.ms-excel'; $imgmime = 'xls.png'; $famime = 'file-excel-o'; }
8251  if (preg_match('/\.xla(m)?$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/vnd.ms-excel'; $imgmime = 'xls.png'; $famime = 'file-excel-o'; }
8252  if (preg_match('/\.xls$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/vnd.ms-excel'; $imgmime = 'xls.png'; $famime = 'file-excel-o'; }
8253  if (preg_match('/\.xls(b|m|x)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet'; $imgmime = 'xls.png'; $famime = 'file-excel-o'; }
8254  if (preg_match('/\.pps(m|x)?$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/vnd.ms-powerpoint'; $imgmime = 'ppt.png'; $famime = 'file-powerpoint-o'; }
8255  if (preg_match('/\.ppt(m|x)?$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/x-mspowerpoint'; $imgmime = 'ppt.png'; $famime = 'file-powerpoint-o'; }
8256  // Other
8257  if (preg_match('/\.pdf$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/pdf'; $imgmime = 'pdf.png'; $famime = 'file-pdf-o'; }
8258  // Scripts
8259  if (preg_match('/\.bat$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/x-bat'; $imgmime = 'script.png'; $srclang = 'dos'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8260  if (preg_match('/\.sh$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/x-sh'; $imgmime = 'script.png'; $srclang = 'bash'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8261  if (preg_match('/\.ksh$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/x-ksh'; $imgmime = 'script.png'; $srclang = 'bash'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8262  if (preg_match('/\.bash$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/x-bash'; $imgmime = 'script.png'; $srclang = 'bash'; $famime = 'file-code-o'; }
8263  // Images
8264  if (preg_match('/\.ico$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'image/x-icon'; $imgmime = 'image.png'; $famime = 'file-image-o'; }
8265  if (preg_match('/\.(jpg|jpeg)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'image/jpeg'; $imgmime = 'image.png'; $famime = 'file-image-o'; }
8266  if (preg_match('/\.png$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'image/png'; $imgmime = 'image.png'; $famime = 'file-image-o'; }
8267  if (preg_match('/\.gif$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'image/gif'; $imgmime = 'image.png'; $famime = 'file-image-o'; }
8268  if (preg_match('/\.bmp$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'image/bmp'; $imgmime = 'image.png'; $famime = 'file-image-o'; }
8269  if (preg_match('/\.(tif|tiff)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'image/tiff'; $imgmime = 'image.png'; $famime = 'file-image-o'; }
8270  if (preg_match('/\.svg$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'image/svg+xml'; $imgmime = 'image.png'; $famime = 'file-image-o'; }
8271  if (preg_match('/\.webp$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'image/webp'; $imgmime = 'image.png'; $famime = 'file-image-o'; }
8272  // Calendar
8273  if (preg_match('/\.vcs$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/calendar'; $imgmime = 'other.png'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8274  if (preg_match('/\.ics$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'text/calendar'; $imgmime = 'other.png'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8275  // Other
8276  if (preg_match('/\.torrent$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/x-bittorrent'; $imgmime = 'other.png'; $famime = 'file-o'; }
8277  // Audio
8278  if (preg_match('/\.(mp3|ogg|au|wav|wma|mid)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'audio'; $imgmime = 'audio.png'; $famime = 'file-audio-o'; }
8279  // Video
8280  if (preg_match('/\.ogv$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'video/ogg'; $imgmime = 'video.png'; $famime = 'file-video-o'; }
8281  if (preg_match('/\.webm$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'video/webm'; $imgmime = 'video.png'; $famime = 'file-video-o'; }
8282  if (preg_match('/\.avi$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'video/x-msvideo'; $imgmime = 'video.png'; $famime = 'file-video-o'; }
8283  if (preg_match('/\.divx$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'video/divx'; $imgmime = 'video.png'; $famime = 'file-video-o'; }
8284  if (preg_match('/\.xvid$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'video/xvid'; $imgmime = 'video.png'; $famime = 'file-video-o'; }
8285  if (preg_match('/\.(wmv|mpg|mpeg)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'video'; $imgmime = 'video.png'; $famime = 'file-video-o'; }
8286  // Archive
8287  if (preg_match('/\.(zip|rar|gz|tgz|z|cab|bz2|7z|tar|lzh)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'archive'; $imgmime = 'archive.png'; $famime = 'file-archive-o'; } // application/xxx where zzz is zip, ...
8288  // Exe
8289  if (preg_match('/\.(exe|com)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'application/octet-stream'; $imgmime = 'other.png'; $famime = 'file-o'; }
8290  // Lib
8291  if (preg_match('/\.(dll|lib|o|so|a)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'library'; $imgmime = 'library.png'; $famime = 'file-o'; }
8292  // Err
8293  if (preg_match('/\.err$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime = 'error'; $imgmime = 'error.png'; $famime = 'file-text-o'; }
8294 
8295  // Return string
8296  if ($mode == 1)
8297  {
8298  $tmp = explode('/', $mime);
8299  return (!empty($tmp[1]) ? $tmp[1] : $tmp[0]);
8300  }
8301  if ($mode == 2)
8302  {
8303  return $imgmime;
8304  }
8305  if ($mode == 3)
8306  {
8307  return $srclang;
8308  }
8309  if ($mode == 4)
8310  {
8311  return $famime;
8312  }
8313  return $mime;
8314 }
8315 
8326 function getDictvalue($tablename, $field, $id, $checkentity = false, $rowidfield = 'rowid')
8327 {
8328  global $dictvalues, $db, $langs;
8329 
8330  if (!isset($dictvalues[$tablename]))
8331  {
8332  $dictvalues[$tablename] = array();
8333  $sql = 'SELECT * FROM '.$tablename.' WHERE 1 = 1'; // Here select * is allowed as it is generic code and we don't have list of fields
8334  if ($checkentity) $sql .= ' AND entity IN (0,'.getEntity($tablename).')';
8335 
8336  $resql = $db->query($sql);
8337  if ($resql)
8338  {
8339  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql))
8340  {
8341  $dictvalues[$tablename][$obj->{$rowidfield}] = $obj;
8342  }
8343  }
8344  else
8345  {
8346  dol_print_error($db);
8347  }
8348  }
8349 
8350  if (!empty($dictvalues[$tablename][$id])) return $dictvalues[$tablename][$id]->{$field}; // Found
8351  else // Not found
8352  {
8353  if ($id > 0) return $id;
8354  return '';
8355  }
8356 }
8357 
8364 function colorIsLight($stringcolor)
8365 {
8366  $stringcolor = str_replace('#', '', $stringcolor);
8367  $res = -1;
8368  if (!empty($stringcolor))
8369  {
8370  $res = 0;
8371  $tmp = explode(',', $stringcolor);
8372  if (count($tmp) > 1) // This is a comma RGB ('255','255','255')
8373  {
8374  $r = $tmp[0];
8375  $g = $tmp[1];
8376  $b = $tmp[2];
8377  }
8378  else
8379  {
8380  $hexr = $stringcolor[0].$stringcolor[1];
8381  $hexg = $stringcolor[2].$stringcolor[3];
8382  $hexb = $stringcolor[4].$stringcolor[5];
8383  $r = hexdec($hexr);
8384  $g = hexdec($hexg);
8385  $b = hexdec($hexb);
8386  }
8387  $bright = (max($r, $g, $b) + min($r, $g, $b)) / 510.0; // HSL algorithm
8388  if ($bright > 0.6) $res = 1;
8389  }
8390  return $res;
8391 }
8392 
8401 function isVisibleToUserType($type_user, &$menuentry, &$listofmodulesforexternal)
8402 {
8403  global $conf;
8404 
8405  //print 'type_user='.$type_user.' module='.$menuentry['module'].' enabled='.$menuentry['enabled'].' perms='.$menuentry['perms'];
8406  //print 'ok='.in_array($menuentry['module'], $listofmodulesforexternal);
8407  if (empty($menuentry['enabled'])) return 0; // Entry disabled by condition
8408  if ($type_user && $menuentry['module'])
8409  {
8410  $tmploops = explode('|', $menuentry['module']);
8411  $found = 0;
8412  foreach ($tmploops as $tmploop)
8413  {
8414  if (in_array($tmploop, $listofmodulesforexternal)) {
8415  $found++; break;
8416  }
8417  }
8418  if (!$found) return 0; // Entry is for menus all excluded to external users
8419  }
8420  if (!$menuentry['perms'] && $type_user) return 0; // No permissions and user is external
8421  if (!$menuentry['perms'] && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_MENU_HIDE_UNAUTHORIZED)) return 0; // No permissions and option to hide when not allowed, even for internal user, is on
8422  if (!$menuentry['perms']) return 2; // No permissions and user is external
8423  return 1;
8424 }
8425 
8433 function roundUpToNextMultiple($n, $x = 5)
8434 {
8435  return (ceil($n) % $x === 0) ? ceil($n) : round(($n + $x / 2) / $x) * $x;
8436 }
8437 
8449 function dolGetBadge($label, $html = '', $type = 'primary', $mode = '', $url = '', $params = array())
8450 {
8451  $attr = array(
8452  'class'=>'badge '.(!empty($mode) ? ' badge-'.$mode : '').(!empty($type) ? ' badge-'.$type : '').(empty($params['css']) ? '' : ' '.$params['css'])
8453  );
8454 
8455  if (empty($html)) {
8456  $html = $label;
8457  }
8458 
8459  if (!empty($url)) {
8460  $attr['href'] = $url;
8461  }
8462 
8463  if ($mode === 'dot') {
8464  $attr['class'] .= ' classfortooltip';
8465  $attr['title'] = $html;
8466  $attr['aria-label'] = $label;
8467  $html = '';
8468  }
8469 
8470  // Override attr
8471  if (!empty($params['attr']) && is_array($params['attr'])) {
8472  foreach ($params['attr']as $key => $value) {
8473  if ($key == 'class') {
8474  $attr['class'] .= ' '.$value;
8475  }
8476  elseif ($key == 'classOverride') {
8477  $attr['class'] = $value;
8478  }
8479  else {
8480  $attr[$key] = $value;
8481  }
8482  }
8483  }
8484 
8485  // TODO: add hook
8486 
8487  // escape all attribute
8488  $attr = array_map('dol_escape_htmltag', $attr);
8489 
8490  $TCompiledAttr = array();
8491  foreach ($attr as $key => $value) {
8492  $TCompiledAttr[] = $key.'="'.$value.'"';
8493  }
8494 
8495  $compiledAttributes = !empty($TCompiledAttr) ?implode(' ', $TCompiledAttr) : '';
8496 
8497  $tag = !empty($url) ? 'a' : 'span';
8498 
8499  return '<'.$tag.' '.$compiledAttributes.'>'.$html.'</'.$tag.'>';
8500 }
8501 
8502 
8515 function dolGetStatus($statusLabel = '', $statusLabelShort = '', $html = '', $statusType = 'status0', $displayMode = 0, $url = '', $params = array())
8516 {
8517  global $conf;
8518 
8519  $return = '';
8520  $dolGetBadgeParams = array();
8521 
8522  if (!empty($params['badgeParams'])) {
8523  $dolGetBadgeParams = $params['badgeParams'];
8524  }
8525 
8526  // TODO : add a hook
8527 
8528  if ($displayMode == 0) {
8529  $return = !empty($html) ? $html : $statusLabel;
8530  }
8531  elseif ($displayMode == 1) {
8532  $return = !empty($html) ? $html : (!empty($statusLabelShort) ? $statusLabelShort : $statusLabel);
8533  }
8534  // Use status with images (for backward compatibility)
8535  elseif (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_STATUS_USES_IMAGES)) {
8536  $return = '';
8537  $htmlLabel = (in_array($displayMode, array(1, 2, 5)) ? '<span class="hideonsmartphone">' : '').(!empty($html) ? $html : $statusLabel).(in_array($displayMode, array(1, 2, 5)) ? '</span>' : '');
8538  $htmlLabelShort = (in_array($displayMode, array(1, 2, 5)) ? '<span class="hideonsmartphone">' : '').(!empty($html) ? $html : (!empty($statusLabelShort) ? $statusLabelShort : $statusLabel)).(in_array($displayMode, array(1, 2, 5)) ? '</span>' : '');
8539 
8540  // For small screen, we always use the short label instead of long label.
8541  if (!empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen))
8542  {
8543  if ($displayMode == 0) $displayMode = 1;
8544  elseif ($displayMode == 4) $displayMode = 2;
8545  elseif ($displayMode == 6) $displayMode = 5;
8546  }
8547 
8548  // For backward compatibility. Image's filename are still in French, so we use this array to convert
8549  $statusImg = array(
8550  'status0' => 'statut0',
8551  'status1' => 'statut1',
8552  'status2' => 'statut2',
8553  'status3' => 'statut3',
8554  'status4' => 'statut4',
8555  'status5' => 'statut5',
8556  'status6' => 'statut6',
8557  'status7' => 'statut7',
8558  'status8' => 'statut8',
8559  'status9' => 'statut9'
8560  );
8561 
8562  if (!empty($statusImg[$statusType])) {
8563  $htmlImg = img_picto($statusLabel, $statusImg[$statusType]);
8564  } else {
8565  $htmlImg = img_picto($statusLabel, $statusType);
8566  }
8567 
8568  if ($displayMode === 2) {
8569  $return = $htmlImg.' '.$htmlLabelShort;
8570  }
8571  elseif ($displayMode === 3) {
8572  $return = $htmlImg;
8573  }
8574  elseif ($displayMode === 4) {
8575  $return = $htmlImg.' '.$htmlLabel;
8576  }
8577  elseif ($displayMode === 5) {
8578  $return = $htmlLabelShort.' '.$htmlImg;
8579  }
8580  else { // $displayMode >= 6
8581  $return = $htmlLabel.' '.$htmlImg;
8582  }
8583  }
8584  // Use new badge
8585  elseif (empty($conf->global->MAIN_STATUS_USES_IMAGES) && !empty($displayMode)) {
8586  $statusLabelShort = !empty($statusLabelShort) ? $statusLabelShort : $statusLabel;
8587 
8588  $dolGetBadgeParams['attr']['class'] = 'badge-status';
8589  $dolGetBadgeParams['attr']['title'] = $statusLabel;
8590 
8591  if ($displayMode == 3) {
8592  $return = dolGetBadge($statusLabel, '', $statusType, 'dot', $url, $dolGetBadgeParams);
8593  }
8594  elseif ($displayMode === 5) {
8595  $return = dolGetBadge($statusLabelShort, $html, $statusType, '', $url, $dolGetBadgeParams);
8596  }
8597  else {
8598  $return = dolGetBadge($statusLabel, $html, $statusType, '', $url, $dolGetBadgeParams);
8599  }
8600  }
8601 
8602  return $return;
8603 }
8604 
8605 
8618 function dolGetButtonAction($label, $html = '', $actionType = 'default', $url = '', $id = '', $userRight = 1, $params = array())
8619 {
8620  $class = 'butAction';
8621  if ($actionType == 'danger' || $actionType == 'delete') {
8622  $class = 'butActionDelete';
8623  }
8624 
8625  $attr = array(
8626  'class' => $class
8627  ,'href' => empty($url) ? '' : $url
8628  );
8629 
8630  if (empty($html)) {
8631  $html = $label;
8632  } else {
8633  $attr['aria-label'] = $label;
8634  }
8635 
8636  if (empty($userRight)) {
8637  $attr['class'] = 'butActionRefused';
8638  $attr['href'] = '';
8639  }
8640 
8641  if (!empty($id)) {
8642  $attr['id'] = $id;
8643  }
8644 
8645  // Override attr
8646  if (!empty($params['attr']) && is_array($params['attr'])) {
8647  foreach ($params['attr'] as $key => $value) {
8648  if ($key == 'class') {
8649  $attr['class'] .= ' '.$value;
8650  }
8651  elseif ($key == 'classOverride') {
8652  $attr['class'] = $value;
8653  }
8654  else {
8655  $attr[$key] = $value;
8656  }
8657  }
8658  }
8659 
8660  if (isset($attr['href']) && empty($attr['href'])) {
8661  unset($attr['href']);
8662  }
8663 
8664  // TODO : add a hook
8665 
8666  // escape all attribute
8667  $attr = array_map('dol_escape_htmltag', $attr);
8668 
8669  $TCompiledAttr = array();
8670  foreach ($attr as $key => $value) {
8671  $TCompiledAttr[] = $key.'="'.$value.'"';
8672  }
8673 
8674  $compiledAttributes = !empty($TCompiledAttr) ?implode(' ', $TCompiledAttr) : '';
8675 
8676  $tag = !empty($attr['href']) ? 'a' : 'span';
8677 
8678  return '<div class="inline-block divButAction"><'.$tag.' '.$compiledAttributes.'>'.$html.'</'.$tag.'></div>';
8679 }
8680 
8693 function dolGetButtonTitle($label, $helpText = '', $iconClass = 'fa fa-file', $url = '', $id = '', $status = 1, $params = array())
8694 {
8695  global $langs, $conf, $user;
8696 
8697  // Actually this conf is used in css too for external module compatibility and smooth transition to this function
8698  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_BUTTON_HIDE_UNAUTHORIZED) && (!$user->admin) && $status <= 0) {
8699  return '';
8700  }
8701 
8702  $class = 'btnTitle';
8703  if ($iconClass == 'fa fa-plus-circle') $class .= ' btnTitlePlus';
8704 
8705  if (!empty($params['morecss'])) $class .= ' '.$params['morecss'];
8706 
8707  $attr = array(
8708  'class' => $class
8709  ,'href' => empty($url) ? '' : $url
8710  );
8711 
8712  if (!empty($helpText)) {
8713  $attr['title'] = dol_escape_htmltag($helpText);
8714  }
8715 
8716  if ($status <= 0) {
8717  $attr['class'] .= ' refused';
8718 
8719  $attr['href'] = '';
8720 
8721  if ($status == -1) { // disable
8722  $attr['title'] = dol_escape_htmltag($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("FeatureDisabled"));
8723  }
8724  elseif ($status == 0) { // Not enough permissions
8725  $attr['title'] = dol_escape_htmltag($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("NotEnoughPermissions"));
8726  }
8727  }
8728 
8729  if (!empty($attr['title'])) {
8730  $attr['class'] .= ' classfortooltip';
8731  }
8732 
8733  if (!empty($id)) {
8734  $attr['id'] = $id;
8735  }
8736 
8737  // Override attr
8738  if (!empty($params['attr']) && is_array($params['attr'])) {
8739  foreach ($params['attr'] as $key => $value) {
8740  if ($key == 'class') {
8741  $attr['class'] .= ' '.$value;
8742  }
8743  elseif ($key == 'classOverride') {
8744  $attr['class'] = $value;
8745  }
8746  else {
8747  $attr[$key] = $value;
8748  }
8749  }
8750  }
8751 
8752  if (isset($attr['href']) && empty($attr['href'])) {
8753  unset($attr['href']);
8754  }
8755 
8756  // TODO : add a hook
8757 
8758  // escape all attribute
8759  $attr = array_map('dol_escape_htmltag', $attr);
8760 
8761  $TCompiledAttr = array();
8762  foreach ($attr as $key => $value) {
8763  $TCompiledAttr[] = $key.'="'.$value.'"';
8764  }
8765 
8766  $compiledAttributes = (empty($TCompiledAttr) ? '' : implode(' ', $TCompiledAttr));
8767 
8768  $tag = (empty($attr['href']) ? 'span' : 'a');
8769 
8770  $button = '';
8771  $button .= '<'.$tag.' '.$compiledAttributes.' >';
8772  $button .= '<span class="'.$iconClass.' valignmiddle btnTitle-icon"></span>';
8773  $button .= '<span class="valignmiddle text-plus-circle btnTitle-label'.(empty($params['forcenohideoftext']) ? ' hideonsmartphone' : '').'">'.$label.'</span>';
8774  $button .= '</'.$tag.'>';
8775 
8776  return $button;
8777 }
8778 
8786 function getElementProperties($element_type)
8787 {
8788  $regs = array();
8789 
8790  $classfile = $classname = $classpath = '';
8791 
8792  // Parse element/subelement (ex: project_task)
8793  $module = $element_type;
8794  $element = $element_type;
8795  $subelement = $element_type;
8796 
8797  // If we ask an resource form external module (instead of default path)
8798  if (preg_match('/^([^@]+)@([^@]+)$/i', $element_type, $regs)) {
8799  $element = $subelement = $regs[1];
8800  $module = $regs[2];
8801  }
8802 
8803  //print '<br>1. element : '.$element.' - module : '.$module .'<br>';
8804  if (preg_match('/^([^_]+)_([^_]+)/i', $element, $regs)) {
8805  $module = $element = $regs[1];
8806  $subelement = $regs[2];
8807  }
8808 
8809  // For compat
8810  if ($element_type == "action") {
8811  $classpath = 'comm/action/class';
8812  $subelement = 'Actioncomm';
8813  $module = 'agenda';
8814  }
8815 
8816  // To work with non standard path
8817  if ($element_type == 'facture' || $element_type == 'invoice') {
8818  $classpath = 'compta/facture/class';
8819  $module = 'facture';
8820  $subelement = 'facture';
8821  }
8822  if ($element_type == 'commande' || $element_type == 'order') {
8823  $classpath = 'commande/class';
8824  $module = 'commande';
8825  $subelement = 'commande';
8826  }
8827  if ($element_type == 'propal') {
8828  $classpath = 'comm/propal/class';
8829  }
8830  if ($element_type == 'supplier_proposal') {
8831  $classpath = 'supplier_proposal/class';
8832  }
8833  if ($element_type == 'shipping') {
8834  $classpath = 'expedition/class';
8835  $subelement = 'expedition';
8836  $module = 'expedition_bon';
8837  }
8838  if ($element_type == 'delivery') {
8839  $classpath = 'livraison/class';
8840  $subelement = 'livraison';
8841  $module = 'livraison_bon';
8842  }
8843  if ($element_type == 'contract') {
8844  $classpath = 'contrat/class';
8845  $module = 'contrat';
8846  $subelement = 'contrat';
8847  }
8848  if ($element_type == 'member') {
8849  $classpath = 'adherents/class';
8850  $module = 'adherent';
8851  $subelement = 'adherent';
8852  }
8853  if ($element_type == 'cabinetmed_cons') {
8854  $classpath = 'cabinetmed/class';
8855  $module = 'cabinetmed';
8856  $subelement = 'cabinetmedcons';
8857  }
8858  if ($element_type == 'fichinter') {
8859  $classpath = 'fichinter/class';
8860  $module = 'ficheinter';
8861  $subelement = 'fichinter';
8862  }
8863  if ($element_type == 'dolresource' || $element_type == 'resource') {
8864  $classpath = 'resource/class';
8865  $module = 'resource';
8866  $subelement = 'dolresource';
8867  }
8868  if ($element_type == 'propaldet') {
8869  $classpath = 'comm/propal/class';
8870  $module = 'propal';
8871  $subelement = 'propaleligne';
8872  }
8873  if ($element_type == 'order_supplier') {
8874  $classpath = 'fourn/class';
8875  $module = 'fournisseur';
8876  $subelement = 'commandefournisseur';
8877  $classfile = 'fournisseur.commande';
8878  }
8879  if ($element_type == 'invoice_supplier') {
8880  $classpath = 'fourn/class';
8881  $module = 'fournisseur';
8882  $subelement = 'facturefournisseur';
8883  $classfile = 'fournisseur.facture';
8884  }
8885  if ($element_type == "service") {
8886  $classpath = 'product/class';
8887  $subelement = 'product';
8888  }
8889 
8890  if (empty($classfile)) $classfile = strtolower($subelement);
8891  if (empty($classname)) $classname = ucfirst($subelement);
8892  if (empty($classpath)) $classpath = $module.'/class';
8893 
8894  $element_properties = array(
8895  'module' => $module,
8896  'classpath' => $classpath,
8897  'element' => $element,
8898  'subelement' => $subelement,
8899  'classfile' => $classfile,
8900  'classname' => $classname
8901  );
8902  return $element_properties;
8903 }
8904 
8914 function fetchObjectByElement($element_id, $element_type, $element_ref = '')
8915 {
8916  global $conf, $db;
8917 
8918  $element_prop = getElementProperties($element_type);
8919  if (is_array($element_prop) && $conf->{$element_prop['module']}->enabled)
8920  {
8921  dol_include_once('/'.$element_prop['classpath'].'/'.$element_prop['classfile'].'.class.php');
8922 
8923  $objecttmp = new $element_prop['classname']($db);
8924  $ret = $objecttmp->fetch($element_id, $element_ref);
8925  if ($ret >= 0)
8926  {
8927  return $objecttmp;
8928  }
8929  }
8930  return 0;
8931 }
8932 
8939 function isAFileWithExecutableContent($filename)
8940 {
8941  if (preg_match('/\.(htm|html|js|phar|php|php\d+|phtml|pht|pl|py|cgi|ksh|sh|shtml|bash|bat|cmd|wpk|exe|dmg)$/i', $filename))
8942  {
8943  return true;
8944  }
8945 
8946  return false;
8947 }
